506: til'ka hududu al-lahi waman yuti'i al-laha warasulahu yud'khil'hu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wadhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
507: waman ya'si al-laha warasulahu wayata'adda hududahu yud'khil'hu naran khalidan fiha walahu adhabun muhinun
508: wa-allati yatina al-fahishata min nisaikum fa-is'tashhidu alayhinna arba'atan minkum fa-in shahidu fa-amsikuhunna fi al-buyuti hatta yatawaffahunna al-mawtu aw yaj'ala al-lahu lahunna sabilan
509: wa-alladhani yatiyaniha minkum faadhuhuma fa-in taba wa-aslaha fa-a'ridu anhuma inna al-laha kana tawwaban rahiman
510: innama al-tawbatu ala al-lahi lilladhina ya'maluna al-sua bijahalatin thumma yatubuna min qaribin fa-ulaika yatubu al-lahu alayhim wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
511: walaysati al-tawbatu lilladhina ya'maluna al-sayiati hatta idha hadara ahadahumu al-mawtu qala inni tub'tu al-ana wala alladhina yamutuna wahum kuffarun ulaika a'tadna lahum adhaban aliman
512: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la yahillu lakum an tarithu al-nisaa karhan wala ta'duluhunna litadhhabu biba'di ma ataytumuhunna illa an yatina bifahishatin mubayyinatin wa'ashiruhunna bil-ma'rufi fa-in karih'tumuhunna fa'asa an takrahu shayan wayaj'ala al-lahu fihi khayran kathiran
513: wa-in aradttumu is'tib'dala zawjin makana zawjin waataytum ih'dahunna qintaran fala takhudhu min'hu shayan atakhudhunahu buh'tanan wa-ith'man mubinan
514: wakayfa takhudhunahu waqad afda ba'dukum ila ba'din wa-akhadhna minkum mithaqan ghalizan
515: wala tankihu ma nakaha abaukum mina al-nisai illa ma qad salafa innahu kana fahishatan wamaqtan wasaa sabilan
516: hurrimat alaykum ummahatukum wabanatukum wa-akhawatukum wa'ammatukum wakhalatukum wabanatu al-akhi wabanatu al-ukh'ti wa-ummahatukumu allati arda'nakum wa-akhawatukum mina ar-rada'ati wa-ummahatu nisaikum warabaibukumu allati fi hujurikum min nisaikumu allati dakhaltum bihinna fa-in lam takunu dakhaltum bihinna fala junaha alaykum wahalailu abnaikumu alladhina min aslabikum wa-an tajma'u bayna al-ukh'tayni illa ma qad salafa inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
517: wal-muh'sanatu mina al-nisai illa ma malakat aymanukum kitaba al-lahi alaykum wa-uhilla lakum ma waraa dhalikum an tabtaghu bi-amwalikum muh'sinina ghayra musafihina fama is'tamta'tum bihi min'hunna faatuhunna ujurahunna faridatan wala junaha alaykum fima taradaytum bihi min ba'di al-faridati inna al-laha kana aliman hakiman
518: waman lam yastati' minkum tawlan an yankiha al-muh'sanati al-mu'minati famin ma malakat aymanukum min fatayatikumu al-mu'minati wal-lahu a'lamu biimanikum ba'dukum min ba'din fa-inkihuhunna bi-idh'ni ahlihinna waatuhunna ujurahunna bil-ma'rufi muh'sanatin ghayra musafihatin wala muttakhidhati akhdanin fa-idha uh'sinna fa-in atayna bifahishatin fa'alayhinna nis'fu ma ala al-muh'sanati mina al-'adhabi dhalika liman khashiya al-'anata minkum wa-an tasbiru khayrun lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
519: yuridu al-lahu liyubayyina lakum wayahdiyakum sunana alladhina min qablikum wayatuba alaykum wal-lahu alimun hakimun
520: wal-lahu yuridu an yatuba alaykum wayuridu alladhina yattabi'una al-shahawati an tamilu maylan aziman
521: yuridu al-lahu an yukhaffifa ankum wakhuliqa al-insanu da'ifan
522: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takulu amwalakum baynakum bil-batili illa an takuna tijaratan an taradin minkum wala taqtulu anfusakum inna al-laha kana bikum rahiman
523: waman yaf 'al dhalika ud'wanan wazul'man fasawfa nus'lihi naran wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
524: in tajtanibu kabaira ma tun'hawna anhu nukaffir ankum sayyiatikum wanud'khil'kum mud'khalan kariman
525: wala tatamannaw ma faddala al-lahu bihi ba'dakum ala ba'din lilrrijali nasibun mimma ik'tasabu walilnnisai nasibun mimma ik'tasabna wasalu al-laha min fadlihi inna al-laha kana bikulli shayin aliman
526: walikullin ja'alna mawaliya mimma taraka al-walidani wal-aqrabuna wa-alladhina aqadat aymanukum faatuhum nasibahum inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin shahidan
527: ar-rijalu qawwamuna ala al-nisai bima faddala al-lahu ba'dahum ala ba'din wabima anfaqu min amwalihim fal-salihatu qanitatun hafizatun lil'ghaybi bima hafiza al-lahu wa-allati takhafuna nushuzahunna fa'izuhunna wa-uh'juruhunna fi al-madaji'i wa-id'ribuhunna fa-in ata'nakum fala tabghu alayhinna sabilan inna al-laha kana aliyyan kabiran
528: wa-in khif'tum shiqaqa baynihima fa-ib'athu hakaman min ahlihi wahakaman min ahliha in yurida is'lahan yuwaffiqi al-lahu baynahuma inna al-laha kana aliman khabiran
529: wa-u'budu al-laha wala tush'riku bihi shayan wabil-walidayni ih'sanan wabidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wal-jari dhi al-qur'ba wal-jari al-junubi wal-sahibi bil-janbi wa-ib'ni al-sabili wama malakat aymanukum inna al-laha la yuhibbu man kana mukh'talan fakhuran
530: alladhina yabkhaluna wayamuruna al-nasa bil-bukh'li wayaktumuna ma atahumu al-lahu min fadlihi wa-a'tadna lil'kafirina adhaban muhinan
531: wa-alladhina yunfiquna amwalahum riaa al-nasi wala yu'minuna bil-lahi wala bil-yawmi al-akhiri waman yakuni al-shaytanu lahu qarinan fasaa qarinan
532: wamadha alayhim law amanu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa-anfaqu mimma razaqahumu al-lahu wakana al-lahu bihim aliman
533: inna al-laha la yazlimu mith'qala dharratin wa-in taku hasanatan yuda'if'ha wayu'ti min ladun'hu ajran aziman
534: fakayfa idha ji'na min kulli ummatin bishahidin waji'na bika ala haulai shahidan
535: yawma-idhin yawaddu alladhina kafaru wa'asawu ar-rasula law tusawwa bihimu al-ardu wala yaktumuna al-laha hadithan
536: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la taqrabu al-salata wa-antum sukara hatta ta'lamu ma taquluna wala junuban illa abiri sabilin hatta taghtasilu wa-in kuntum marda aw ala safarin aw jaa ahadun minkum mina al-ghaiti aw lamastumu al-nisaa falam tajidu maan fatayammamu sa'idan tayyiban fa-im'sahu biwujuhikum wa-aydikum inna al-laha kana afuwwan ghafuran
537: alam tara ila alladhina utu nasiban mina al-kitabi yashtaruna al-dalalata wayuriduna an tadillu al-sabila
538: wal-lahu a'lamu bi-a'daikum wakafa bil-lahi waliyyan wakafa bil-lahi nasiran
539: mina alladhina hadu yuharrifuna al-kalima an mawadi'ihi wayaquluna sami'na wa'asayna wa-is'ma' ghayra mus'ma'in wara'ina layyan bi-alsinatihim wata'nan fi al-dini walaw annahum qalu sami'na wa-ata'na wa-is'ma' wa-unzur'na lakana khayran lahum wa-aqwama walakin la'anahumu al-lahu bikuf'rihim fala yu'minuna illa qalilan
540: yaayyuha alladhina utu al-kitaba aminu bima nazzalna musaddiqan lima ma'akum min qabli an natmisa wujuhan fanaruddaha ala adbariha aw nal'anahum kama la'anna ashaba al-sabti wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan
541: inna al-laha la yaghfiru an yush'raka bihi wayaghfiru ma duna dhalika liman yashau waman yush'rik bil-lahi faqadi if'tara ith'man aziman
542: alam tara ila alladhina yuzakkuna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakki man yashau wala yuz'lamuna fatilan
543: unzur kayfa yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafa bihi ith'man mubinan
544: alam tara ila alladhina utu nasiban mina al-kitabi yu'minuna bil-jib'ti wal-taghuti wayaquluna lilladhina kafaru haulai ahda mina alladhina amanu sabilan
545: ulaika alladhina la'anahumu al-lahu waman yal'ani al-lahu falan tajida lahu nasiran
546: am lahum nasibun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan la yu'tuna al-nasa naqiran
547: am yahsuduna al-nasa ala ma atahumu al-lahu min fadlihi faqad atayna ala ib'rahima al-kitaba wal-hik'mata waataynahum mul'kan aziman
548: famin'hum man amana bihi wamin'hum man sadda anhu wakafa bijahannama sa'iran
549: inna alladhina kafaru biayatina sawfa nus'lihim naran kullama nadijat juluduhum baddalnahum juludan ghayraha liyadhuqu al-'adhaba inna al-laha kana azizan hakiman
550: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati sanud'khiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan lahum fiha azwajun mutahharatun wanud'khiluhum zillan zalilan
551: inna al-laha yamurukum an tu-addu al-amanati ila ahliha wa-idha hakamtum bayna al-nasi an tahkumu bil-'adli inna al-laha ni'imma ya'izukum bihi inna al-laha kana sami'an basiran
552: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula wa-uli al-amri minkum fa-in tanaza'tum fi shayin farudduhu ila al-lahi war-rasuli in kuntum tu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri dhalika khayrun wa-ahsanu tawilan
553: alam tara ila alladhina yaz'umuna annahum amanu bima unzila ilayka wama unzila min qablika yuriduna an yatahakamu ila al-taghuti waqad umiru an yakfuru bihi wayuridu al-shaytanu an yudillahum dalalan ba'idan
554: wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw ila ma anzala al-lahu wa-ila ar-rasuli ra-ayta al-munafiqina yasudduna anka sududan
555: fakayfa idha asabathum musibatun bima qaddamat aydihim thumma jauka yahlifuna bil-lahi in aradna illa ih'sanan watawfiqan
556: ulaika alladhina ya'lamu al-lahu ma fi qulubihim fa-a'rid anhum wa'iz'hum waqul lahum fi anfusihim qawlan balighan
557: wama arsalna min rasulin illa liyuta'a bi-idh'ni al-lahi walaw annahum idh zalamu anfusahum jauka fa-is'taghfaru al-laha wa-is'taghfara lahumu ar-rasulu lawajadu al-laha tawwaban rahiman
558: fala warabbika la yu'minuna hatta yuhakkimuka fima shajara baynahum thumma la yajidu fi anfusihim harajan mimma qadayta wayusallimu tasliman
559: walaw anna katabna alayhim ani uq'tulu anfusakum awi ukh'ruju min diyarikum ma fa'aluhu illa qalilun min'hum walaw annahum fa'alu ma yu'azuna bihi lakana khayran lahum wa-ashadda tathbitan
560: wa-idhan laataynahum min ladunna ajran aziman
562: waman yuti'i al-laha war-rasula fa-ulaika ma'a alladhina an'ama al-lahu alayhim mina al-nabiyina wal-sidiqina wal-shuhadai wal-salihina wahasuna ulaika rafiqan
563: dhalika al-fadlu mina al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi aliman
564: yaayyuha alladhina amanu khudhu hidh'rakum fa-infiru thubatin awi infiru jami'an
565: wa-inna minkum laman layubatti-anna fa-in asabatkum musibatun qala qad an'ama al-lahu alayya idh lam akun ma'ahum shahidan
566: wala-in asabakum fadlun mina al-lahi layaqulanna ka-an lam takun baynakum wabaynahu mawaddatun yalaytani kuntu ma'ahum fa-afuza fawzan aziman
567: falyuqatil fi sabili al-lahi alladhina yashruna al-hayata al-dun'ya bil-akhirati waman yuqatil fi sabili al-lahi fayuq'tal aw yaghlib fasawfa nu'tihi ajran aziman
568: wama lakum la tuqatiluna fi sabili al-lahi wal-mus'tad'afina mina ar-rijali wal-nisai wal-wil'dani alladhina yaquluna rabbana akhrij'na min hadhihi al-qaryati al-zalimi ahluha wa-ij'al lana min ladunka waliyyan wa-ij'al lana min ladunka nasiran
569: alladhina amanu yuqatiluna fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina kafaru yuqatiluna fi sabili al-taghuti faqatilu awliyaa al-shaytani inna kayda al-shaytani kana da'ifan
570: alam tara ila alladhina qila lahum kuffu aydiyakum wa-aqimu al-salata waatu al-zakata falamma kutiba alayhimu al-qitalu idha fariqun min'hum yakhshawna al-nasa kakhashyati al-lahi aw ashadda khashyatan waqalu rabbana lima katabta alayna al-qitala lawla akhartana ila ajalin qaribin qul mata'u al-dun'ya qalilun wal-akhiratu khayrun limani ittaqa wala tuz'lamuna fatilan
571: aynama takunu yud'rikkumu al-mawtu walaw kuntum fi burujin mushayyadatin wa-in tusib'hum hasanatun yaqulu hadhihi min indi al-lahi wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun yaqulu hadhihi min indika qul kullun min indi al-lahi famali haulai al-qawmi la yakaduna yafqahuna hadithan
572: ma asabaka min hasanatin famina al-lahi wama asabaka min sayyi-atin famin nafsika wa-arsalnaka lilnnasi rasulan wakafa bil-lahi shahidan
573: man yuti'i ar-rasula faqad ata'a al-laha waman tawalla fama arsalnaka alayhim hafizan
574: wayaquluna ta'atun fa-idha barazu min indika bayyata taifatun min'hum ghayra alladhi taqulu wal-lahu yaktubu ma yubayyituna fa-a'rid anhum watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
575: afala yatadabbaruna al-qur'ana walaw kana min indi ghayri al-lahi lawajadu fihi ikh'tilafan kathiran
576: wa-idha jaahum amrun mina al-amni awi al-khawfi adha'u bihi walaw radduhu ila ar-rasuli wa-ila uli al-amri min'hum la'alimahu alladhina yastanbitunahu min'hum walawla fadlu al-lahi alaykum warahmatuhu la-ittaba'tumu al-shaytana illa qalilan
577: faqatil fi sabili al-lahi la tukallafu illa nafsaka waharridi al-mu'minina asa al-lahu an yakuffa basa alladhina kafaru wal-lahu ashaddu basan wa-ashaddu tankilan
578: man yashfa' shafa'atan hasanatan yakun lahu nasibun min'ha waman yashfa' shafa'atan sayyi-atan yakun lahu kif'lun min'ha wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin muqitan
579: wa-idha huyyitum bitahiyyatin fahayyu bi-ahsana min'ha aw rudduha inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin hasiban
580: al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa layajma'annakum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi waman asdaqu mina al-lahi hadithan
581: fama lakum fi al-munafiqina fi-atayni wal-lahu arkasahum bima kasabu aturiduna an tahdu man adalla al-lahu waman yud'lili al-lahu falan tajida lahu sabilan
582: waddu law takfuruna kama kafaru fatakununa sawaan fala tattakhidhu min'hum awliyaa hatta yuhajiru fi sabili al-lahi fa-in tawallaw fakhudhuhum wa-uq'tuluhum haythu wajadttumuhum wala tattakhidhu min'hum waliyyan wala nasiran
583: illa alladhina yasiluna ila qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun aw jaukum hasirat suduruhum an yuqatilukum aw yuqatilu qawmahum walaw shaa al-lahu lasallatahum alaykum falaqatalukum fa-ini i'tazalukum falam yuqatilukum wa-alqaw ilaykumu al-salama fama ja'ala al-lahu lakum alayhim sabilan
584: satajiduna akharina yuriduna an yamanukum wayamanu qawmahum kulla ma ruddu ila al-fit'nati ur'kisu fiha fa-in lam ya'tazilukum wayul'qu ilaykumu al-salama wayakuffu aydiyahum fakhudhuhum wa-uq'tuluhum haythu thaqif'tumuhum wa-ulaikum ja'alna lakum alayhim sul'tanan mubinan
585: wama kana limu'minin an yaqtula mu'minan illa khata-an waman qatala mu'minan khata-an fatahriru raqabatin mu'minatin wadiyatun musallamatun ila ahlihi illa an yassaddaqu fa-in kana min qawmin aduwwin lakum wahuwa mu'minun fatahriru raqabatin mu'minatin wa-in kana min qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun fadiyatun musallamatun ila ahlihi watahriru raqabatin mu'minatin faman lam yajid fasiyamu shahrayni mutatabi'ayni tawbatan mina al-lahi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
586: waman yaqtul mu'minan muta'ammidan fajazauhu jahannamu khalidan fiha waghadiba al-lahu alayhi wala'anahu wa-a'adda lahu adhaban aziman
587: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha darabtum fi sabili al-lahi fatabayyanu wala taqulu liman alqa ilaykumu al-salama lasta mu'minan tabtaghuna arada al-hayati al-dun'ya fa'inda al-lahi maghanimu kathiratun kadhalika kuntum min qablu famanna al-lahu alaykum fatabayyanu inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
588: la yastawi al-qa'iduna mina al-mu'minina ghayru uli al-darari wal-mujahiduna fi sabili al-lahi bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim faddala al-lahu al-mujahidina bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim ala al-qa'idina darajatan wakullan wa'ada al-lahu al-hus'na wafaddala al-lahu al-mujahidina ala al-qa'idina ajran aziman
589: darajatin min'hu wamaghfiratan warahmatan wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
590: inna alladhina tawaffahumu al-malaikatu zalimi anfusihim qalu fima kuntum qalu kunna mus'tad'afina fi al-ardi qalu alam takun ardu al-lahi wasi'atan fatuhajiru fiha fa-ulaika mawahum jahannamu wasaat masiran
591: illa al-mus'tad'afina mina ar-rijali wal-nisai wal-wil'dani la yastati'una hilatan wala yahtaduna sabilan
592: fa-ulaika asa al-lahu an ya'fuwa anhum wakana al-lahu afuwwan ghafuran
593: waman yuhajir fi sabili al-lahi yajid fi al-ardi muraghaman kathiran wasa'atan waman yakhruj min baytihi muhajiran ila al-lahi warasulihi thumma yud'rik'hu al-mawtu faqad waqa'a ajruhu ala al-lahi wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
594: wa-idha darabtum fi al-ardi falaysa alaykum junahun an taqsuru mina al-salati in khif'tum an yaftinakumu alladhina kafaru inna al-kafirina kanu lakum aduwwan mubinan
595: wa-idha kunta fihim fa-aqamta lahumu al-salata faltaqum taifatun min'hum ma'aka walyakhudhu aslihatahum fa-idha sajadu falyakunu min waraikum waltati taifatun ukh'ra lam yusallu falyusallu ma'aka walyakhudhu hidh'rahum wa-aslihatahum wadda alladhina kafaru law taghfuluna an aslihatikum wa-amti'atikum fayamiluna alaykum maylatan wahidatan wala junaha alaykum in kana bikum adhan min matarin aw kuntum marda an tada'u aslihatakum wakhudhu hidh'rakum inna al-laha a'adda lil'kafirina adhaban muhinan
596: fa-idha qadaytumu al-salata fa-udh'kuru al-laha qiyaman waqu'udan wa'ala junubikum fa-idha it'manantum fa-aqimu al-salata inna al-salata kanat ala al-mu'minina kitaban mawqutan
597: wala tahinu fi ib'tighai al-qawmi in takunu talamuna fa-innahum yalamuna kama talamuna watarjuna mina al-lahi ma la yarjuna wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
598: inna anzalna ilayka al-kitaba bil-haqi litahkuma bayna al-nasi bima araka al-lahu wala takun lil'khainina khasiman
599: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
600: wala tujadil ani alladhina yakhtanuna anfusahum inna al-laha la yuhibbu man kana khawwanan athiman
601: yastakhfuna mina al-nasi wala yastakhfuna mina al-lahi wahuwa ma'ahum idh yubayyituna ma la yarda mina al-qawli wakana al-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitan
602: haantum haulai jadaltum anhum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya faman yujadilu al-laha anhum yawma al-qiyamati am man yakunu alayhim wakilan
603: waman ya'mal suan aw yazlim nafsahu thumma yastaghfiri al-laha yajidi al-laha ghafuran rahiman
604: waman yaksib ith'man fa-innama yaksibuhu ala nafsihi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
605: waman yaksib khatiatan aw ith'man thumma yarmi bihi barian faqadi ih'tamala buh'tanan wa-ith'man mubinan
606: walawla fadlu al-lahi alayka warahmatuhu lahammat taifatun min'hum an yudilluka wama yudilluna illa anfusahum wama yadurrunaka min shayin wa-anzala al-lahu alayka al-kitaba wal-hik'mata wa'allamaka ma lam takun ta'lamu wakana fadlu al-lahi alayka aziman
607: la khayra fi kathirin min najwahum illa man amara bisadaqatin aw ma'rufin aw is'lahin bayna al-nasi waman yaf 'al dhalika ib'tighaa mardati al-lahi fasawfa nu'tihi ajran aziman
608: waman yushaqiqi ar-rasula min ba'di ma tabayyana lahu al-huda wayattabi' ghayra sabili al-mu'minina nuwallihi ma tawalla wanus'lihi jahannama wasaat masiran
609: inna al-laha la yaghfiru an yush'raka bihi wayaghfiru ma duna dhalika liman yashau waman yush'rik bil-lahi faqad dalla dalalan ba'idan
610: in yad'una min dunihi illa inathan wa-in yad'una illa shaytanan maridan
611: la'anahu al-lahu waqala la-attakhidhanna min ibadika nasiban mafrudan
612: wala-udillannahum wala-umanniyannahum walaamurannahum falayubattikunna adhana al-an'ami walaamurannahum falayughayyirunna khalqa al-lahi waman yattakhidhi al-shaytana waliyyan min duni al-lahi faqad khasira khus'ranan mubinan
613: ya'iduhum wayumannihim wama ya'iduhumu al-shaytanu illa ghururan
614: ulaika mawahum jahannamu wala yajiduna anha mahisan
615: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati sanud'khiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan wa'da al-lahi haqqan waman asdaqu mina al-lahi qilan
616: laysa bi-amaniyyikum wala amaniyyi ahli al-kitabi man ya'mal suan yuj'za bihi wala yajid lahu min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
617: waman ya'mal mina al-salihati min dhakarin aw untha wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulaika yadkhuluna al-janata wala yuz'lamuna naqiran
618: waman ahsanu dinan mimman aslama wajhahu lillahi wahuwa muh'sinun wa-ittaba'a millata ib'rahima hanifan wa-ittakhadha al-lahu ib'rahima khalilan
619: walillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakana al-lahu bikulli shayin muhitan
620: wayastaftunaka fi al-nisai quli al-lahu yuf'tikum fihinna wama yut'la alaykum fi al-kitabi fi yatama al-nisai allati la tu'tunahunna ma kutiba lahunna watarghabuna an tankihuhunna wal-mus'tad'afina mina al-wil'dani wa-an taqumu lil'yatama bil-qis'ti wama taf 'alu min khayrin fa-inna al-laha kana bihi aliman
621: wa-ini im'ra-atun khafat min ba'liha nushuzan aw i'radan fala junaha alayhima an yus'liha baynahuma sul'han wal-sul'hu khayrun wa-uh'dirati al-anfusu al-shuha wa-in tuh'sinu watattaqu fa-inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
622: walan tastati'u an ta'dilu bayna al-nisai walaw harastum fala tamilu kulla al-mayli fatadharuha kal-mu'alaqati wa-in tus'lihu watattaqu fa-inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
623: wa-in yatafarraqa yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min sa'atihi wakana al-lahu wasi'an hakiman
624: walillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi walaqad wassayna alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablikum wa-iyyakum ani ittaqu al-laha wa-in takfuru fa-inna lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakana al-lahu ghaniyyan hamidan
625: walillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
626: in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuha al-nasu wayati biakharina wakana al-lahu ala dhalika qadiran
627: man kana yuridu thawaba al-dun'ya fa'inda al-lahi thawabu al-dun'ya wal-akhirati wakana al-lahu sami'an basiran
628: yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu qawwamina bil-qis'ti shuhadaa lillahi walaw ala anfusikum awi al-walidayni wal-aqrabina in yakun ghaniyyan aw faqiran fal-lahu awla bihima fala tattabi'u al-hawa an ta'dilu wa-in talwu aw tu'ridu fa-inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
629: yaayyuha alladhina amanu aminu bil-lahi warasulihi wal-kitabi alladhi nazzala ala rasulihi wal-kitabi alladhi anzala min qablu waman yakfur bil-lahi wamalaikatihi wakutubihi warusulihi wal-yawmi al-akhiri faqad dalla dalalan ba'idan
630: inna alladhina amanu thumma kafaru thumma amanu thumma kafaru thumma iz'dadu kuf'ran lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum wala liyahdiyahum sabilan
631: bashiri al-munafiqina bi-anna lahum adhaban aliman
632: alladhina yattakhidhuna al-kafirina awliyaa min duni al-mu'minina ayabtaghuna indahumu al-'izata fa-inna al-'izata lillahi jami'an
633: waqad nazzala alaykum fi al-kitabi an idha sami'tum ayati al-lahi yuk'faru biha wayus'tahza-u biha fala taq'udu ma'ahum hatta yakhudu fi hadithin ghayrihi innakum idhan mith'luhum inna al-laha jami'u al-munafiqina wal-kafirina fi jahannama jami'an
634: alladhina yatarabbasuna bikum fa-in kana lakum fathun mina al-lahi qalu alam nakun ma'akum wa-in kana lil'kafirina nasibun qalu alam nastahwidh alaykum wanamna'kum mina al-mu'minina fal-lahu yahkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyamati walan yaj'ala al-lahu lil'kafirina ala al-mu'minina sabilan
635: inna al-munafiqina yukhadi'una al-laha wahuwa khadi'uhum wa-idha qamu ila al-salati qamu kusala yurauna al-nasa wala yadhkuruna al-laha illa qalilan
636: mudhabdhabina bayna dhalika la ila haulai wala ila haulai waman yud'lili al-lahu falan tajida lahu sabilan
637: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu al-kafirina awliyaa min duni al-mu'minina aturiduna an taj'alu lillahi alaykum sul'tanan mubinan
638: inna al-munafiqina fi al-darki al-asfali mina al-nari walan tajida lahum nasiran
639: illa alladhina tabu wa-aslahu wa-i'tasamu bil-lahi wa-akhlasu dinahum lillahi fa-ulaika ma'a al-mu'minina wasawfa yu'ti al-lahu al-mu'minina ajran aziman
640: ma yaf 'alu al-lahu bi'adhabikum in shakartum waamantum wakana al-lahu shakiran aliman
641: la yuhibbu al-lahu al-jahra bil-sui mina al-qawli illa man zulima wakana al-lahu sami'an aliman
642: in tub'du khayran aw tukh'fuhu aw ta'fu an suin fa-inna al-laha kana afuwwan qadiran
643: inna alladhina yakfuruna bil-lahi warusulihi wayuriduna an yufarriqu bayna al-lahi warusulihi wayaquluna nu'minu biba'din wanakfuru biba'din wayuriduna an yattakhidhu bayna dhalika sabilan
644: ulaika humu al-kafiruna haqqan wa-a'tadna lil'kafirina adhaban muhinan
645: wa-alladhina amanu bil-lahi warusulihi walam yufarriqu bayna ahadin min'hum ulaika sawfa yu'tihim ujurahum wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
646: yasaluka ahlu al-kitabi an tunazzila alayhim kitaban mina al-samai faqad sa-alu musa akbara min dhalika faqalu arina al-laha jahratan fa-akhadhathumu al-sa'iqatu bizul'mihim thumma ittakhadhu al-'ij'la min ba'di ma jaathumu al-bayinatu fa'afawna an dhalika waatayna musa sul'tanan mubinan
647: warafa'na fawqahumu al-tura bimithaqihim waqul'na lahumu ud'khulu al-baba sujjadan waqul'na lahum la ta'du fi al-sabti wa-akhadhna min'hum mithaqan ghalizan
648: fabima naqdihim mithaqahum wakuf'rihim biayati al-lahi waqatlihimu al-anbiyaa bighayri haqqin waqawlihim qulubuna ghul'fun bal taba'a al-lahu alayha bikuf'rihim fala yu'minuna illa qalilan
649: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ala maryama buh'tanan aziman
650: waqawlihim inna qatalna al-masiha isa ib'na maryama rasula al-lahi wama qataluhu wama salabuhu walakin shubbiha lahum wa-inna alladhina ikh'talafu fihi lafi shakkin min'hu ma lahum bihi min il'min illa ittiba'a al-zani wama qataluhu yaqinan
651: bal rafa'ahu al-lahu ilayhi wakana al-lahu azizan hakiman
652: wa-in min ahli al-kitabi illa layu'minanna bihi qabla mawtihi wayawma al-qiyamati yakunu alayhim shahidan
653: fabizul'min mina alladhina hadu harramna alayhim tayyibatin uhillat lahum wabisaddihim an sabili al-lahi kathiran
654: wa-akhdhihimu ar-riba waqad nuhu anhu wa-aklihim amwala al-nasi bil-batili wa-a'tadna lil'kafirina min'hum adhaban aliman
655: lakini ar-rasikhuna fi al-'il'mi min'hum wal-mu'minuna yu'minuna bima unzila ilayka wama unzila min qablika wal-muqimina al-salata wal-mu'tuna al-zakata wal-mu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri ulaika sanu'tihim ajran aziman
656: inna awhayna ilayka kama awhayna ila nuhin wal-nabiyina min ba'dihi wa-awhayna ila ib'rahima wa-is'ma'ila wa-is'haqa waya'quba wal-asbati wa'isa wa-ayyuba wayunusa waharuna wasulaymana waatayna dawuda zaburan
657: warusulan qad qasasnahum alayka min qablu warusulan lam naqsus'hum alayka wakallama al-lahu musa takliman
658: rusulan mubashirina wamundhirina li-alla yakuna lilnnasi ala al-lahi hujjatun ba'da ar-rusuli wakana al-lahu azizan hakiman
659: lakini al-lahu yashhadu bima anzala ilayka anzalahu bi'il'mihi wal-malaikatu yashhaduna wakafa bil-lahi shahidan
660: inna alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi qad dallu dalalan ba'idan
661: inna alladhina kafaru wazalamu lam yakuni al-lahu liyaghfira lahum wala liyahdiyahum tariqan
662: illa tariqa jahannama khalidina fiha abadan wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
663: yaayyuha al-nasu qad jaakumu ar-rasulu bil-haqi min rabbikum faaminu khayran lakum wa-in takfuru fa-inna lillahi ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wakana al-lahu aliman hakiman
664: yaahla al-kitabi la taghlu fi dinikum wala taqulu ala al-lahi illa al-haqa innama al-masihu isa ub'nu maryama rasulu al-lahi wakalimatuhu alqaha ila maryama waruhun min'hu faaminu bil-lahi warusulihi wala taqulu thalathatun intahu khayran lakum innama al-lahu ilahun wahidun sub'hanahu an yakuna lahu waladun lahu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
665: lan yastankifa al-masihu an yakuna abdan lillahi wala al-malaikatu al-muqarabuna waman yastankif an ibadatihi wayastakbir fasayahshuruhum ilayhi jami'an
666: fa-amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati fayuwaffihim ujurahum wayaziduhum min fadlihi wa-amma alladhina is'tankafu wa-is'takbaru fayu'adhibuhum adhaban aliman wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
667: yaayyuha al-nasu qad jaakum bur'hanun min rabbikum wa-anzalna ilaykum nuran mubinan
668: fa-amma alladhina amanu bil-lahi wa-i'tasamu bihi fasayud'khiluhum fi rahmatin min'hu wafadlin wayahdihim ilayhi siratan mus'taqiman
669: yastaftunaka quli al-lahu yuf'tikum fi al-kalalati ini im'ru-on halaka laysa lahu waladun walahu ukh'tun falaha nis'fu ma taraka wahuwa yarithuha in lam yakun laha waladun fa-in kanata ith'natayni falahuma al-thuluthani mimma taraka wa-in kanu ikh'watan rijalan wanisaan falildhakari mith'lu hazzi al-unthayayni yubayyinu al-lahu lakum an tadillu wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
670: yaayyuha alladhina amanu awfu bil-'uqudi uhillat lakum bahimatu al-an'ami illa ma yut'la alaykum ghayra muhilli al-saydi wa-antum hurumun inna al-laha yahkumu ma yuridu
671: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuhillu sha'aira al-lahi wala al-shahra al-harama wala al-hadya wala al-qalaida wala ammina al-bayta al-harama yabtaghuna fadlan min rabbihim warid'wanan wa-idha halaltum fa-is'tadu wala yajrimannakum shanaanu qawmin an saddukum ani al-masjidi al-harami an ta'tadu wata'awanu ala al-biri wal-taqwa wala ta'awanu ala al-ith'mi wal-'ud'wani wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
672: hurrimat alaykumu al-maytatu wal-damu walahmu al-khinziri wama uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi wal-mun'khaniqatu wal-mawqudhatu wal-mutaradiyatu wal-natihatu wama akala al-sabu'u illa ma dhakkaytum wama dhubiha ala al-nusubi wa-an tastaqsimu bil-azlami dhalikum fis'qun al-yawma ya-isa alladhina kafaru min dinikum fala takhshawhum wa-ikh'shawni al-yawma akmaltu lakum dinakum wa-atmamtu alaykum ni'mati waraditu lakumu al-is'lama dinan famani ud'turra fi makhmasatin ghayra mutajanifin li-ith'min fa-inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
673: yasalunaka madha uhilla lahum qul uhilla lakumu al-tayibatu wama allamtum mina al-jawarihi mukallibina tu'allimunahunna mimma allamakumu al-lahu fakulu mimma amsakna alaykum wa-udh'kuru is'ma al-lahi alayhi wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha sari'u al-hisabi
674: al-yawma uhilla lakumu al-tayibatu wata'amu alladhina utu al-kitaba hillun lakum wata'amukum hillun lahum wal-muh'sanatu mina al-mu'minati wal-muh'sanatu mina alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablikum idha ataytumuhunna ujurahunna muh'sinina ghayra musafihina wala muttakhidhi akhdanin waman yakfur bil-imani faqad habita amaluhu wahuwa fi al-akhirati mina al-khasirina
675: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha qum'tum ila al-salati fa-igh'silu wujuhakum wa-aydiyakum ila al-marafiqi wa-im'sahu biruusikum wa-arjulakum ila al-ka'bayni wa-in kuntum junuban fa-ittahharu wa-in kuntum marda aw ala safarin aw jaa ahadun minkum mina al-ghaiti aw lamastumu al-nisaa falam tajidu maan fatayammamu sa'idan tayyiban fa-im'sahu biwujuhikum wa-aydikum min'hu ma yuridu al-lahu liyaj'ala alaykum min harajin walakin yuridu liyutahhirakum waliyutimma ni'matahu alaykum la'allakum tashkuruna
676: wa-udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum wamithaqahu alladhi wathaqakum bihi idh qul'tum sami'na wa-ata'na wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha alimun bidhati al-suduri
677: yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu qawwamina lillahi shuhadaa bil-qis'ti wala yajrimannakum shanaanu qawmin ala alla ta'dilu i'dilu huwa aqrabu lilttaqwa wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha khabirun bima ta'maluna
678: wa'ada al-lahu alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun azimun
679: wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu al-jahimi
680: yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh hamma qawmun an yabsutu ilaykum aydiyahum fakaffa aydiyahum ankum wa-ittaqu al-laha wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minuna
681: walaqad akhadha al-lahu mithaqa bani is'raila waba'athna min'humu ith'nay ashara naqiban waqala al-lahu inni ma'akum la-in aqamtumu al-salata waataytumu al-zakata waamantum birusuli wa'azzartumuhum wa-aqradtumu al-laha qardan hasanan la-ukaffiranna ankum sayyiatikum wala-ud'khilannakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu faman kafara ba'da dhalika minkum faqad dalla sawaa al-sabili
682: fabima naqdihim mithaqahum la'annahum waja'alna qulubahum qasiyatan yuharrifuna al-kalima an mawadi'ihi wanasu hazzan mimma dhukkiru bihi wala tazalu tattali'u ala khainatin min'hum illa qalilan min'hum fa-u'fu anhum wa-is'fah inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muh'sinina
683: wamina alladhina qalu inna nasara akhadhna mithaqahum fanasu hazzan mimma dhukkiru bihi fa-aghrayna baynahumu al-'adawata wal-baghdaa ila yawmi al-qiyamati wasawfa yunabbi-uhumu al-lahu bima kanu yasna'una
684: yaahla al-kitabi qad jaakum rasuluna yubayyinu lakum kathiran mimma kuntum tukh'funa mina al-kitabi waya'fu an kathirin qad jaakum mina al-lahi nurun wakitabun mubinun
685: yahdi bihi al-lahu mani ittaba'a rid'wanahu subula al-salami wayukh'rijuhum mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri bi-idh'nihi wayahdihim ila siratin mus'taqimin
686: laqad kafara alladhina qalu inna al-laha huwa al-masihu ub'nu maryama qul faman yamliku mina al-lahi shayan in arada an yuh'lika al-masiha ib'na maryama wa-ummahu waman fi al-ardi jami'an walillahi mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma yakhluqu ma yashau wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
687: waqalati al-yahudu wal-nasara nahnu abnau al-lahi wa-ahibbauhu qul falima yu'adhibukum bidhunubikum bal antum basharun mimman khalaqa yaghfiru liman yashau wayu'adhibu man yashau walillahi mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma wa-ilayhi al-masiru
688: yaahla al-kitabi qad jaakum rasuluna yubayyinu lakum ala fatratin mina ar-rusuli an taqulu ma jaana min bashirin wala nadhirin faqad jaakum bashirun wanadhirun wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
689: wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi yaqawmi udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum idh ja'ala fikum anbiyaa waja'alakum mulukan waatakum ma lam yu'ti ahadan mina al-'alamina
690: yaqawmi ud'khulu al-arda al-muqadasata allati kataba al-lahu lakum wala tartaddu ala adbarikum fatanqalibu khasirina
691: qalu yamusa inna fiha qawman jabbarina wa-inna lan nadkhulaha hatta yakhruju min'ha fa-in yakhruju min'ha fa-inna dakhiluna
692: qala rajulani mina alladhina yakhafuna an'ama al-lahu alayhima ud'khulu alayhimu al-baba fa-idha dakhaltumuhu fa-innakum ghalibuna wa'ala al-lahi fatawakkalu in kuntum mu'minina
693: qalu yamusa inna lan nadkhulaha abadan ma damu fiha fa-idh'hab anta warabbuka faqatila inna hahuna qa'iduna
694: qala rabbi inni la amliku illa nafsi wa-akhi fa-uf'ruq baynana wabayna al-qawmi al-fasiqina
695: qala fa-innaha muharramatun alayhim arba'ina sanatan yatihuna fi al-ardi fala tasa ala al-qawmi al-fasiqina
696: wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a ib'nay adama bil-haqi idh qarraba qur'banan fatuqubbila min ahadihima walam yutaqabbal mina al-akhari qala la-aqtulannaka qala innama yataqabbalu al-lahu mina al-mutaqina
697: la-in basatta ilayya yadaka litaqtulani ma ana bibasitin yadiya ilayka li-aqtulaka inni akhafu al-laha rabba al-'alamina
698: inni uridu an tabua bi-ith'mi wa-ith'mika fatakuna min ashabi al-nari wadhalika jazau al-zalimina
699: fatawwa'at lahu nafsuhu qatla akhihi faqatalahu fa-asbaha mina al-khasirina
700: faba'atha al-lahu ghuraban yabhathu fi al-ardi liyuriyahu kayfa yuwari sawata akhihi qala yawaylata a'ajaztu an akuna mith'la hadha al-ghurabi fa-uwariya sawata akhi fa-asbaha mina al-nadimina
701: min ajli dhalika katabna ala bani is'raila annahu man qatala nafsan bighayri nafsin aw fasadin fi al-ardi faka-annama qatala al-nasa jami'an waman ahyaha faka-annama ahya al-nasa jami'an walaqad jaathum rusuluna bil-bayinati thumma inna kathiran min'hum ba'da dhalika fi al-ardi lamus'rifuna
702: innama jazau alladhina yuharibuna al-laha warasulahu wayas'awna fi al-ardi fasadan an yuqattalu aw yusallabu aw tuqatta'a aydihim wa-arjuluhum min khilafin aw yunfaw mina al-ardi dhalika lahum khiz'yun fi al-dun'ya walahum fi al-akhirati adhabun azimun
703: illa alladhina tabu min qabli an taqdiru alayhim fa-i'lamu anna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
704: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha wa-ib'taghu ilayhi al-wasilata wajahidu fi sabilihi la'allakum tuf'lihuna
705: inna alladhina kafaru law anna lahum ma fi al-ardi jami'an wamith'lahu ma'ahu liyaftadu bihi min adhabi yawmi al-qiyamati ma tuqubbila min'hum walahum adhabun alimun
706: yuriduna an yakhruju mina al-nari wama hum bikharijina min'ha walahum adhabun muqimun
707: wal-sariqu wal-sariqatu fa-iq'ta'u aydiyahuma jazaan bima kasaba nakalan mina al-lahi wal-lahu azizun hakimun
708: faman taba min ba'di zul'mihi wa-aslaha fa-inna al-laha yatubu alayhi inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
709: alam ta'lam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi yu'adhibu man yashau wayaghfiru liman yashau wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
710: yaayyuha ar-rasulu la yahzunka alladhina yusari'una fi al-kuf'ri mina alladhina qalu amanna bi-afwahihim walam tu'min qulubuhum wamina alladhina hadu samma'una lil'kadhibi samma'una liqawmin akharina lam yatuka yuharrifuna al-kalima min ba'di mawadi'ihi yaquluna in utitum hadha fakhudhuhu wa-in lam tu'tawhu fa-ih'dharu waman yuridi al-lahu fit'natahu falan tamlika lahu mina al-lahi shayan ulaika alladhina lam yuridi al-lahu an yutahhira qulubahum lahum fi al-dun'ya khiz'yun walahum fi al-akhirati adhabun azimun
711: samma'una lil'kadhibi akkaluna lilssuh'ti fa-in jauka fa-uh'kum baynahum aw a'rid anhum wa-in tu'rid anhum falan yadurruka shayan wa-in hakamta fa-uh'kum baynahum bil-qis'ti inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muq'sitina
712: wakayfa yuhakkimunaka wa'indahumu al-tawratu fiha huk'mu al-lahi thumma yatawallawna min ba'di dhalika wama ulaika bil-mu'minina
713: inna anzalna al-tawrata fiha hudan wanurun yahkumu biha al-nabiyuna alladhina aslamu lilladhina hadu war-rabaniyuna wal-ahbaru bima us'tuh'fizu min kitabi al-lahi wakanu alayhi shuhadaa fala takhshawu al-nasa wa-ikh'shawni wala tashtaru biayati thamanan qalilan waman lam yahkum bima anzala al-lahu fa-ulaika humu al-kafiruna
714: wakatabna alayhim fiha anna al-nafsa bil-nafsi wal-'ayna bil-'ayni wal-anfa bil-anfi wal-udhuna bil-udhuni wal-sina bil-sini wal-juruha qisasun faman tasaddaqa bihi fahuwa kaffaratun lahu waman lam yahkum bima anzala al-lahu fa-ulaika humu al-zalimuna
715: waqaffayna ala atharihim bi'isa ib'ni maryama musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina al-tawrati waataynahu al-injila fihi hudan wanurun wamusaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina al-tawrati wahudan wamaw'izatan lil'muttaqina
716: walyahkum ahlu al-injili bima anzala al-lahu fihi waman lam yahkum bima anzala al-lahu fa-ulaika humu al-fasiquna
717: wa-anzalna ilayka al-kitaba bil-haqi musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi mina al-kitabi wamuhayminan alayhi fa-uh'kum baynahum bima anzala al-lahu wala tattabi' ahwaahum amma jaaka mina al-haqi likullin ja'alna minkum shir'atan wamin'hajan walaw shaa al-lahu laja'alakum ummatan wahidatan walakin liyabluwakum fi ma atakum fa-is'tabiqu al-khayrati ila al-lahi marji'ukum jami'an fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
718: wa-ani uh'kum baynahum bima anzala al-lahu wala tattabi' ahwaahum wa-ih'dharhum an yaftinuka an ba'di ma anzala al-lahu ilayka fa-in tawallaw fa-i'lam annama yuridu al-lahu an yusibahum biba'di dhunubihim wa-inna kathiran mina al-nasi lafasiquna
719: afahuk'ma al-jahiliyati yabghuna waman ahsanu mina al-lahi huk'man liqawmin yuqinuna
720: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu al-yahuda wal-nasara awliyaa ba'duhum awliyau ba'din waman yatawallahum minkum fa-innahu min'hum inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
721: fatara alladhina fi qulubihim maradun yusari'una fihim yaquluna nakhsha an tusibana dairatun fa'asa al-lahu an yatiya bil-fathi aw amrin min indihi fayus'bihu ala ma asarru fi anfusihim nadimina
722: wayaqulu alladhina amanu ahaulai alladhina aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim innahum lama'akum habitat a'maluhum fa-asbahu khasirina
723: yaayyuha alladhina amanu man yartadda minkum an dinihi fasawfa yati al-lahu biqawmin yuhibbuhum wayuhibbunahu adhillatin ala al-mu'minina a'izzatin ala al-kafirina yujahiduna fi sabili al-lahi wala yakhafuna lawmata laimin dhalika fadlu al-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu wasi'un alimun
724: innama waliyyukumu al-lahu warasuluhu wa-alladhina amanu alladhina yuqimuna al-salata wayu'tuna al-zakata wahum raki'una
725: waman yatawalla al-laha warasulahu wa-alladhina amanu fa-inna hiz'ba al-lahi humu al-ghalibuna
726: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu alladhina ittakhadhu dinakum huzuwan wala'iban mina alladhina utu al-kitaba min qablikum wal-kufara awliyaa wa-ittaqu al-laha in kuntum mu'minina
727: wa-idha nadaytum ila al-salati ittakhadhuha huzuwan wala'iban dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la ya'qiluna
728: qul yaahla al-kitabi hal tanqimuna minna illa an amanna bil-lahi wama unzila ilayna wama unzila min qablu wa-anna aktharakum fasiquna
729: qul hal unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhalika mathubatan inda al-lahi man la'anahu al-lahu waghadiba alayhi waja'ala min'humu al-qiradata wal-khanazira wa'abada al-taghuta ulaika sharrun makanan wa-adallu an sawai al-sabili
730: wa-idha jaukum qalu amanna waqad dakhalu bil-kuf'ri wahum qad kharaju bihi wal-lahu a'lamu bima kanu yaktumuna
731: watara kathiran min'hum yusari'una fi al-ith'mi wal-'ud'wani wa-aklihimu al-suh'ta labi'sa ma kanu ya'maluna
732: lawla yanhahumu ar-rabaniyuna wal-ahbaru an qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu al-suh'ta labi'sa ma kanu yasna'una
733: waqalati al-yahudu yadu al-lahi maghlulatun ghullat aydihim walu'inu bima qalu bal yadahu mabsutatani yunfiqu kayfa yashau walayazidanna kathiran min'hum ma unzila ilayka min rabbika tugh'yanan wakuf'ran wa-alqayna baynahumu al-'adawata wal-baghdaa ila yawmi al-qiyamati kullama awqadu naran lil'harbi atfa-aha al-lahu wayas'awna fi al-ardi fasadan wal-lahu la yuhibbu al-muf'sidina
734: walaw anna ahla al-kitabi amanu wa-ittaqaw lakaffarna anhum sayyiatihim wala-adkhalnahum jannati al-na'imi
735: walaw annahum aqamu al-tawrata wal-injila wama unzila ilayhim min rabbihim la-akalu min fawqihim wamin tahti arjulihim min'hum ummatun muq'tasidatun wakathirun min'hum saa ma ya'maluna
736: yaayyuha ar-rasulu balligh ma unzila ilayka min rabbika wa-in lam taf 'al fama ballaghta risalatahu wal-lahu ya'simuka mina al-nasi inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-kafirina
737: qul yaahla al-kitabi lastum ala shayin hatta tuqimu al-tawrata wal-injila wama unzila ilaykum min rabbikum walayazidanna kathiran min'hum ma unzila ilayka min rabbika tugh'yanan wakuf'ran fala tasa ala al-qawmi al-kafirina
738: inna alladhina amanu wa-alladhina hadu wal-sabiuna wal-nasara man amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa'amila salihan fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
739: laqad akhadhna mithaqa bani is'raila wa-arsalna ilayhim rusulan kullama jaahum rasulun bima la tahwa anfusuhum fariqan kadhabu wafariqan yaqtuluna
740: wahasibu alla takuna fit'natun fa'amu wasammu thumma taba al-lahu alayhim thumma amu wasammu kathirun min'hum wal-lahu basirun bima ya'maluna
741: laqad kafara alladhina qalu inna al-laha huwa al-masihu ub'nu maryama waqala al-masihu yabani is'raila u'budu al-laha rabbi warabbakum innahu man yush'rik bil-lahi faqad harrama al-lahu alayhi al-janata wamawahu al-naru wama lilzzalimina min ansarin
742: laqad kafara alladhina qalu inna al-laha thalithu thalathatin wama min ilahin illa ilahun wahidun wa-in lam yantahu amma yaquluna layamassanna alladhina kafaru min'hum adhabun alimun
743: afala yatubuna ila al-lahi wayastaghfirunahu wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
744: ma al-masihu ub'nu maryama illa rasulun qad khalat min qablihi ar-rusulu wa-ummuhu siddiqatun kana yakulani al-ta'ama unzur kayfa nubayyinu lahumu al-ayati thumma unzur anna yu'fakuna
745: qul ata'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yamliku lakum darran wala naf 'an wal-lahu huwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
746: qul yaahla al-kitabi la taghlu fi dinikum ghayra al-haqi wala tattabi'u ahwaa qawmin qad dallu min qablu wa-adallu kathiran wadallu an sawai al-sabili
747: lu'ina alladhina kafaru min bani is'raila ala lisani dawuda wa'isa ib'ni maryama dhalika bima asaw wakanu ya'taduna
748: kanu la yatanahawna an munkarin fa'aluhu labi'sa ma kanu yaf 'aluna
749: tara kathiran min'hum yatawallawna alladhina kafaru labi'sa ma qaddamat lahum anfusuhum an sakhita al-lahu alayhim wafi al-'adhabi hum khaliduna
750: walaw kanu yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-nabiyi wama unzila ilayhi ma ittakhadhuhum awliyaa walakinna kathiran min'hum fasiquna
751: latajidanna ashadda al-nasi adawatan lilladhina amanu al-yahuda wa-alladhina ashraku walatajidanna aqrabahum mawaddatan lilladhina amanu alladhina qalu inna nasara dhalika bi-anna min'hum qissisina waruh'banan wa-annahum la yastakbiruna
752: wa-idha sami'u ma unzila ila ar-rasuli tara a'yunahum tafidu mina al-dam'i mimma arafu mina al-haqi yaquluna rabbana amanna fa-uk'tub'na ma'a al-shahidina
753: wama lana la nu'minu bil-lahi wama jaana mina al-haqi wanatma'u an yud'khilana rabbuna ma'a al-qawmi al-salihina
754: fa-athabahumu al-lahu bima qalu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wadhalika jazau al-muh'sinina
755: wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu al-jahimi
756: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tuharrimu tayyibati ma ahalla al-lahu lakum wala ta'tadu inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-mu'tadina
757: wakulu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu halalan tayyiban wa-ittaqu al-laha alladhi antum bihi mu'minuna
758: la yuakhidhukumu al-lahu bil-laghwi fi aymanikum walakin yuakhidhukum bima aqqadttumu al-aymana fakaffaratuhu it'amu asharati masakina min awsati ma tut'imuna ahlikum aw kis'watuhum aw tahriru raqabatin faman lam yajid fasiyamu thalathati ayyamin dhalika kaffaratu aymanikum idha halaftum wa-ih'fazu aymanakum kadhalika yubayyinu al-lahu lakum ayatihi la'allakum tashkuruna
759: yaayyuha alladhina amanu innama al-khamru wal-maysiru wal-ansabu wal-azlamu rij'sun min amali al-shaytani fa-ij'tanibuhu la'allakum tuf'lihuna
760: innama yuridu al-shaytanu an yuqi'a baynakumu al-'adawata wal-baghdaa fi al-khamri wal-maysiri wayasuddakum an dhik'ri al-lahi wa'ani al-salati fahal antum muntahuna
761: wa-ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula wa-ih'dharu fa-in tawallaytum fa-i'lamu annama ala rasulina al-balaghu al-mubinu
762: laysa ala alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati junahun fima ta'imu idha ma ittaqaw waamanu wa'amilu al-salihati thumma ittaqaw waamanu thumma ittaqaw wa-ahsanu wal-lahu yuhibbu al-muh'sinina
763: yaayyuha alladhina amanu layabluwannakumu al-lahu bishayin mina al-saydi tanaluhu aydikum warimahukum liya'lama al-lahu man yakhafuhu bil-ghaybi famani i'tada ba'da dhalika falahu adhabun alimun
764: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la taqtulu al-sayda wa-antum hurumun waman qatalahu minkum muta'ammidan fajazaon mith'lu ma qatala mina al-na'ami yahkumu bihi dhawa adlin minkum hadyan baligha al-ka'bati aw kaffaratun ta'amu masakina aw adlu dhalika siyaman liyadhuqa wabala amrihi afa al-lahu amma salafa waman ada fayantaqimu al-lahu min'hu wal-lahu azizun dhu intiqamin
765: uhilla lakum saydu al-bahri wata'amuhu mata'an lakum walilssayyarati wahurrima alaykum saydu al-bari ma dum'tum huruman wa-ittaqu al-laha alladhi ilayhi tuh'sharuna
766: ja'ala al-lahu al-ka'bata al-bayta al-harama qiyaman lilnnasi wal-shahra al-harama wal-hadya wal-qalaida dhalika lita'lamu anna al-laha ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-anna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
767: i'lamu anna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi wa-anna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
768: ma ala ar-rasuli illa al-balaghu wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tub'duna wama taktumuna
769: qul la yastawi al-khabithu wal-tayibu walaw a'jabaka kathratu al-khabithi fa-ittaqu al-laha yauli al-albabi la'allakum tuf'lihuna
770: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tasalu an ashyaa in tub'da lakum tasu'kum wa-in tasalu anha hina yunazzalu al-qur'anu tub'da lakum afa al-lahu anha wal-lahu ghafurun halimun
771: qad sa-alaha qawmun min qablikum thumma asbahu biha kafirina
772: ma ja'ala al-lahu min bahiratin wala saibatin wala wasilatin wala hamin walakinna alladhina kafaru yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba wa-aktharuhum la ya'qiluna
773: wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw ila ma anzala al-lahu wa-ila ar-rasuli qalu hasbuna ma wajadna alayhi abaana awalaw kana abauhum la ya'lamuna shayan wala yahtaduna
774: yaayyuha alladhina amanu alaykum anfusakum la yadurrukum man dalla idha ih'tadaytum ila al-lahi marji'ukum jami'an fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
775: yaayyuha alladhina amanu shahadatu baynikum idha hadara ahadakumu al-mawtu hina al-wasiyati ith'nani dhawa adlin minkum aw akharani min ghayrikum in antum darabtum fi al-ardi fa-asabatkum musibatu al-mawti tahbisunahuma min ba'di al-salati fayuq'simani bil-lahi ini ir'tabtum la nashtari bihi thamanan walaw kana dha qur'ba wala naktumu shahadata al-lahi inna idhan lamina al-athimina
776: fa-in uthira ala annahuma is'tahaqqa ith'man faakharani yaqumani maqamahuma mina alladhina is'tahaqqa alayhimu al-awlayani fayuq'simani bil-lahi lashahadatuna ahaqqu min shahadatihima wama i'tadayna inna idhan lamina al-zalimina
777: dhalika adna an yatu bil-shahadati ala wajhiha aw yakhafu an turadda aymanun ba'da aymanihim wa-ittaqu al-laha wa-is'ma'u wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
778: yawma yajma'u al-lahu ar-rusula fayaqulu madha ujib'tum qalu la il'ma lana innaka anta allamu al-ghuyubi
779: idh qala al-lahu ya'isa ib'na maryama udh'kur ni'mati alayka wa'ala walidatika idh ayyadttuka biruhi al-qudusi tukallimu al-nasa fi al-mahdi wakahlan wa-idh allamtuka al-kitaba wal-hik'mata wal-tawrata wal-injila wa-idh takhluqu mina al-tini kahayati al-tayri bi-idh'ni fatanfukhu fiha fatakunu tayran bi-idh'ni watub'ri-u al-akmaha wal-abrasa bi-idh'ni wa-idh tukh'riju al-mawta bi-idh'ni wa-idh kafaftu bani is'raila anka idh ji'tahum bil-bayinati faqala alladhina kafaru min'hum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
780: wa-idh awhaytu ila al-hawariyina an aminu bi wabirasuli qalu amanna wa-ish'had bi-annana mus'limuna
781: idh qala al-hawariyuna ya'isa ib'na maryama hal yastati'u rabbuka an yunazzila alayna maidatan mina al-samai qala ittaqu al-laha in kuntum mu'minina
782: qalu nuridu an nakula min'ha watatma-inna qulubuna wana'lama an qad sadaqtana wanakuna alayha mina al-shahidina
783: qala isa ub'nu maryama al-lahuma rabbana anzil alayna maidatan mina al-samai takunu lana idan li-awwalina waakhirina waayatan minka wa-ur'zuq'na wa-anta khayru ar-raziqina
784: qala al-lahu inni munazziluha alaykum faman yakfur ba'du minkum fa-inni u'adhibuhu adhaban la u'adhibuhu ahadan mina al-'alamina
785: wa-idh qala al-lahu ya'isa ib'na maryama a-anta qul'ta lilnnasi ittakhidhuni wa-ummiya ilahayni min duni al-lahi qala sub'hanaka ma yakunu li an aqula ma laysa li bihaqqin in kuntu qul'tuhu faqad alim'tahu ta'lamu ma fi nafsi wala a'lamu ma fi nafsika innaka anta allamu al-ghuyubi
786: ma qul'tu lahum illa ma amartani bihi ani u'budu al-laha rabbi warabbakum wakuntu alayhim shahidan ma dum'tu fihim falamma tawaffaytani kunta anta ar-raqiba alayhim wa-anta ala kulli shayin shahidun
787: in tu'adhib'hum fa-innahum ibaduka wa-in taghfir lahum fa-innaka anta al-'azizu al-hakimu
788: qala al-lahu hadha yawmu yanfa'u al-sadiqina sid'quhum lahum jannatun tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan radiya al-lahu anhum waradu anhu dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
789: lillahi mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi wama fihinna wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
790: al-hamdu lillahi alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda waja'ala al-zulumati wal-nura thumma alladhina kafaru birabbihim ya'diluna
791: huwa alladhi khalaqakum min tinin thumma qada ajalan wa-ajalun musamman indahu thumma antum tamtaruna
792: wahuwa al-lahu fi al-samawati wafi al-ardi ya'lamu sirrakum wajahrakum waya'lamu ma taksibuna
793: wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu anha mu'ridina
794: faqad kadhabu bil-haqi lamma jaahum fasawfa yatihim anbau ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
795: alam yaraw kam ahlakna min qablihim min qarnin makkannahum fi al-ardi ma lam numakkin lakum wa-arsalna al-samaa alayhim mid'raran waja'alna al-anhara tajri min tahtihim fa-ahlaknahum bidhunubihim wa-anshana min ba'dihim qarnan akharina
796: walaw nazzalna alayka kitaban fi qir'tasin falamasuhu bi-aydihim laqala alladhina kafaru in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
797: waqalu lawla unzila alayhi malakun walaw anzalna malakan laqudiya al-amru thumma la yunzaruna
798: walaw ja'alnahu malakan laja'alnahu rajulan walalabasna alayhim ma yalbisuna
799: walaqadi us'tuh'zi-a birusulin min qablika fahaqa bi-alladhina sakhiru min'hum ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
800: qul siru fi al-ardi thumma unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-mukadhibina
801: qul liman ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi qul lillahi kataba ala nafsihi ar-rahmata layajma'annakum ila yawmi al-qiyamati la rayba fihi alladhina khasiru anfusahum fahum la yu'minuna
802: walahu ma sakana fi al-layli wal-nahari wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
803: qul aghayra al-lahi attakhidhu waliyyan fatiri al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa yut'imu wala yut'amu qul inni umir'tu an akuna awwala man aslama wala takunanna mina al-mush'rikina
804: qul inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
805: man yus'raf anhu yawma-idhin faqad rahimahu wadhalika al-fawzu al-mubinu
806: wa-in yamsaska al-lahu bidurrin fala kashifa lahu illa huwa wa-in yamsaska bikhayrin fahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
807: wahuwa al-qahiru fawqa ibadihi wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru
808: qul ayyu shayin akbaru shahadatan quli al-lahu shahidun bayni wabaynakum wauhiya ilayya hadha al-qur'anu li-undhirakum bihi waman balagha a-innakum latashhaduna anna ma'a al-lahi alihatan ukh'ra qul la ashhadu qul innama huwa ilahun wahidun wa-innani barion mimma tush'rikuna
809: alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba ya'rifunahu kama ya'rifuna abnaahumu alladhina khasiru anfusahum fahum la yu'minuna
810: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi innahu la yuf'lihu al-zalimuna
811: wayawma nahshuruhum jami'an thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku ayna shurakaukumu alladhina kuntum taz'umuna
812: thumma lam takun fit'natuhum illa an qalu wal-lahi rabbina ma kunna mush'rikina
813: unzur kayfa kadhabu ala anfusihim wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
814: wamin'hum man yastami'u ilayka waja'alna ala qulubihim akinnatan an yafqahuhu wafi adhanihim waqran wa-in yaraw kulla ayatin la yu'minu biha hatta idha jauka yujadilunaka yaqulu alladhina kafaru in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
815: wahum yanhawna anhu wayanawna anhu wa-in yuh'likuna illa anfusahum wama yash'uruna
816: walaw tara idh wuqifu ala al-nari faqalu yalaytana nuraddu wala nukadhiba biayati rabbina wanakuna mina al-mu'minina
817: bal bada lahum ma kanu yukh'funa min qablu walaw ruddu la'adu lima nuhu anhu wa-innahum lakadhibuna
818: waqalu in hiya illa hayatuna al-dun'ya wama nahnu bimab'uthina
819: walaw tara idh wuqifu ala rabbihim qala alaysa hadha bil-haqi qalu bala warabbina qala fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
820: qad khasira alladhina kadhabu biliqai al-lahi hatta idha jaathumu al-sa'atu baghtatan qalu yahasratana ala ma farratna fiha wahum yahmiluna awzarahum ala zuhurihim ala saa ma yaziruna
821: wama al-hayatu al-dun'ya illa la'ibun walahwun walalddaru al-akhiratu khayrun lilladhina yattaquna afala ta'qiluna
822: qad na'lamu innahu layahzunuka alladhi yaquluna fa-innahum la yukadhibunaka walakinna al-zalimina biayati al-lahi yajhaduna
823: walaqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika fasabaru ala ma kudhibu waudhu hatta atahum nasruna wala mubaddila likalimati al-lahi walaqad jaaka min naba-i al-mur'salina
824: wa-in kana kabura alayka i'raduhum fa-ini is'tata'ta an tabtaghiya nafaqan fi al-ardi aw sullaman fi al-samai fatatiyahum biayatin walaw shaa al-lahu lajama'ahum ala al-huda fala takunanna mina al-jahilina
825: innama yastajibu alladhina yasma'una wal-mawta yab'athuhumu al-lahu thumma ilayhi yur'ja'una
826: waqalu lawla nuzzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi qul inna al-laha qadirun ala an yunazzila ayatan walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
827: wama min dabbatin fi al-ardi wala tairin yatiru bijanahayhi illa umamun amthalukum ma farratna fi al-kitabi min shayin thumma ila rabbihim yuh'sharuna
828: wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina summun wabuk'mun fi al-zulumati man yasha-i al-lahu yud'lil'hu waman yasha yaj'alhu ala siratin mus'taqimin
829: qul ara-aytakum in atakum adhabu al-lahi aw atatkumu al-sa'atu aghayra al-lahi tad'una in kuntum sadiqina
830: bal iyyahu tad'una fayakshifu ma tad'una ilayhi in shaa watansawna ma tush'rikuna
831: walaqad arsalna ila umamin min qablika fa-akhadhnahum bil-basai wal-darai la'allahum yatadarra'una
832: falawla idh jaahum basuna tadarra'u walakin qasat qulubuhum wazayyana lahumu al-shaytanu ma kanu ya'maluna
833: falamma nasu ma dhukkiru bihi fatahna alayhim abwaba kulli shayin hatta idha farihu bima utu akhadhnahum baghtatan fa-idha hum mub'lisuna
834: faquti'a dabiru al-qawmi alladhina zalamu wal-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
835: qul ara-aytum in akhadha al-lahu sam'akum wa-absarakum wakhatama ala qulubikum man ilahun ghayru al-lahi yatikum bihi unzur kayfa nusarrifu al-ayati thumma hum yasdifuna
836: qul ara-aytakum in atakum adhabu al-lahi baghtatan aw jahratan hal yuh'laku illa al-qawmu al-zalimuna
837: wama nur'silu al-mur'salina illa mubashirina wamundhirina faman amana wa-aslaha fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
838: wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina yamassuhumu al-'adhabu bima kanu yafsuquna
839: qul la aqulu lakum indi khazainu al-lahi wala a'lamu al-ghayba wala aqulu lakum inni malakun in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya qul hal yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru afala tatafakkaruna
840: wa-andhir bihi alladhina yakhafuna an yuh'sharu ila rabbihim laysa lahum min dunihi waliyyun wala shafi'un la'allahum yattaquna
841: wala tatrudi alladhina yad'una rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-'ashiyi yuriduna wajhahu ma alayka min hisabihim min shayin wama min hisabika alayhim min shayin fatatrudahum fatakuna mina al-zalimina
842: wakadhalika fatanna ba'dahum biba'din liyaqulu ahaulai manna al-lahu alayhim min baynina alaysa al-lahu bi-a'lama bil-shakirina
843: wa-idha jaaka alladhina yu'minuna biayatina faqul salamun alaykum kataba rabbukum ala nafsihi ar-rahmata annahu man amila minkum suan bijahalatin thumma taba min ba'dihi wa-aslaha fa-annahu ghafurun rahimun
844: wakadhalika nufassilu al-ayati walitastabina sabilu al-muj'rimina
845: qul inni nuhitu an a'buda alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi qul la attabi'u ahwaakum qad dalaltu idhan wama ana mina al-muh'tadina
846: qul inni ala bayyinatin min rabbi wakadhabtum bihi ma indi ma tasta'jiluna bihi ini al-huk'mu illa lillahi yaqussu al-haqa wahuwa khayru al-fasilina
847: qul law anna indi ma tasta'jiluna bihi laqudiya al-amru bayni wabaynakum wal-lahu a'lamu bil-zalimina
848: wa'indahu mafatihu al-ghaybi la ya'lamuha illa huwa waya'lamu ma fi al-bari wal-bahri wama tasqutu min waraqatin illa ya'lamuha wala habbatin fi zulumati al-ardi wala ratbin wala yabisin illa fi kitabin mubinin
849: wahuwa alladhi yatawaffakum bi-al-layli waya'lamu ma jarahtum bil-nahari thumma yab'athukum fihi liyuq'da ajalun musamman thumma ilayhi marji'ukum thumma yunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
850: wahuwa al-qahiru fawqa ibadihi wayur'silu alaykum hafazatan hatta idha jaa ahadakumu al-mawtu tawaffathu rusuluna wahum la yufarrituna
851: thumma ruddu ila al-lahi mawlahumu al-haqi ala lahu al-huk'mu wahuwa asra'u al-hasibina
852: qul man yunajjikum min zulumati al-bari wal-bahri tad'unahu tadarru'an wakhuf'yatan la-in anjana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina al-shakirina
853: quli al-lahu yunajjikum min'ha wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikuna
854: qul huwa al-qadiru ala an yab'atha alaykum adhaban min fawqikum aw min tahti arjulikum aw yalbisakum shiya'an wayudhiqa ba'dakum basa ba'din unzur kayfa nusarrifu al-ayati la'allahum yafqahuna
855: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-haqu qul lastu alaykum biwakilin
857: wa-idha ra-ayta alladhina yakhuduna fi ayatina fa-a'rid anhum hatta yakhudu fi hadithin ghayrihi wa-imma yunsiyannaka al-shaytanu fala taq'ud ba'da al-dhik'ra ma'a al-qawmi al-zalimina
858: wama ala alladhina yattaquna min hisabihim min shayin walakin dhik'ra la'allahum yattaquna
859: wadhari alladhina ittakhadhu dinahum la'iban walahwan wagharrathumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya wadhakkir bihi an tub'sala nafsun bima kasabat laysa laha min duni al-lahi waliyyun wala shafi'un wa-in ta'dil kulla adlin la yu'khadh min'ha ulaika alladhina ub'silu bima kasabu lahum sharabun min hamimin wa'adhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna
860: qul anad'u min duni al-lahi ma la yanfa'una wala yadurruna wanuraddu ala a'qabina ba'da idh hadana al-lahu ka-alladhi is'tahwathu al-shayatinu fi al-ardi hayrana lahu ashabun yad'unahu ila al-huda i'tina qul inna huda al-lahi huwa al-huda wa-umir'na linus'lima lirabbi al-'alamina
861: wa-an aqimu al-salata wa-ittaquhu wahuwa alladhi ilayhi tuh'sharuna
862: wahuwa alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi wayawma yaqulu kun fayakunu qawluhu al-haqu walahu al-mul'ku yawma yunfakhu fi al-suri alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru
863: wa-idh qala ib'rahimu li-abihi azara atattakhidhu asnaman alihatan inni araka waqawmaka fi dalalin mubinin
864: wakadhalika nuri ib'rahima malakuta al-samawati wal-ardi waliyakuna mina al-muqinina
865: falamma janna alayhi al-laylu raa kawkaban qala hadha rabbi falamma afala qala la uhibbu al-afilina
866: falamma raa al-qamara bazighan qala hadha rabbi falamma afala qala la-in lam yahdini rabbi la-akunanna mina al-qawmi al-dalina
867: falamma raa al-shamsa bazighatan qala hadha rabbi hadha akbaru falamma afalat qala yaqawmi inni barion mimma tush'rikuna
868: inni wajjahtu wajhiya lilladhi fatara al-samawati wal-arda hanifan wama ana mina al-mush'rikina
869: wahajjahu qawmuhu qala atuhajjunni fi al-lahi waqad hadani wala akhafu ma tush'rikuna bihi illa an yashaa rabbi shayan wasi'a rabbi kulla shayin il'man afala tatadhakkaruna
870: wakayfa akhafu ma ashraktum wala takhafuna annakum ashraktum bil-lahi ma lam yunazzil bihi alaykum sul'tanan fa-ayyu al-fariqayni ahaqqu bil-amni in kuntum ta'lamuna
871: alladhina amanu walam yalbisu imanahum bizul'min ulaika lahumu al-amnu wahum muh'taduna
872: watil'ka hujjatuna ataynaha ib'rahima ala qawmihi narfa'u darajatin man nashau inna rabbaka hakimun alimun
873: wawahabna lahu is'haqa waya'quba kullan hadayna wanuhan hadayna min qablu wamin dhurriyyatihi dawuda wasulaymana wa-ayyuba wayusufa wamusa waharuna wakadhalika najzi al-muh'sinina
874: wazakariyya wayahya wa'isa wa-il'yasa kullun mina al-salihina
875: wa-is'ma'ila wal-yasa'a wayunusa walutan wakullan faddalna ala al-'alamina
876: wamin abaihim wadhurriyyatihim wa-ikh'wanihim wa-ij'tabaynahum wahadaynahum ila siratin mus'taqimin
877: dhalika huda al-lahi yahdi bihi man yashau min ibadihi walaw ashraku lahabita anhum ma kanu ya'maluna
878: ulaika alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba wal-huk'ma wal-nubuwata fa-in yakfur biha haulai faqad wakkalna biha qawman laysu biha bikafirina
879: ulaika alladhina hada al-lahu fabihudahumu iq'tadih qul la asalukum alayhi ajran in huwa illa dhik'ra lil'alamina
880: wama qadaru al-laha haqqa qadrihi idh qalu ma anzala al-lahu ala basharin min shayin qul man anzala al-kitaba alladhi jaa bihi musa nuran wahudan lilnnasi taj'alunahu qaratisa tub'dunaha watukh'funa kathiran wa'ullim'tum ma lam ta'lamu antum wala abaukum quli al-lahu thumma dharhum fi khawdihim yal'abuna
881: wahadha kitabun anzalnahu mubarakun musaddiqu alladhi bayna yadayhi walitundhira umma al-qura waman hawlaha wa-alladhina yu'minuna bil-akhirati yu'minuna bihi wahum ala salatihim yuhafizuna
882: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw qala uhiya ilayya walam yuha ilayhi shayon waman qala sa-unzilu mith'la ma anzala al-lahu walaw tara idhi al-zalimuna fi ghamarati al-mawti wal-malaikatu basitu aydihim akhriju anfusakumu al-yawma tuj'zawna adhaba al-huni bima kuntum taquluna ala al-lahi ghayra al-haqi wakuntum an ayatihi tastakbiruna
883: walaqad ji'tumuna furada kama khalaqnakum awwala marratin wataraktum ma khawwalnakum waraa zuhurikum wama nara ma'akum shufa'aakumu alladhina za'amtum annahum fikum shurakau laqad taqatta'a baynakum wadalla ankum ma kuntum taz'umuna
884: inna al-laha faliqu al-habi wal-nawa yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wamukh'riju al-mayiti mina al-hayi dhalikumu al-lahu fa-anna tu'fakuna
885: faliqu al-is'bahi waja'ala al-layla sakanan wal-shamsa wal-qamara hus'banan dhalika taqdiru al-'azizi al-'alimi
886: wahuwa alladhi ja'ala lakumu al-nujuma litahtadu biha fi zulumati al-bari wal-bahri qad fassalna al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
887: wahuwa alladhi ansha-akum min nafsin wahidatin famus'taqarrun wamus'tawda'un qad fassalna al-ayati liqawmin yafqahuna
888: wahuwa alladhi anzala mina al-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi nabata kulli shayin fa-akhrajna min'hu khadiran nukh'riju min'hu habban mutarakiban wamina al-nakhli min tal'iha qin'wanun daniyatun wajannatin min a'nabin wal-zaytuna war-rumana mush'tabihan waghayra mutashabihin unzuru ila thamarihi idha athmara wayan'ihi inna fi dhalikum laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
889: waja'alu lillahi shurakaa al-jina wakhalaqahum wakharaqu lahu banina wabanatin bighayri il'min sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yasifuna
890: badi'u al-samawati wal-ardi anna yakunu lahu waladun walam takun lahu sahibatun wakhalaqa kulla shayin wahuwa bikulli shayin alimun
891: dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum la ilaha illa huwa khaliqu kulli shayin fa-u'buduhu wahuwa ala kulli shayin wakilun
892: la tud'rikuhu al-absaru wahuwa yud'riku al-absara wahuwa al-latifu al-khabiru
893: qad jaakum basairu min rabbikum faman absara falinafsihi waman amiya fa'alayha wama ana alaykum bihafizin
894: wakadhalika nusarrifu al-ayati waliyaqulu darasta walinubayyinahu liqawmin ya'lamuna
895: ittabi' ma uhiya ilayka min rabbika la ilaha illa huwa wa-a'rid ani al-mush'rikina
896: walaw shaa al-lahu ma ashraku wama ja'alnaka alayhim hafizan wama anta alayhim biwakilin
897: wala tasubbu alladhina yad'una min duni al-lahi fayasubbu al-laha adwan bighayri il'min kadhalika zayyanna likulli ummatin amalahum thumma ila rabbihim marji'uhum fayunabbi-uhum bima kanu ya'maluna
898: wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in jaathum ayatun layu'minunna biha qul innama al-ayatu inda al-lahi wama yush'irukum annaha idha jaat la yu'minuna
899: wanuqallibu afidatahum wa-absarahum kama lam yu'minu bihi awwala marratin wanadharuhum fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
900: walaw annana nazzalna ilayhimu al-malaikata wakallamahumu al-mawta wahasharna alayhim kulla shayin qubulan ma kanu liyu'minu illa an yashaa al-lahu walakinna aktharahum yajhaluna
901: wakadhalika ja'alna likulli nabiyyin aduwwan shayatina al-insi wal-jini yuhi ba'duhum ila ba'din zukh'rufa al-qawli ghururan walaw shaa rabbuka ma fa'aluhu fadharhum wama yaftaruna
902: walitasgha ilayhi afidatu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati waliyardawhu waliyaqtarifu ma hum muq'tarifuna
903: afaghayra al-lahi abtaghi hakaman wahuwa alladhi anzala ilaykumu al-kitaba mufassalan wa-alladhina ataynahumu al-kitaba ya'lamuna annahu munazzalun min rabbika bil-haqi fala takunanna mina al-mum'tarina
904: watammat kalimatu rabbika sid'qan wa'adlan la mubaddila likalimatihi wahuwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
905: wa-in tuti' akthara man fi al-ardi yudilluka an sabili al-lahi in yattabi'una illa al-zana wa-in hum illa yakhrusuna
906: inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu man yadillu an sabilihi wahuwa a'lamu bil-muh'tadina
907: fakulu mimma dhukira us'mu al-lahi alayhi in kuntum biayatihi mu'minina
908: wama lakum alla takulu mimma dhukira us'mu al-lahi alayhi waqad fassala lakum ma harrama alaykum illa ma ud'turir'tum ilayhi wa-inna kathiran layudilluna bi-ahwaihim bighayri il'min inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu bil-mu'tadina
909: wadharu zahira al-ith'mi wabatinahu inna alladhina yaksibuna al-ith'ma sayuj'zawna bima kanu yaqtarifuna
910: wala takulu mimma lam yudh'kari us'mu al-lahi alayhi wa-innahu lafis'qun wa-inna al-shayatina layuhuna ila awliyaihim liyujadilukum wa-in ata'tumuhum innakum lamush'rikuna
911: awaman kana maytan fa-ahyaynahu waja'alna lahu nuran yamshi bihi fi al-nasi kaman mathaluhu fi al-zulumati laysa bikharijin min'ha kadhalika zuyyina lil'kafirina ma kanu ya'maluna
912: wakadhalika ja'alna fi kulli qaryatin akabira muj'rimiha liyamkuru fiha wama yamkuruna illa bi-anfusihim wama yash'uruna
913: wa-idha jaathum ayatun qalu lan nu'mina hatta nu'ta mith'la ma utiya rusulu al-lahi al-lahu a'lamu haythu yaj'alu risalatahu sayusibu alladhina ajramu sagharun inda al-lahi wa'adhabun shadidun bima kanu yamkuruna
914: faman yuridi al-lahu an yahdiyahu yashrah sadrahu lil'is'lami waman yurid an yudillahu yaj'al sadrahu dayyiqan harajan ka-annama yassa'adu fi al-samai kadhalika yaj'alu al-lahu ar-rij'sa ala alladhina la yu'minuna
915: wahadha siratu rabbika mus'taqiman qad fassalna al-ayati liqawmin yadhakkaruna
916: lahum daru al-salami inda rabbihim wahuwa waliyyuhum bima kanu ya'maluna
917: wayawma yahshuruhum jami'an yama'shara al-jini qadi is'takthartum mina al-insi waqala awliyauhum mina al-insi rabbana is'tamta'a ba'duna biba'din wabalaghna ajalana alladhi ajjalta lana qala al-naru mathwakum khalidina fiha illa ma shaa al-lahu inna rabbaka hakimun alimun
918: wakadhalika nuwalli ba'da al-zalimina ba'dan bima kanu yaksibuna
919: yama'shara al-jini wal-insi alam yatikum rusulun minkum yaqussuna alaykum ayati wayundhirunakum liqaa yawmikum hadha qalu shahid'na ala anfusina wagharrathumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya washahidu ala anfusihim annahum kanu kafirina
920: dhalika an lam yakun rabbuka muh'lika al-qura bizul'min wa-ahluha ghafiluna
921: walikullin darajatun mimma amilu wama rabbuka bighafilin amma ya'maluna
922: warabbuka al-ghaniyu dhu ar-rahmati in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayastakhlif min ba'dikum ma yashau kama ansha-akum min dhurriyyati qawmin akharina
923: inna ma tu'aduna laatin wama antum bimu'jizina
924: qul yaqawmi i'malu ala makanatikum inni amilun fasawfa ta'lamuna man takunu lahu aqibatu al-dari innahu la yuf'lihu al-zalimuna
925: waja'alu lillahi mimma dhara-a mina al-harthi wal-an'ami nasiban faqalu hadha lillahi biza'mihim wahadha lishurakaina fama kana lishurakaihim fala yasilu ila al-lahi wama kana lillahi fahuwa yasilu ila shurakaihim saa ma yahkumuna
926: wakadhalika zayyana likathirin mina al-mush'rikina qatla awladihim shurakauhum liyur'duhum waliyalbisu alayhim dinahum walaw shaa al-lahu ma fa'aluhu fadharhum wama yaftaruna
927: waqalu hadhihi an'amun waharthun hij'run la yat'amuha illa man nashau biza'mihim wa-an'amun hurrimat zuhuruha wa-an'amun la yadhkuruna is'ma al-lahi alayha if'tiraan alayhi sayajzihim bima kanu yaftaruna
928: waqalu ma fi butuni hadhihi al-an'ami khalisatun lidhukurina wamuharramun ala azwajina wa-in yakun maytatan fahum fihi shurakau sayajzihim wasfahum innahu hakimun alimun
929: qad khasira alladhina qatalu awladahum safahan bighayri il'min waharramu ma razaqahumu al-lahu if'tiraan ala al-lahi qad dallu wama kanu muh'tadina
930: wahuwa alladhi ansha-a jannatin ma'rushatin waghayra ma'rushatin wal-nakhla wal-zar'a mukh'talifan ukuluhu wal-zaytuna war-rumana mutashabihan waghayra mutashabihin kulu min thamarihi idha athmara waatu haqqahu yawma hasadihi wala tus'rifu innahu la yuhibbu al-mus'rifina
931: wamina al-an'ami hamulatan wafarshan kulu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu wala tattabi'u khutuwati al-shaytani innahu lakum aduwwun mubinun
932: thamaniyata azwajin mina al-dani ith'nayni wamina al-ma'zi ith'nayni qul aldhakarayni harrama ami al-unthayayni amma ish'tamalat alayhi arhamu al-unthayayni nabbiuni bi'il'min in kuntum sadiqina
933: wamina al-ibili ith'nayni wamina al-baqari ith'nayni qul aldhakarayni harrama ami al-unthayayni amma ish'tamalat alayhi arhamu al-unthayayni am kuntum shuhadaa idh wassakumu al-lahu bihadha faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban liyudilla al-nasa bighayri il'min inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
934: qul la ajidu fi ma uhiya ilayya muharraman ala ta'imin yat'amuhu illa an yakuna maytatan aw daman masfuhan aw lahma khinzirin fa-innahu rij'sun aw fis'qan uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi famani ud'turra ghayra baghin wala adin fa-inna rabbaka ghafurun rahimun
935: wa'ala alladhina hadu harramna kulla dhi zufurin wamina al-baqari wal-ghanami harramna alayhim shuhumahuma illa ma hamalat zuhuruhuma awi al-hawaya aw ma ikh'talata bi'azmin dhalika jazaynahum bibaghyihim wa-inna lasadiquna
936: fa-in kadhabuka faqul rabbukum dhu rahmatin wasi'atin wala yuraddu basuhu ani al-qawmi al-muj'rimina
937: sayaqulu alladhina ashraku law shaa al-lahu ma ashrakna wala abauna wala harramna min shayin kadhalika kadhaba alladhina min qablihim hatta dhaqu basana qul hal indakum min il'min fatukh'rijuhu lana in tattabi'una illa al-zana wa-in antum illa takhrusuna
938: qul falillahi al-hujatu al-balighatu falaw shaa lahadakum ajma'ina
939: qul halumma shuhadaakumu alladhina yashhaduna anna al-laha harrama hadha fa-in shahidu fala tashhad ma'ahum wala tattabi' ahwaa alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati wahum birabbihim ya'diluna
940: qul ta'alaw atlu ma harrama rabbukum alaykum alla tush'riku bihi shayan wabil-walidayni ih'sanan wala taqtulu awladakum min im'laqin nahnu narzuqukum wa-iyyahum wala taqrabu al-fawahisha ma zahara min'ha wama batana wala taqtulu al-nafsa allati harrama al-lahu illa bil-haqi dhalikum wassakum bihi la'allakum ta'qiluna
941: wala taqrabu mala al-yatimi illa bi-allati hiya ahsanu hatta yablugha ashuddahu wa-awfu al-kayla wal-mizana bil-qis'ti la nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha wa-idha qul'tum fa-i'dilu walaw kana dha qur'ba wabi'ahdi al-lahi awfu dhalikum wassakum bihi la'allakum tadhakkaruna
942: wa-anna hadha sirati mus'taqiman fa-ittabi'uhu wala tattabi'u al-subula fatafarraqa bikum an sabilihi dhalikum wassakum bihi la'allakum tattaquna
943: thumma atayna musa al-kitaba tamaman ala alladhi ahsana watafsilan likulli shayin wahudan warahmatan la'allahum biliqai rabbihim yu'minuna
944: wahadha kitabun anzalnahu mubarakun fa-ittabi'uhu wa-ittaqu la'allakum tur'hamuna
945: an taqulu innama unzila al-kitabu ala taifatayni min qablina wa-in kunna an dirasatihim laghafilina
946: aw taqulu law anna unzila alayna al-kitabu lakunna ahda min'hum faqad jaakum bayyinatun min rabbikum wahudan warahmatun faman azlamu mimman kadhaba biayati al-lahi wasadafa anha sanajzi alladhina yasdifuna an ayatina sua al-'adhabi bima kanu yasdifuna
947: hal yanzuruna illa an tatiyahumu al-malaikatu aw yatiya rabbuka aw yatiya ba'du ayati rabbika yawma yati ba'du ayati rabbika la yanfa'u nafsan imanuha lam takun amanat min qablu aw kasabat fi imaniha khayran quli intaziru inna muntaziruna
948: inna alladhina farraqu dinahum wakanu shiya'an lasta min'hum fi shayin innama amruhum ila al-lahi thumma yunabbi-uhum bima kanu yaf 'aluna
949: man jaa bil-hasanati falahu ashru amthaliha waman jaa bil-sayi-ati fala yuj'za illa mith'laha wahum la yuz'lamuna
950: qul innani hadani rabbi ila siratin mus'taqimin dinan qiyaman millata ib'rahima hanifan wama kana mina al-mush'rikina
951: qul inna salati wanusuki wamahyaya wamamati lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
952: la sharika lahu wabidhalika umir'tu wa-ana awwalu al-mus'limina
953: qul aghayra al-lahi abghi rabban wahuwa rabbu kulli shayin wala taksibu kullu nafsin illa alayha wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra thumma ila rabbikum marji'ukum fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
954: wahuwa alladhi ja'alakum khalaifa al-ardi warafa'a ba'dakum fawqa ba'din darajatin liyabluwakum fi ma atakum inna rabbaka sari'u al-'iqabi wa-innahu laghafurun rahimun
956: kitabun unzila ilayka fala yakun fi sadrika harajun min'hu litundhira bihi wadhik'ra lil'mu'minina
957: ittabi'u ma unzila ilaykum min rabbikum wala tattabi'u min dunihi awliyaa qalilan ma tadhakkaruna
958: wakam min qaryatin ahlaknaha fajaaha basuna bayatan aw hum qailuna
959: fama kana da'wahum idh jaahum basuna illa an qalu inna kunna zalimina
960: falanasalanna alladhina ur'sila ilayhim walanasalanna al-mur'salina
961: falanaqussanna alayhim bi'il'min wama kunna ghaibina
962: wal-waznu yawma-idhin al-haqu faman thaqulat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
963: waman khaffat mawazinuhu fa-ulaika alladhina khasiru anfusahum bima kanu biayatina yazlimuna
964: walaqad makkannakum fi al-ardi waja'alna lakum fiha ma'ayisha qalilan ma tashkuruna
965: walaqad khalaqnakum thumma sawwarnakum thumma qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa lam yakun mina al-sajidina
966: qala ma mana'aka alla tasjuda idh amartuka qala ana khayrun min'hu khalaqtani min narin wakhalaqtahu min tinin
967: qala fah'bit min'ha fama yakunu laka an tatakabbara fiha fa-ukh'ruj innaka mina al-saghirina
970: qala fabima aghwaytani la-aq'udanna lahum sirataka al-mus'taqima
971: thumma laatiyannahum min bayni aydihim wamin khalfihim wa'an aymanihim wa'an shamailihim wala tajidu aktharahum shakirina
972: qala ukh'ruj min'ha madhuman madhuran laman tabi'aka min'hum la-amla-anna jahannama minkum ajma'ina
973: wayaadamu us'kun anta wazawjuka al-janata fakula min haythu shi'tuma wala taqraba hadhihi al-shajarata fatakuna mina al-zalimina
974: fawaswasa lahuma al-shaytanu liyub'diya lahuma ma wuriya anhuma min sawatihima waqala ma nahakuma rabbukuma an hadhihi al-shajarati illa an takuna malakayni aw takuna mina al-khalidina
976: fadallahuma bighururin falamma dhaqa al-shajarata badat lahuma sawatuhuma watafiqa yakhsifani alayhima min waraqi al-janati wanadahuma rabbuhuma alam anhakuma an til'kuma al-shajarati wa-aqul lakuma inna al-shaytana lakuma aduwwun mubinun
977: qala rabbana zalamna anfusana wa-in lam taghfir lana watarhamna lanakunanna mina al-khasirina
978: qala ih'bitu ba'dukum liba'din aduwwun walakum fi al-ardi mus'taqarrun wamata'un ila hinin
979: qala fiha tahyawna wafiha tamutuna wamin'ha tukh'rajuna
980: yabani adama qad anzalna alaykum libasan yuwari sawatikum warishan walibasu al-taqwa dhalika khayrun dhalika min ayati al-lahi la'allahum yadhakkaruna
981: yabani adama la yaftinannakumu al-shaytanu kama akhraja abawaykum mina al-janati yanzi'u anhuma libasahuma liyuriyahuma sawatihima innahu yarakum huwa waqabiluhu min haythu la tarawnahum inna ja'alna al-shayatina awliyaa lilladhina la yu'minuna
982: wa-idha fa'alu fahishatan qalu wajadna alayha abaana wal-lahu amarana biha qul inna al-laha la yamuru bil-fahshai ataquluna ala al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
983: qul amara rabbi bil-qis'ti wa-aqimu wujuhakum inda kulli masjidin wa-id'uhu mukh'lisina lahu al-dina kama bada-akum ta'uduna
984: fariqan hada wafariqan haqqa alayhimu al-dalalatu innahumu ittakhadhu al-shayatina awliyaa min duni al-lahi wayahsabuna annahum muh'taduna
985: yabani adama khudhu zinatakum inda kulli masjidin wakulu wa-ish'rabu wala tus'rifu innahu la yuhibbu al-mus'rifina
986: qul man harrama zinata al-lahi allati akhraja li'ibadihi wal-tayibati mina ar-riz'qi qul hiya lilladhina amanu fi al-hayati al-dun'ya khalisatan yawma al-qiyamati kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
987: qul innama harrama rabbiya al-fawahisha ma zahara min'ha wama batana wal-ith'ma wal-baghya bighayri al-haqi wa-an tush'riku bil-lahi ma lam yunazzil bihi sul'tanan wa-an taqulu ala al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
988: walikulli ummatin ajalun fa-idha jaa ajaluhum la yastakhiruna sa'atan wala yastaqdimuna
989: yabani adama imma yatiyannakum rusulun minkum yaqussuna alaykum ayati famani ittaqa wa-aslaha fala khawfun alayhim wala hum yahzanuna
990: wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-is'takbaru anha ulaika ashabu al-nari hum fiha khaliduna
991: faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi ulaika yanaluhum nasibuhum mina al-kitabi hatta idha jaathum rusuluna yatawaffawnahum qalu ayna ma kuntum tad'una min duni al-lahi qalu dallu anna washahidu ala anfusihim annahum kanu kafirina
992: qala ud'khulu fi umamin qad khalat min qablikum mina al-jini wal-insi fi al-nari kullama dakhalat ummatun la'anat ukh'taha hatta idha iddaraku fiha jami'an qalat ukh'rahum liulahum rabbana haulai adalluna faatihim adhaban di'fan mina al-nari qala likullin di'fun walakin la ta'lamuna
993: waqalat ulahum li-ukh'rahum fama kana lakum alayna min fadlin fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum taksibuna
994: inna alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-is'takbaru anha la tufattahu lahum abwabu al-samai wala yadkhuluna al-janata hatta yalija al-jamalu fi sammi al-khiyati wakadhalika najzi al-muj'rimina
995: lahum min jahannama mihadun wamin fawqihim ghawashin wakadhalika najzi al-zalimina
996: wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati la nukallifu nafsan illa wus'aha ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna
997: wanaza'na ma fi sudurihim min ghillin tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi hadana lihadha wama kunna linahtadiya lawla an hadana al-lahu laqad jaat rusulu rabbina bil-haqi wanudu an til'kumu al-janatu urith'tumuha bima kuntum ta'maluna
998: wanada ashabu al-janati ashaba al-nari an qad wajadna ma wa'adana rabbuna haqqan fahal wajadttum ma wa'ada rabbukum haqqan qalu na'am fa-adhana mu-adhinun baynahum an la'natu al-lahi ala al-zalimina
999: alladhina yasudduna an sabili al-lahi wayabghunaha iwajan wahum bil-akhirati kafiruna
1000: wabaynahuma hijabun wa'ala al-a'rafi rijalun ya'rifuna kullan bisimahum wanadaw ashaba al-janati an salamun alaykum lam yadkhuluha wahum yatma'una
1001: wa-idha surifat absaruhum til'qaa ashabi al-nari qalu rabbana la taj'alna ma'a al-qawmi al-zalimina
1002: wanada ashabu al-a'rafi rijalan ya'rifunahum bisimahum qalu ma aghna ankum jam'ukum wama kuntum tastakbiruna
1003: ahaulai alladhina aqsamtum la yanaluhumu al-lahu birahmatin ud'khulu al-janata la khawfun alaykum wala antum tahzanuna
