1004: wanada ashabu al-nari ashaba al-janati an afidu alayna mina al-mai aw mimma razaqakumu al-lahu qalu inna al-laha harramahuma ala al-kafirina
1005: alladhina ittakhadhu dinahum lahwan wala'iban wagharrathumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya fal-yawma nansahum kama nasu liqaa yawmihim hadha wama kanu biayatina yajhaduna
1006: walaqad ji'nahum bikitabin fassalnahu ala il'min hudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna
1007: hal yanzuruna illa tawilahu yawma yati tawiluhu yaqulu alladhina nasuhu min qablu qad jaat rusulu rabbina bil-haqi fahal lana min shufa'aa fayashfa'u lana aw nuraddu fana'mala ghayra alladhi kunna na'malu qad khasiru anfusahum wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
1008: inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yugh'shi al-layla al-nahara yatlubuhu hathithan wal-shamsa wal-qamara wal-nujuma musakharatin bi-amrihi ala lahu al-khalqu wal-amru tabaraka al-lahu rabbu al-'alamina
1009: id'u rabbakum tadarru'an wakhuf'yatan innahu la yuhibbu al-mu'tadina
1010: wala tuf'sidu fi al-ardi ba'da is'lahiha wa-id'uhu khawfan watama'an inna rahmata al-lahi qaribun mina al-muh'sinina
1011: wahuwa alladhi yur'silu ar-riyaha bush'ran bayna yaday rahmatihi hatta idha aqallat sahaban thiqalan suq'nahu libaladin mayyitin fa-anzalna bihi al-maa fa-akhrajna bihi min kulli al-thamarati kadhalika nukh'riju al-mawta la'allakum tadhakkaruna
1012: wal-baladu al-tayibu yakhruju nabatuhu bi-idh'ni rabbihi wa-alladhi khabutha la yakhruju illa nakidan kadhalika nusarrifu al-ayati liqawmin yashkuruna
1013: laqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi faqala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu inni akhafu alaykum adhaba yawmin azimin
1014: qala al-mala-u min qawmihi inna lanaraka fi dalalin mubinin
1015: qala yaqawmi laysa bi dalalatun walakinni rasulun min rabbi al-'alamina
1016: uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ansahu lakum wa-a'lamu mina al-lahi ma la ta'lamuna
1017: awa'ajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum walitattaqu wala'allakum tur'hamuna
1018: fakadhabuhu fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina ma'ahu fi al-ful'ki wa-aghraqna alladhina kadhabu biayatina innahum kanu qawman amina
1019: wa-ila adin akhahum hudan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu afala tattaquna
1020: qala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi inna lanaraka fi safahatin wa-inna lanazunnuka mina al-kadhibina
1021: qala yaqawmi laysa bi safahatun walakinni rasulun min rabbi al-'alamina
1022: uballighukum risalati rabbi wa-ana lakum nasihun aminun
1023: awa'ajib'tum an jaakum dhik'run min rabbikum ala rajulin minkum liyundhirakum wa-udh'kuru idh ja'alakum khulafaa min ba'di qawmi nuhin wazadakum fi al-khalqi bas'tatan fa-udh'kuru alaa al-lahi la'allakum tuf'lihuna
1024: qalu aji'tana lina'buda al-laha wahdahu wanadhara ma kana ya'budu abauna fatina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina al-sadiqina
1025: qala qad waqa'a alaykum min rabbikum rij'sun waghadabun atujadilunani fi asmain sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma nazzala al-lahu biha min sul'tanin fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
1026: fa-anjaynahu wa-alladhina ma'ahu birahmatin minna waqata'na dabira alladhina kadhabu biayatina wama kanu mu'minina
1027: wa-ila thamuda akhahum salihan qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu qad jaatkum bayyinatun min rabbikum hadhihi naqatu al-lahi lakum ayatan fadharuha takul fi ardi al-lahi wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum adhabun alimun
1028: wa-udh'kuru idh ja'alakum khulafaa min ba'di adin wabawwa-akum fi al-ardi tattakhidhuna min suhuliha qusuran watanhituna al-jibala buyutan fa-udh'kuru alaa al-lahi wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
1029: qala al-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lilladhina us'tud'ifu liman amana min'hum ata'lamuna anna salihan mur'salun min rabbihi qalu inna bima ur'sila bihi mu'minuna
1030: qala alladhina is'takbaru inna bi-alladhi amantum bihi kafiruna
1031: fa'aqaru al-naqata wa'ataw an amri rabbihim waqalu yasalihu i'tina bima ta'iduna in kunta mina al-mur'salina
1032: fa-akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
1033: fatawalla anhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalata rabbi wanasahtu lakum walakin la tuhibbuna al-nasihina
1034: walutan idh qala liqawmihi atatuna al-fahishata ma sabaqakum biha min ahadin mina al-'alamina
1035: innakum latatuna ar-rijala shahwatan min duni al-nisai bal antum qawmun mus'rifuna
1036: wama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu akhrijuhum min qaryatikum innahum unasun yatatahharuna
1037: fa-anjaynahu wa-ahlahu illa im'ra-atahu kanat mina al-ghabirina
1038: wa-amtarna alayhim mataran fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-muj'rimina
1039: wa-ila madyana akhahum shu'ayban qala yaqawmi u'budu al-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu qad jaatkum bayyinatun min rabbikum fa-awfu al-kayla wal-mizana wala tabkhasu al-nasa ashyaahum wala tuf'sidu fi al-ardi ba'da is'lahiha dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minina
1040: wala taq'udu bikulli siratin tu'iduna watasudduna an sabili al-lahi man amana bihi watabghunaha iwajan wa-udh'kuru idh kuntum qalilan fakatharakum wa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-muf'sidina
1041: wa-in kana taifatun minkum amanu bi-alladhi ur'sil'tu bihi wataifatun lam yu'minu fa-is'biru hatta yahkuma al-lahu baynana wahuwa khayru al-hakimina
1042: qala al-mala-u alladhina is'takbaru min qawmihi lanukh'rijannaka yashu'aybu wa-alladhina amanu ma'aka min qaryatina aw lata'udunna fi millatina qala awalaw kunna karihina
1043: qadi if'tarayna ala al-lahi kadhiban in ud'na fi millatikum ba'da idh najjana al-lahu min'ha wama yakunu lana an na'uda fiha illa an yashaa al-lahu rabbuna wasi'a rabbuna kulla shayin il'man ala al-lahi tawakkalna rabbana if'tah baynana wabayna qawmina bil-haqi wa-anta khayru al-fatihina
1044: waqala al-mala-u alladhina kafaru min qawmihi la-ini ittaba'tum shu'ayban innakum idhan lakhasiruna
1045: fa-akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu fa-asbahu fi darihim jathimina
1046: alladhina kadhabu shu'ayban ka-an lam yaghnaw fiha alladhina kadhabu shu'ayban kanu humu al-khasirina
1047: fatawalla anhum waqala yaqawmi laqad ablaghtukum risalati rabbi wanasahtu lakum fakayfa asa ala qawmin kafirina
1048: wama arsalna fi qaryatin min nabiyyin illa akhadhna ahlaha bil-basai wal-darai la'allahum yaddarra'una
1049: thumma baddalna makana al-sayi-ati al-hasanata hatta afaw waqalu qad massa abaana al-darau wal-sarau fa-akhadhnahum baghtatan wahum la yash'uruna
1050: walaw anna ahla al-qura amanu wa-ittaqaw lafatahna alayhim barakatin mina al-samai wal-ardi walakin kadhabu fa-akhadhnahum bima kanu yaksibuna
1051: afa-amina ahlu al-qura an yatiyahum basuna bayatan wahum naimuna
1052: awa-amina ahlu al-qura an yatiyahum basuna duhan wahum yal'abuna
1053: afa-aminu makra al-lahi fala yamanu makra al-lahi illa al-qawmu al-khasiruna
1054: awalam yahdi lilladhina yarithuna al-arda min ba'di ahliha an law nashau asabnahum bidhunubihim wanatba'u ala qulubihim fahum la yasma'una
1055: til'ka al-qura naqussu alayka min anbaiha walaqad jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kanu liyu'minu bima kadhabu min qablu kadhalika yatba'u al-lahu ala qulubi al-kafirina
1056: wama wajadna li-aktharihim min ahdin wa-in wajadna aktharahum lafasiqina
1057: thumma ba'athna min ba'dihim musa biayatina ila fir'awna wamala-ihi fazalamu biha fa-unzur kayfa kana aqibatu al-muf'sidina
1058: waqala musa yafir'awnu inni rasulun min rabbi al-'alamina
1059: haqiqun ala an la aqula ala al-lahi illa al-haqa qad ji'tukum bibayyinatin min rabbikum fa-arsil ma'iya bani is'raila
1060: qala in kunta ji'ta biayatin fati biha in kunta mina al-sadiqina
1061: fa-alqa asahu fa-idha hiya thu'banun mubinun
1062: wanaza'a yadahu fa-idha hiya baydau lilnnazirina
1063: qala al-mala-u min qawmi fir'awna inna hadha lasahirun alimun
1064: yuridu an yukh'rijakum min ardikum famadha tamuruna
1065: qalu arjih wa-akhahu wa-arsil fi al-madaini hashirina
1067: wajaa al-saharatu fir'awna qalu inna lana la-ajran in kunna nahnu al-ghalibina
1069: qalu yamusa imma an tul'qiya wa-imma an nakuna nahnu al-mul'qina
1070: qala alqu falamma alqaw saharu a'yuna al-nasi wa-is'tarhabuhum wajau bisih'rin azimin
1071: wa-awhayna ila musa an alqi asaka fa-idha hiya talqafu ma yafikuna
1072: fawaqa'a al-haqu wabatala ma kanu ya'maluna
1077: qala fir'awnu amantum bihi qabla an adhana lakum inna hadha lamakrun makartumuhu fi al-madinati litukh'riju min'ha ahlaha fasawfa ta'lamuna
1078: la-uqatti'anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin thumma la-usallibannakum ajma'ina
1080: wama tanqimu minna illa an amanna biayati rabbina lamma jaatna rabbana afrigh alayna sabran watawaffana mus'limina
1081: waqala al-mala-u min qawmi fir'awna atadharu musa waqawmahu liyuf'sidu fi al-ardi wayadharaka waalihataka qala sanuqattilu abnaahum wanastahyi nisaahum wa-inna fawqahum qahiruna
1082: qala musa liqawmihi is'ta'inu bil-lahi wa-is'biru inna al-arda lillahi yurithuha man yashau min ibadihi wal-'aqibatu lil'muttaqina
1083: qalu udhina min qabli an tatiyana wamin ba'di ma ji'tana qala asa rabbukum an yuh'lika aduwwakum wayastakhlifakum fi al-ardi fayanzura kayfa ta'maluna
1084: walaqad akhadhna ala fir'awna bil-sinina wanaqsin mina al-thamarati la'allahum yadhakkaruna
1085: fa-idha jaathumu al-hasanatu qalu lana hadhihi wa-in tusib'hum sayyi-atun yattayyaru bimusa waman ma'ahu ala innama tairuhum inda al-lahi walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
1086: waqalu mahma tatina bihi min ayatin litasharana biha fama nahnu laka bimu'minina
1087: fa-arsalna alayhimu al-tufana wal-jarada wal-qumala wal-dafadi'a wal-dama ayatin mufassalatin fa-is'takbaru wakanu qawman muj'rimina
1088: walamma waqa'a alayhimu ar-rij'zu qalu yamusa ud'u lana rabbaka bima ahida indaka la-in kashafta anna ar-rij'za lanu'minanna laka walanur'silanna ma'aka bani is'raila
1089: falamma kashafna anhumu ar-rij'za ila ajalin hum balighuhu idha hum yankuthuna
1090: fa-intaqamna min'hum fa-aghraqnahum fi al-yami bi-annahum kadhabu biayatina wakanu anha ghafilina
1091: wa-awrathna al-qawma alladhina kanu yus'tad'afuna mashariqa al-ardi wamagharibaha allati barakna fiha watammat kalimatu rabbika al-hus'na ala bani is'raila bima sabaru wadammarna ma kana yasna'u fir'awnu waqawmuhu wama kanu ya'rishuna
1092: wajawazna bibani is'raila al-bahra fa-ataw ala qawmin ya'kufuna ala asnamin lahum qalu yamusa ij'al lana ilahan kama lahum alihatun qala innakum qawmun tajhaluna
1093: inna haulai mutabbarun ma hum fihi wabatilun ma kanu ya'maluna
1094: qala aghayra al-lahi abghikum ilahan wahuwa faddalakum ala al-'alamina
1095: wa-idh anjaynakum min ali fir'awna yasumunakum sua al-'adhabi yuqattiluna abnaakum wayastahyuna nisaakum wafi dhalikum balaon min rabbikum azimun
1096: wawa'adna musa thalathina laylatan wa-atmamnaha bi'ashrin fatamma miqatu rabbihi arba'ina laylatan waqala musa li-akhihi haruna ukh'luf'ni fi qawmi wa-aslih wala tattabi' sabila al-muf'sidina
1097: walamma jaa musa limiqatina wakallamahu rabbuhu qala rabbi arini anzur ilayka qala lan tarani walakini unzur ila al-jabali fa-ini is'taqarra makanahu fasawfa tarani falamma tajalla rabbuhu lil'jabali ja'alahu dakkan wakharra musa sa'iqan falamma afaqa qala sub'hanaka tub'tu ilayka wa-ana awwalu al-mu'minina
1098: qala yamusa inni is'tafaytuka ala al-nasi birisalati wabikalami fakhudh ma ataytuka wakun mina al-shakirina
1099: wakatabna lahu fi al-alwahi min kulli shayin maw'izatan watafsilan likulli shayin fakhudh'ha biquwwatin wamur qawmaka yakhudhu bi-ahsaniha sa-urikum dara al-fasiqina
1100: sa-asrifu an ayatiya alladhina yatakabbaruna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi wa-in yaraw kulla ayatin la yu'minu biha wa-in yaraw sabila ar-rush'di la yattakhidhuhu sabilan wa-in yaraw sabila al-ghayi yattakhidhuhu sabilan dhalika bi-annahum kadhabu biayatina wakanu anha ghafilina
1101: wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina waliqai al-akhirati habitat a'maluhum hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu ya'maluna
1102: wa-ittakhadha qawmu musa min ba'dihi min huliyyihim ij'lan jasadan lahu khuwarun alam yaraw annahu la yukallimuhum wala yahdihim sabilan ittakhadhuhu wakanu zalimina
1103: walamma suqita fi aydihim wara-aw annahum qad dallu qalu la-in lam yarhamna rabbuna wayaghfir lana lanakunanna mina al-khasirina
1104: walamma raja'a musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala bi'sama khalaftumuni min ba'di a'ajil'tum amra rabbikum wa-alqa al-alwaha wa-akhadha birasi akhihi yajurruhu ilayhi qala ib'na umma inna al-qawma is'tad'afuni wakadu yaqtulunani fala tush'mit biya al-a'daa wala taj'alni ma'a al-qawmi al-zalimina
1105: qala rabbi igh'fir li wali-akhi wa-adkhil'na fi rahmatika wa-anta arhamu ar-rahimina
1106: inna alladhina ittakhadhu al-'ij'la sayanaluhum ghadabun min rabbihim wadhillatun fi al-hayati al-dun'ya wakadhalika najzi al-muf'tarina
1107: wa-alladhina amilu al-sayiati thumma tabu min ba'diha waamanu inna rabbaka min ba'diha laghafurun rahimun
1108: walamma sakata an musa al-ghadabu akhadha al-alwaha wafi nus'khatiha hudan warahmatun lilladhina hum lirabbihim yarhabuna
1109: wa-ikh'tara musa qawmahu sab'ina rajulan limiqatina falamma akhadhathumu ar-rajfatu qala rabbi law shi'ta ahlaktahum min qablu wa-iyyaya atuh'likuna bima fa'ala al-sufahau minna in hiya illa fit'natuka tudillu biha man tashau watahdi man tashau anta waliyyuna fa-igh'fir lana wa-ir'hamna wa-anta khayru al-ghafirina
1110: wa-uk'tub lana fi hadhihi al-dun'ya hasanatan wafi al-akhirati inna hud'na ilayka qala adhabi usibu bihi man ashau warahmati wasi'at kulla shayin fasa-aktubuha lilladhina yattaquna wayu'tuna al-zakata wa-alladhina hum biayatina yu'minuna
1111: alladhina yattabi'una ar-rasula al-nabiya al-umiya alladhi yajidunahu maktuban indahum fi al-tawrati wal-injili yamuruhum bil-ma'rufi wayanhahum ani al-munkari wayuhillu lahumu al-tayibati wayuharrimu alayhimu al-khabaitha wayada'u anhum is'rahum wal-aghlala allati kanat alayhim fa-alladhina amanu bihi wa'azzaruhu wanasaruhu wa-ittaba'u al-nura alladhi unzila ma'ahu ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
1112: qul yaayyuha al-nasu inni rasulu al-lahi ilaykum jami'an alladhi lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi la ilaha illa huwa yuh'yi wayumitu faaminu bil-lahi warasulihi al-nabiyi al-umiyi alladhi yu'minu bil-lahi wakalimatihi wa-ittabi'uhu la'allakum tahtaduna
1113: wamin qawmi musa ummatun yahduna bil-haqi wabihi ya'diluna
1114: waqatta'nahumu ith'natay ashrata asbatan umaman wa-awhayna ila musa idhi is'tasqahu qawmuhu ani id'rib bi'asaka al-hajara fa-inbajasat min'hu ith'nata ashrata aynan qad alima kullu unasin mashrabahum wazallalna alayhimu al-ghamama wa-anzalna alayhimu al-mana wal-salwa kulu min tayyibati ma razaqnakum wama zalamuna walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
1115: wa-idh qila lahumu us'kunu hadhihi al-qaryata wakulu min'ha haythu shi'tum waqulu hittatun wa-ud'khulu al-baba sujjadan naghfir lakum khatiatikum sanazidu al-muh'sinina
1116: fabaddala alladhina zalamu min'hum qawlan ghayra alladhi qila lahum fa-arsalna alayhim rij'zan mina al-samai bima kanu yazlimuna
1117: wasalhum ani al-qaryati allati kanat hadirata al-bahri idh ya'duna fi al-sabti idh tatihim hitanuhum yawma sabtihim shurra'an wayawma la yasbituna la tatihim kadhalika nabluhum bima kanu yafsuquna
1118: wa-idh qalat ummatun min'hum lima ta'izuna qawman al-lahu muh'likuhum aw mu'adhibuhum adhaban shadidan qalu ma'dhiratan ila rabbikum wala'allahum yattaquna
1119: falamma nasu ma dhukkiru bihi anjayna alladhina yanhawna ani al-sui wa-akhadhna alladhina zalamu bi'adhabin baisin bima kanu yafsuquna
1120: falamma ataw an ma nuhu anhu qul'na lahum kunu qiradatan khasiina
1121: wa-idh ta-adhana rabbuka layab'athanna alayhim ila yawmi al-qiyamati man yasumuhum sua al-'adhabi inna rabbaka lasari'u al-'iqabi wa-innahu laghafurun rahimun
1122: waqatta'nahum fi al-ardi umaman min'humu al-salihuna wamin'hum duna dhalika wabalawnahum bil-hasanati wal-sayiati la'allahum yarji'una
1123: fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun warithu al-kitaba yakhudhuna arada hadha al-adna wayaquluna sayugh'faru lana wa-in yatihim aradun mith'luhu yakhudhuhu alam yu'khadh alayhim mithaqu al-kitabi an la yaqulu ala al-lahi illa al-haqa wadarasu ma fihi wal-daru al-akhiratu khayrun lilladhina yattaquna afala ta'qiluna
1124: wa-alladhina yumassikuna bil-kitabi wa-aqamu al-salata inna la nudi'u ajra al-mus'lihina
1125: wa-idh nataqna al-jabala fawqahum ka-annahu zullatun wazannu annahu waqi'un bihim khudhu ma ataynakum biquwwatin wa-udh'kuru ma fihi la'allakum tattaquna
1126: wa-idh akhadha rabbuka min bani adama min zuhurihim dhurriyyatahum wa-ashhadahum ala anfusihim alastu birabbikum qalu bala shahid'na an taqulu yawma al-qiyamati inna kunna an hadha ghafilina
1127: aw taqulu innama ashraka abauna min qablu wakunna dhurriyyatan min ba'dihim afatuh'likuna bima fa'ala al-mub'tiluna
1129: wa-ut'lu alayhim naba-a alladhi ataynahu ayatina fa-insalakha min'ha fa-atba'ahu al-shaytanu fakana mina al-ghawina
1130: walaw shi'na larafa'nahu biha walakinnahu akhlada ila al-ardi wa-ittaba'a hawahu famathaluhu kamathali al-kalbi in tahmil alayhi yalhath aw tatruk'hu yalhath dhalika mathalu al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayatina fa-uq'susi al-qasasa la'allahum yatafakkaruna
1131: saa mathalan al-qawmu alladhina kadhabu biayatina wa-anfusahum kanu yazlimuna
1132: man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yud'lil fa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna
1133: walaqad dharana lijahannama kathiran mina al-jini wal-insi lahum qulubun la yafqahuna biha walahum a'yunun la yub'siruna biha walahum adhanun la yasma'una biha ulaika kal-an'ami bal hum adallu ulaika humu al-ghafiluna
1134: walillahi al-asmau al-hus'na fa-id'uhu biha wadharu alladhina yul'hiduna fi asmaihi sayuj'zawna ma kanu ya'maluna
1135: wamimman khalaqna ummatun yahduna bil-haqi wabihi ya'diluna
1136: wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina sanastadrijuhum min haythu la ya'lamuna
1138: awalam yatafakkaru ma bisahibihim min jinnatin in huwa illa nadhirun mubinun
1139: awalam yanzuru fi malakuti al-samawati wal-ardi wama khalaqa al-lahu min shayin wa-an asa an yakuna qadi iq'taraba ajaluhum fabi-ayyi hadithin ba'dahu yu'minuna
1140: man yud'lili al-lahu fala hadiya lahu wayadharuhum fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
1141: yasalunaka ani al-sa'ati ayyana mur'saha qul innama il'muha inda rabbi la yujalliha liwaqtiha illa huwa thaqulat fi al-samawati wal-ardi la tatikum illa baghtatan yasalunaka ka-annaka hafiyyun anha qul innama il'muha inda al-lahi walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
1142: qul la amliku linafsi naf 'an wala darran illa ma shaa al-lahu walaw kuntu a'lamu al-ghayba la-is'takthartu mina al-khayri wama massaniya al-suu in ana illa nadhirun wabashirun liqawmin yu'minuna
1143: huwa alladhi khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin waja'ala min'ha zawjaha liyaskuna ilayha falamma taghashaha hamalat hamlan khafifan famarrat bihi falamma athqalat da'awa al-laha rabbahuma la-in ataytana salihan lanakunanna mina al-shakirina
1144: falamma atahuma salihan ja'ala lahu shurakaa fima atahuma fata'ala al-lahu amma yush'rikuna
1145: ayush'rikuna ma la yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laquna
1146: wala yastati'una lahum nasran wala anfusahum yansuruna
1147: wa-in tad'uhum ila al-huda la yattabi'ukum sawaon alaykum ada'awtumuhum am antum samituna
1148: inna alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi ibadun amthalukum fa-id'uhum falyastajibu lakum in kuntum sadiqina
1149: alahum arjulun yamshuna biha am lahum aydin yabtishuna biha am lahum a'yunun yub'siruna biha am lahum adhanun yasma'una biha quli id'u shurakaakum thumma kiduni fala tunziruni
1150: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhi nazzala al-kitaba wahuwa yatawalla al-salihina
1151: wa-alladhina tad'una min dunihi la yastati'una nasrakum wala anfusahum yansuruna
1152: wa-in tad'uhum ila al-huda la yasma'u watarahum yanzuruna ilayka wahum la yub'siruna
1153: khudhi al-'afwa wamur bil-'ur'fi wa-a'rid ani al-jahilina
1154: wa-imma yanzaghannaka mina al-shaytani nazghun fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi innahu sami'un alimun
1155: inna alladhina ittaqaw idha massahum taifun mina al-shaytani tadhakkaru fa-idha hum mub'siruna
1156: wa-ikh'wanuhum yamuddunahum fi al-ghayi thumma la yuq'siruna
1157: wa-idha lam tatihim biayatin qalu lawla ij'tabaytaha qul innama attabi'u ma yuha ilayya min rabbi hadha basairu min rabbikum wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yu'minuna
1158: wa-idha quri-a al-qur'anu fa-is'tami'u lahu wa-ansitu la'allakum tur'hamuna
1159: wa-udh'kur rabbaka fi nafsika tadarru'an wakhifatan waduna al-jahri mina al-qawli bil-ghuduwi wal-asali wala takun mina al-ghafilina
1160: inna alladhina inda rabbika la yastakbiruna an ibadatihi wayusabbihunahu walahu yasjuduna
1161: yasalunaka ani al-anfali quli al-anfalu lillahi war-rasuli fa-ittaqu al-laha wa-aslihu dhata baynikum wa-ati'u al-laha warasulahu in kuntum mu'minina
1162: innama al-mu'minuna alladhina idha dhukira al-lahu wajilat qulubuhum wa-idha tuliyat alayhim ayatuhu zadathum imanan wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
1163: alladhina yuqimuna al-salata wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
1164: ulaika humu al-mu'minuna haqqan lahum darajatun inda rabbihim wamaghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
1165: kama akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-haqi wa-inna fariqan mina al-mu'minina lakarihuna
1166: yujadilunaka fi al-haqi ba'da ma tabayyana ka-annama yusaquna ila al-mawti wahum yanzuruna
1167: wa-idh ya'idukumu al-lahu ih'da al-taifatayni annaha lakum watawadduna anna ghayra dhati al-shawkati takunu lakum wayuridu al-lahu an yuhiqqa al-haqa bikalimatihi wayaqta'a dabira al-kafirina
1168: liyuhiqqa al-haqa wayub'tila al-batila walaw kariha al-muj'rimuna
1169: idh tastaghithuna rabbakum fa-is'tajaba lakum anni mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malaikati mur'difina
1170: wama ja'alahu al-lahu illa bush'ra walitatma-inna bihi qulubukum wama al-nasru illa min indi al-lahi inna al-laha azizun hakimun
1171: idh yughashikumu al-nu'asa amanatan min'hu wayunazzilu alaykum mina al-samai maan liyutahhirakum bihi wayudh'hiba ankum rij'za al-shaytani waliyarbita ala qulubikum wayuthabbita bihi al-aqdama
1172: idh yuhi rabbuka ila al-malaikati anni ma'akum fathabbitu alladhina amanu sa-ul'qi fi qulubi alladhina kafaru ar-ru'ba fa-id'ribu fawqa al-a'naqi wa-id'ribu min'hum kulla bananin
1173: dhalika bi-annahum shaqqu al-laha warasulahu waman yushaqiqi al-laha warasulahu fa-inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
1174: dhalikum fadhuquhu wa-anna lil'kafirina adhaba al-nari
1175: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitumu alladhina kafaru zahfan fala tuwalluhumu al-adbara
1176: waman yuwallihim yawma-idhin duburahu illa mutaharrifan liqitalin aw mutahayyizan ila fi-atin faqad baa bighadabin mina al-lahi wamawahu jahannamu wabi'sa al-masiru
1177: falam taqtuluhum walakinna al-laha qatalahum wama ramayta idh ramayta walakinna al-laha rama waliyub'liya al-mu'minina min'hu balaan hasanan inna al-laha sami'un alimun
1178: dhalikum wa-anna al-laha muhinu kaydi al-kafirina
1179: in tastaftihu faqad jaakumu al-fathu wa-in tantahu fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in ta'udu na'ud walan tugh'niya ankum fi-atukum shayan walaw kathurat wa-anna al-laha ma'a al-mu'minina
1180: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ati'u al-laha warasulahu wala tawallaw anhu wa-antum tasma'una
1181: wala takunu ka-alladhina qalu sami'na wahum la yasma'una
1182: inna sharra al-dawabi inda al-lahi al-sumu al-buk'mu alladhina la ya'qiluna
1183: walaw alima al-lahu fihim khayran la-asma'ahum walaw asma'ahum latawallaw wahum mu'riduna
1184: yaayyuha alladhina amanu is'tajibu lillahi walilrrasuli idha da'akum lima yuh'yikum wa-i'lamu anna al-laha yahulu bayna al-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuh'sharuna
1185: wa-ittaqu fit'natan la tusibanna alladhina zalamu minkum khassatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
1186: wa-udh'kuru idh antum qalilun mus'tad'afuna fi al-ardi takhafuna an yatakhattafakumu al-nasu faawakum wa-ayyadakum binasrihi warazaqakum mina al-tayibati la'allakum tashkuruna
1187: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takhunu al-laha war-rasula watakhunu amanatikum wa-antum ta'lamuna
1188: wa-i'lamu annama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wa-anna al-laha indahu ajrun azimun
1189: yaayyuha alladhina amanu in tattaqu al-laha yaj'al lakum fur'qanan wayukaffir ankum sayyiatikum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
1190: wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhina kafaru liyuth'bituka aw yaqtuluka aw yukh'rijuka wayamkuruna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-makirina
1191: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna qalu qad sami'na law nashau laqul'na mith'la hadha in hadha illa asatiru al-awalina
1192: wa-idh qalu al-lahuma in kana hadha huwa al-haqa min indika fa-amtir alayna hijaratan mina al-samai awi i'tina bi'adhabin alimin
1193: wama kana al-lahu liyu'adhibahum wa-anta fihim wama kana al-lahu mu'adhibahum wahum yastaghfiruna
1194: wama lahum alla yu'adhibahumu al-lahu wahum yasudduna ani al-masjidi al-harami wama kanu awliyaahu in awliyauhu illa al-mutaquna walakinna aktharahum la ya'lamuna
1195: wama kana salatuhum inda al-bayti illa mukaan watasdiyatan fadhuqu al-'adhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
1196: inna alladhina kafaru yunfiquna amwalahum liyasuddu an sabili al-lahi fasayunfiqunaha thumma takunu alayhim hasratan thumma yugh'labuna wa-alladhina kafaru ila jahannama yuh'sharuna
1197: liyamiza al-lahu al-khabitha mina al-tayibi wayaj'ala al-khabitha ba'dahu ala ba'din fayarkumahu jami'an fayaj'alahu fi jahannama ulaika humu al-khasiruna
1198: qul lilladhina kafaru in yantahu yugh'far lahum ma qad salafa wa-in ya'udu faqad madat sunnatu al-awalina
1199: waqatiluhum hatta la takuna fit'natun wayakuna al-dinu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna al-laha bima ya'maluna basirun
1200: wa-in tawallaw fa-i'lamu anna al-laha mawlakum ni'ma al-mawla wani'ma al-nasiru
1201: wa-i'lamu annama ghanim'tum min shayin fa-anna lillahi khumusahu walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni al-sabili in kuntum amantum bil-lahi wama anzalna ala abdina yawma al-fur'qani yawma al-taqa al-jam'ani wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
1202: idh antum bil-'ud'wati al-dun'ya wahum bil-'ud'wati al-qus'wa war-rakbu asfala minkum walaw tawa'adttum la-ikh'talaftum fi al-mi'adi walakin liyaqdiya al-lahu amran kana maf'ulan liyahlika man halaka an bayyinatin wayahya man hayya an bayyinatin wa-inna al-laha lasami'un alimun
1203: idh yurikahumu al-lahu fi manamika qalilan walaw arakahum kathiran lafashil'tum walatanaza'tum fi al-amri walakinna al-laha sallama innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
1204: wa-idh yurikumuhum idhi al-taqaytum fi a'yunikum qalilan wayuqallilukum fi a'yunihim liyaqdiya al-lahu amran kana maf'ulan wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
1205: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitum fi-atan fa-uth'butu wa-udh'kuru al-laha kathiran la'allakum tuf'lihuna
1206: wa-ati'u al-laha warasulahu wala tanaza'u fatafshalu watadhhaba rihukum wa-is'biru inna al-laha ma'a al-sabirina
1207: wala takunu ka-alladhina kharaju min diyarihim bataran wariaa al-nasi wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wal-lahu bima ya'maluna muhitun
1208: wa-idh zayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum waqala la ghaliba lakumu al-yawma mina al-nasi wa-inni jarun lakum falamma taraati al-fi-atani nakasa ala aqibayhi waqala inni barion minkum inni ara ma la tarawna inni akhafu al-laha wal-lahu shadidu al-'iqabi
1209: idh yaqulu al-munafiquna wa-alladhina fi qulubihim maradun gharra haulai dinuhum waman yatawakkal ala al-lahi fa-inna al-laha azizun hakimun
1210: walaw tara idh yatawaffa alladhina kafaru al-malaikatu yadribuna wujuhahum wa-adbarahum wadhuqu adhaba al-hariqi
1211: dhalika bima qaddamat aydikum wa-anna al-laha laysa bizallamin lil'abidi
1212: kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kafaru biayati al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunubihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadidu al-'iqabi
1213: dhalika bi-anna al-laha lam yaku mughayyiran ni'matan an'amaha ala qawmin hatta yughayyiru ma bi-anfusihim wa-anna al-laha sami'un alimun
1214: kadabi ali fir'awna wa-alladhina min qablihim kadhabu biayati rabbihim fa-ahlaknahum bidhunubihim wa-aghraqna ala fir'awna wakullun kanu zalimina
1215: inna sharra al-dawabi inda al-lahi alladhina kafaru fahum la yu'minuna
1216: alladhina ahadtta min'hum thumma yanquduna ahdahum fi kulli marratin wahum la yattaquna
1217: fa-imma tathqafannahum fi al-harbi fasharrid bihim man khalfahum la'allahum yadhakkaruna
1218: wa-imma takhafanna min qawmin khiyanatan fa-inbidh ilayhim ala sawain inna al-laha la yuhibbu al-khainina
1219: wala yahsabanna alladhina kafaru sabaqu innahum la yu'jizuna
1220: wa-a'iddu lahum ma is'tata'tum min quwwatin wamin ribati al-khayli tur'hibuna bihi aduwwa al-lahi wa'aduwwakum waakharina min dunihim la ta'lamunahumu al-lahu ya'lamuhum wama tunfiqu min shayin fi sabili al-lahi yuwaffa ilaykum wa-antum la tuz'lamuna
1221: wa-in janahu lilssalmi fa-ij'nah laha watawakkal ala al-lahi innahu huwa al-sami'u al-'alimu
1222: wa-in yuridu an yakhda'uka fa-inna hasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhi ayyadaka binasrihi wabil-mu'minina
1223: wa-allafa bayna qulubihim law anfaqta ma fi al-ardi jami'an ma allafta bayna qulubihim walakinna al-laha allafa baynahum innahu azizun hakimun
1224: yaayyuha al-nabiyu hasbuka al-lahu wamani ittaba'aka mina al-mu'minina
1225: yaayyuha al-nabiyu harridi al-mu'minina ala al-qitali in yakun minkum ish'runa sabiruna yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum mi-atun yaghlibu alfan mina alladhina kafaru bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
1226: al-ana khaffafa al-lahu ankum wa'alima anna fikum da'fan fa-in yakun minkum mi-atun sabiratun yaghlibu mi-atayni wa-in yakun minkum alfun yaghlibu alfayni bi-idh'ni al-lahi wal-lahu ma'a al-sabirina
1227: ma kana linabiyyin an yakuna lahu asra hatta yuth'khina fi al-ardi turiduna arada al-dun'ya wal-lahu yuridu al-akhirata wal-lahu azizun hakimun
1228: lawla kitabun mina al-lahi sabaqa lamassakum fima akhadhtum adhabun azimun
1229: fakulu mimma ghanim'tum halalan tayyiban wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
1230: yaayyuha al-nabiyu qul liman fi aydikum mina al-asra in ya'lami al-lahu fi qulubikum khayran yu'tikum khayran mimma ukhidha minkum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
1231: wa-in yuridu khiyanataka faqad khanu al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu alimun hakimun
1232: inna alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika ba'duhum awliyau ba'din wa-alladhina amanu walam yuhajiru ma lakum min walayatihim min shayin hatta yuhajiru wa-ini is'tansarukum fi al-dini fa'alaykumu al-nasru illa ala qawmin baynakum wabaynahum mithaqun wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
1233: wa-alladhina kafaru ba'duhum awliyau ba'din illa taf 'aluhu takun fit'natun fi al-ardi wafasadun kabirun
1234: wa-alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu fi sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina awaw wanasaru ulaika humu al-mu'minuna haqqan lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
1235: wa-alladhina amanu min ba'du wahajaru wajahadu ma'akum fa-ulaika minkum wa-ulu al-arhami ba'duhum awla biba'din fi kitabi al-lahi inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
1236: baraatun mina al-lahi warasulihi ila alladhina ahadttum mina al-mush'rikina
1237: fasihu fi al-ardi arba'ata ashhurin wa-i'lamu annakum ghayru mu'jizi al-lahi wa-anna al-laha mukh'zi al-kafirina
1238: wa-adhanun mina al-lahi warasulihi ila al-nasi yawma al-haji al-akbari anna al-laha barion mina al-mush'rikina warasuluhu fa-in tub'tum fahuwa khayrun lakum wa-in tawallaytum fa-i'lamu annakum ghayru mu'jizi al-lahi wabashiri alladhina kafaru bi'adhabin alimin
1239: illa alladhina ahadttum mina al-mush'rikina thumma lam yanqusukum shayan walam yuzahiru alaykum ahadan fa-atimmu ilayhim ahdahum ila muddatihim inna al-laha yuhibbu al-mutaqina
1240: fa-idha insalakha al-ashhuru al-hurumu fa-uq'tulu al-mush'rikina haythu wajadttumuhum wakhudhuhum wa-uh'suruhum wa-uq'udu lahum kulla marsadin fa-in tabu wa-aqamu al-salata waatawu al-zakata fakhallu sabilahum inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
1241: wa-in ahadun mina al-mush'rikina is'tajaraka fa-ajir'hu hatta yasma'a kalama al-lahi thumma abligh'hu mamanahu dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la ya'lamuna
1242: kayfa yakunu lil'mush'rikina ahdun inda al-lahi wa'inda rasulihi illa alladhina ahadttum inda al-masjidi al-harami fama is'taqamu lakum fa-is'taqimu lahum inna al-laha yuhibbu al-mutaqina
1243: kayfa wa-in yazharu alaykum la yarqubu fikum illan wala dhimmatan yur'dunakum bi-afwahihim wataba qulubuhum wa-aktharuhum fasiquna
1244: ish'taraw biayati al-lahi thamanan qalilan fasaddu an sabilihi innahum saa ma kanu ya'maluna
1245: la yarqubuna fi mu'minin illan wala dhimmatan wa-ulaika humu al-mu'taduna
1246: fa-in tabu wa-aqamu al-salata waatawu al-zakata fa-ikh'wanukum fi al-dini wanufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
1247: wa-in nakathu aymanahum min ba'di ahdihim wata'anu fi dinikum faqatilu a-immata al-kuf'ri innahum la aymana lahum la'allahum yantahuna
1248: ala tuqatiluna qawman nakathu aymanahum wahammu bi-ikh'raji ar-rasuli wahum badaukum awwala marratin atakhshawnahum fal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshawhu in kuntum mu'minina
1249: qatiluhum yu'adhib'humu al-lahu bi-aydikum wayukh'zihim wayansur'kum alayhim wayashfi sudura qawmin mu'minina
1250: wayudh'hib ghayza qulubihim wayatubu al-lahu ala man yashau wal-lahu alimun hakimun
1251: am hasib'tum an tut'raku walamma ya'lami al-lahu alladhina jahadu minkum walam yattakhidhu min duni al-lahi wala rasulihi wala al-mu'minina walijatan wal-lahu khabirun bima ta'maluna
1252: ma kana lil'mush'rikina an ya'muru masajida al-lahi shahidina ala anfusihim bil-kuf'ri ulaika habitat a'maluhum wafi al-nari hum khaliduna
1253: innama ya'muru masajida al-lahi man amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa-aqama al-salata waata al-zakata walam yakhsha illa al-laha fa'asa ulaika an yakunu mina al-muh'tadina
1254: aja'altum siqayata al-haji wa'imarata al-masjidi al-harami kaman amana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wajahada fi sabili al-lahi la yastawuna inda al-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
1255: alladhina amanu wahajaru wajahadu fi sabili al-lahi bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim a'zamu darajatan inda al-lahi wa-ulaika humu al-faizuna
1256: yubashiruhum rabbuhum birahmatin min'hu warid'wanin wajannatin lahum fiha na'imun muqimun
1257: khalidina fiha abadan inna al-laha indahu ajrun azimun
1258: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu abaakum wa-ikh'wanakum awliyaa ini is'tahabbu al-kuf'ra ala al-imani waman yatawallahum minkum fa-ulaika humu al-zalimuna
1259: qul in kana abaukum wa-abnaukum wa-ikh'wanukum wa-azwajukum wa'ashiratukum wa-amwalun iq'taraftumuha watijaratun takhshawna kasadaha wamasakinu tardawnaha ahabba ilaykum mina al-lahi warasulihi wajihadin fi sabilihi fatarabbasu hatta yatiya al-lahu bi-amrihi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
1260: laqad nasarakumu al-lahu fi mawatina kathiratin wayawma hunaynin idh a'jabatkum kathratukum falam tugh'ni ankum shayan wadaqat alaykumu al-ardu bima rahubat thumma wallaytum mud'birina
1261: thumma anzala al-lahu sakinatahu ala rasulihi wa'ala al-mu'minina wa-anzala junudan lam tarawha wa'adhaba alladhina kafaru wadhalika jazau al-kafirina
1262: thumma yatubu al-lahu min ba'di dhalika ala man yashau wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
1263: yaayyuha alladhina amanu innama al-mush'rikuna najasun fala yaqrabu al-masjida al-harama ba'da amihim hadha wa-in khif'tum aylatan fasawfa yugh'nikumu al-lahu min fadlihi in shaa inna al-laha alimun hakimun
1264: qatilu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-lahi wala bil-yawmi al-akhiri wala yuharrimuna ma harrama al-lahu warasuluhu wala yadinuna dina al-haqi mina alladhina utu al-kitaba hatta yu'tu al-jiz'yata an yadin wahum saghiruna
1265: waqalati al-yahudu uzayrun ub'nu al-lahi waqalati al-nasara al-masihu ub'nu al-lahi dhalika qawluhum bi-afwahihim yudahiuna qawla alladhina kafaru min qablu qatalahumu al-lahu anna yu'fakuna
1266: ittakhadhu ahbarahum waruh'banahum arbaban min duni al-lahi wal-masiha ib'na maryama wama umiru illa liya'budu ilahan wahidan la ilaha illa huwa sub'hanahu amma yush'rikuna
1267: yuriduna an yut'fiu nura al-lahi bi-afwahihim wayaba al-lahu illa an yutimma nurahu walaw kariha al-kafiruna
1268: huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wadini al-haqi liyuz'hirahu ala al-dini kullihi walaw kariha al-mush'rikuna
1269: yaayyuha alladhina amanu inna kathiran mina al-ahbari war-ruh'bani layakuluna amwala al-nasi bil-batili wayasudduna an sabili al-lahi wa-alladhina yaknizuna al-dhahaba wal-fidata wala yunfiqunaha fi sabili al-lahi fabashir'hum bi'adhabin alimin
1270: yawma yuh'ma alayha fi nari jahannama fatuk'wa biha jibahuhum wajunubuhum wazuhuruhum hadha ma kanaztum li-anfusikum fadhuqu ma kuntum taknizuna
1271: inna iddata al-shuhuri inda al-lahi ith'na ashara shahran fi kitabi al-lahi yawma khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda min'ha arba'atun hurumun dhalika al-dinu al-qayimu fala tazlimu fihinna anfusakum waqatilu al-mush'rikina kaffatan kama yuqatilunakum kaffatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha ma'a al-mutaqina
1272: innama al-nasiu ziyadatun fi al-kuf'ri yudallu bihi alladhina kafaru yuhillunahu aman wayuharrimunahu aman liyuwatiu iddata ma harrama al-lahu fayuhillu ma harrama al-lahu zuyyina lahum suu a'malihim wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-kafirina
1273: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ma lakum idha qila lakumu infiru fi sabili al-lahi ithaqaltum ila al-ardi araditum bil-hayati al-dun'ya mina al-akhirati fama mata'u al-hayati al-dun'ya fi al-akhirati illa qalilun
1274: illa tanfiru yu'adhib'kum adhaban aliman wayastabdil qawman ghayrakum wala tadurruhu shayan wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
1275: illa tansuruhu faqad nasarahu al-lahu idh akhrajahu alladhina kafaru thaniya ith'nayni idh huma fi al-ghari idh yaqulu lisahibihi la tahzan inna al-laha ma'ana fa-anzala al-lahu sakinatahu alayhi wa-ayyadahu bijunudin lam tarawha waja'ala kalimata alladhina kafaru al-suf'la wakalimatu al-lahi hiya al-'ul'ya wal-lahu azizun hakimun
1276: infiru khifafan wathiqalan wajahidu bi-amwalikum wa-anfusikum fi sabili al-lahi dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
1277: law kana aradan qariban wasafaran qasidan la-ittaba'uka walakin ba'udat alayhimu al-shuqatu wasayahlifuna bil-lahi lawi is'tata'na lakharajna ma'akum yuh'likuna anfusahum wal-lahu ya'lamu innahum lakadhibuna
1278: afa al-lahu anka lima adhinta lahum hatta yatabayyana laka alladhina sadaqu wata'lama al-kadhibina
1279: la yastadhinuka alladhina yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri an yujahidu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim wal-lahu alimun bil-mutaqina
1280: innama yastadhinuka alladhina la yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wa-ir'tabat qulubuhum fahum fi raybihim yataraddaduna
1281: walaw aradu al-khuruja la-a'addu lahu uddatan walakin kariha al-lahu inbi'athahum fathabbatahum waqila uq'udu ma'a al-qa'idina
1282: law kharaju fikum ma zadukum illa khabalan wala-awda'u khilalakum yabghunakumu al-fit'nata wafikum samma'una lahum wal-lahu alimun bil-zalimina
1283: laqadi ib'taghawu al-fit'nata min qablu waqallabu laka al-umura hatta jaa al-haqu wazahara amru al-lahi wahum karihuna
1284: wamin'hum man yaqulu i'dhan li wala taftinni ala fi al-fit'nati saqatu wa-inna jahannama lamuhitatun bil-kafirina
1285: in tusib'ka hasanatun tasu'hum wa-in tusib'ka musibatun yaqulu qad akhadhna amrana min qablu wayatawallaw wahum farihuna
1286: qul lan yusibana illa ma kataba al-lahu lana huwa mawlana wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minuna
1287: qul hal tarabbasuna bina illa ih'da al-hus'nayayni wanahnu natarabbasu bikum an yusibakumu al-lahu bi'adhabin min indihi aw bi-aydina fatarabbasu inna ma'akum mutarabbisuna
1288: qul anfiqu taw'an aw karhan lan yutaqabbala minkum innakum kuntum qawman fasiqina
1289: wama mana'ahum an tuq'bala min'hum nafaqatuhum illa annahum kafaru bil-lahi wabirasulihi wala yatuna al-salata illa wahum kusala wala yunfiquna illa wahum karihuna
1290: fala tu'jib'ka amwaluhum wala awladuhum innama yuridu al-lahu liyu'adhibahum biha fi al-hayati al-dun'ya watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kafiruna
1291: wayahlifuna bil-lahi innahum laminkum wama hum minkum walakinnahum qawmun yafraquna
1292: law yajiduna malja-an aw magharatin aw muddakhalan lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmahuna
1293: wamin'hum man yalmizuka fi al-sadaqati fa-in u'tu min'ha radu wa-in lam yu'taw min'ha idha hum yaskhatuna
1294: walaw annahum radu ma atahumu al-lahu warasuluhu waqalu hasbuna al-lahu sayu'tina al-lahu min fadlihi warasuluhu inna ila al-lahi raghibuna
1295: innama al-sadaqatu lil'fuqarai wal-masakini wal-'amilina alayha wal-mu-alafati qulubuhum wafi ar-riqabi wal-gharimina wafi sabili al-lahi wa-ib'ni al-sabili faridatan mina al-lahi wal-lahu alimun hakimun
1296: wamin'humu alladhina yu'dhuna al-nabiya wayaquluna huwa udhunun qul udhunu khayrin lakum yu'minu bil-lahi wayu'minu lil'mu'minina warahmatun lilladhina amanu minkum wa-alladhina yu'dhuna rasula al-lahi lahum adhabun alimun
1297: yahlifuna bil-lahi lakum liyur'dukum wal-lahu warasuluhu ahaqqu an yur'duhu in kanu mu'minina
1298: alam ya'lamu annahu man yuhadidi al-laha warasulahu fa-anna lahu nara jahannama khalidan fiha dhalika al-khiz'yu al-'azimu
1299: yahdharu al-munafiquna an tunazzala alayhim suratun tunabbi-uhum bima fi qulubihim quli is'tahziu inna al-laha mukh'rijun ma tahdharuna
1300: wala-in sa-altahum layaqulunna innama kunna nakhudu wanal'abu qul abil-lahi waayatihi warasulihi kuntum tastahziuna
1301: la ta'tadhiru qad kafartum ba'da imanikum in na'fu an taifatin minkum nu'adhib taifatan bi-annahum kanu muj'rimina
1302: al-munafiquna wal-munafiqatu ba'duhum min ba'din yamuruna bil-munkari wayanhawna ani al-ma'rufi wayaqbiduna aydiyahum nasu al-laha fanasiyahum inna al-munafiqina humu al-fasiquna
1303: wa'ada al-lahu al-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-kufara nara jahannama khalidina fiha hiya hasbuhum wala'anahumu al-lahu walahum adhabun muqimun
1304: ka-alladhina min qablikum kanu ashadda minkum quwwatan wa-akthara amwalan wa-awladan fa-is'tamta'u bikhalaqihim fa-is'tamta'tum bikhalaqikum kama is'tamta'a alladhina min qablikum bikhalaqihim wakhud'tum ka-alladhi khadu ulaika habitat a'maluhum fi al-dun'ya wal-akhirati wa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna
1305: alam yatihim naba-u alladhina min qablihim qawmi nuhin wa'adin wathamuda waqawmi ib'rahima wa-ashabi madyana wal-mu'tafikati atathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati fama kana al-lahu liyazlimahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
1306: wal-mu'minuna wal-mu'minatu ba'duhum awliyau ba'din yamuruna bil-ma'rufi wayanhawna ani al-munkari wayuqimuna al-salata wayu'tuna al-zakata wayuti'una al-laha warasulahu ulaika sayarhamuhumu al-lahu inna al-laha azizun hakimun
1307: wa'ada al-lahu al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha wamasakina tayyibatan fi jannati adnin warid'wanun mina al-lahi akbaru dhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
1308: yaayyuha al-nabiyu jahidi al-kufara wal-munafiqina wa-ugh'luz alayhim wamawahum jahannamu wabi'sa al-masiru
1309: yahlifuna bil-lahi ma qalu walaqad qalu kalimata al-kuf'ri wakafaru ba'da is'lamihim wahammu bima lam yanalu wama naqamu illa an aghnahumu al-lahu warasuluhu min fadlihi fa-in yatubu yaku khayran lahum wa-in yatawallaw yu'adhib'humu al-lahu adhaban aliman fi al-dun'ya wal-akhirati wama lahum fi al-ardi min waliyyin wala nasirin
1310: wamin'hum man ahada al-laha la-in atana min fadlihi lanassaddaqanna walanakunanna mina al-salihina
1311: falamma atahum min fadlihi bakhilu bihi watawallaw wahum mu'riduna
1312: fa-a'qabahum nifaqan fi qulubihim ila yawmi yalqawnahu bima akhlafu al-laha ma wa'aduhu wabima kanu yakdhibuna
1313: alam ya'lamu anna al-laha ya'lamu sirrahum wanajwahum wa-anna al-laha allamu al-ghuyubi
1314: alladhina yalmizuna al-mutawi'ina mina al-mu'minina fi al-sadaqati wa-alladhina la yajiduna illa juh'dahum fayaskharuna min'hum sakhira al-lahu min'hum walahum adhabun alimun
1315: is'taghfir lahum aw la tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sab'ina marratan falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum dhalika bi-annahum kafaru bil-lahi warasulihi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
1316: fariha al-mukhalafuna bimaq'adihim khilafa rasuli al-lahi wakarihu an yujahidu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili al-lahi waqalu la tanfiru fi al-hari qul naru jahannama ashaddu harran law kanu yafqahuna
1317: falyadhaku qalilan walyabku kathiran jazaan bima kanu yaksibuna
1318: fa-in raja'aka al-lahu ila taifatin min'hum fa-is'tadhanuka lil'khuruji faqul lan takhruju ma'iya abadan walan tuqatilu ma'iya aduwwan innakum raditum bil-qu'udi awwala marratin fa-uq'udu ma'a al-khalifina
1319: wala tusalli ala ahadin min'hum mata abadan wala taqum ala qabrihi innahum kafaru bil-lahi warasulihi wamatu wahum fasiquna
1320: wala tu'jib'ka amwaluhum wa-awladuhum innama yuridu al-lahu an yu'adhibahum biha fi al-dun'ya watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kafiruna
1321: wa-idha unzilat suratun an aminu bil-lahi wajahidu ma'a rasulihi is'tadhanaka ulu al-tawli min'hum waqalu dharna nakun ma'a al-qa'idina
1322: radu bi-an yakunu ma'a al-khawalifi watubi'a ala qulubihim fahum la yafqahuna
1323: lakini ar-rasulu wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu jahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim wa-ulaika lahumu al-khayratu wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
1324: a'adda al-lahu lahum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
1325: wajaa al-mu'adhiruna mina al-a'rabi liyu'dhana lahum waqa'ada alladhina kadhabu al-laha warasulahu sayusibu alladhina kafaru min'hum adhabun alimun
1326: laysa ala al-du'afai wala ala al-marda wala ala alladhina la yajiduna ma yunfiquna harajun idha nasahu lillahi warasulihi ma ala al-muh'sinina min sabilin wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
1327: wala ala alladhina idha ma atawka litahmilahum qul'ta la ajidu ma ahmilukum alayhi tawallaw wa-a'yunuhum tafidu mina al-dam'i hazanan alla yajidu ma yunfiquna
1328: innama al-sabilu ala alladhina yastadhinunaka wahum aghniyau radu bi-an yakunu ma'a al-khawalifi wataba'a al-lahu ala qulubihim fahum la ya'lamuna
1329: ya'tadhiruna ilaykum idha raja'tum ilayhim qul la ta'tadhiru lan nu'mina lakum qad nabba-ana al-lahu min akhbarikum wasayara al-lahu amalakum warasuluhu thumma turadduna ila alimi al-ghaybi wal-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
1330: sayahlifuna bil-lahi lakum idha inqalabtum ilayhim litu'ridu anhum fa-a'ridu anhum innahum rij'sun wamawahum jahannamu jazaan bima kanu yaksibuna
1331: yahlifuna lakum litardaw anhum fa-in tardaw anhum fa-inna al-laha la yarda ani al-qawmi al-fasiqina
1332: al-a'rabu ashaddu kuf'ran wanifaqan wa-ajdaru alla ya'lamu hududa ma anzala al-lahu ala rasulihi wal-lahu alimun hakimun
1333: wamina al-a'rabi man yattakhidhu ma yunfiqu maghraman wayatarabbasu bikumu al-dawaira alayhim dairatu al-sawi wal-lahu sami'un alimun
1334: wamina al-a'rabi man yu'minu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri wayattakhidhu ma yunfiqu qurubatin inda al-lahi wasalawati ar-rasuli ala innaha qur'batun lahum sayud'khiluhumu al-lahu fi rahmatihi inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
1335: wal-sabiquna al-awaluna mina al-muhajirina wal-ansari wa-alladhina ittaba'uhum bi-ih'sanin radiya al-lahu anhum waradu anhu wa-a'adda lahum jannatin tajri tahtaha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
1336: wamimman hawlakum mina al-a'rabi munafiquna wamin ahli al-madinati maradu ala al-nifaqi la ta'lamuhum nahnu na'lamuhum sanu'adhibuhum marratayni thumma yuradduna ila adhabin azimin
1337: waakharuna i'tarafu bidhunubihim khalatu amalan salihan waakhara sayyi-an asa al-lahu an yatuba alayhim inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
1338: khudh min amwalihim sadaqatan tutahhiruhum watuzakkihim biha wasalli alayhim inna salataka sakanun lahum wal-lahu sami'un alimun
1339: alam ya'lamu anna al-laha huwa yaqbalu al-tawbata an ibadihi wayakhudhu al-sadaqati wa-anna al-laha huwa al-tawabu ar-rahimu
1340: waquli i'malu fasayara al-lahu amalakum warasuluhu wal-mu'minuna wasaturadduna ila alimi al-ghaybi wal-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
1341: waakharuna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi imma yu'adhibuhum wa-imma yatubu alayhim wal-lahu alimun hakimun
1342: wa-alladhina ittakhadhu masjidan diraran wakuf'ran watafriqan bayna al-mu'minina wa-ir'sadan liman haraba al-laha warasulahu min qablu walayahlifunna in aradna illa al-hus'na wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna
1343: la taqum fihi abadan lamasjidun ussisa ala al-taqwa min awwali yawmin ahaqqu an taquma fihi fihi rijalun yuhibbuna an yatatahharu wal-lahu yuhibbu al-mutahirina
1344: afaman assasa bun'yanahu ala taqwa mina al-lahi warid'wanin khayrun am man assasa bun'yanahu ala shafa jurufin harin fa-in'hara bihi fi nari jahannama wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
1345: la yazalu bun'yanuhumu alladhi banaw ribatan fi qulubihim illa an taqatta'a qulubuhum wal-lahu alimun hakimun
1346: inna al-laha ish'tara mina al-mu'minina anfusahum wa-amwalahum bi-anna lahumu al-janata yuqatiluna fi sabili al-lahi fayaqtuluna wayuq'taluna wa'dan alayhi haqqan fi al-tawrati wal-injili wal-qur'ani waman awfa bi'ahdihi mina al-lahi fa-is'tabshiru bibay'ikumu alladhi baya'tum bihi wadhalika huwa al-fawzu al-'azimu
1347: al-taibuna al-'abiduna al-hamiduna al-saihuna ar-raki'una al-sajiduna al-amiruna bil-ma'rufi wal-nahuna ani al-munkari wal-hafizuna lihududi al-lahi wabashiri al-mu'minina
1348: ma kana lilnnabiyyi wa-alladhina amanu an yastaghfiru lil'mush'rikina walaw kanu uli qur'ba min ba'di ma tabayyana lahum annahum ashabu al-jahimi
1349: wama kana is'tigh'faru ib'rahima li-abihi illa an maw'idatin wa'adaha iyyahu falamma tabayyana lahu annahu aduwwun lillahi tabarra-a min'hu inna ib'rahima la-awwahun halimun
1350: wama kana al-lahu liyudilla qawman ba'da idh hadahum hatta yubayyina lahum ma yattaquna inna al-laha bikulli shayin alimun
1351: inna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samawati wal-ardi yuh'yi wayumitu wama lakum min duni al-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin
1352: laqad taba al-lahu ala al-nabiyi wal-muhajirina wal-ansari alladhina ittaba'uhu fi sa'ati al-'us'rati min ba'di ma kada yazighu qulubu fariqin min'hum thumma taba alayhim innahu bihim raufun rahimun
1353: wa'ala al-thalathati alladhina khullifu hatta idha daqat alayhimu al-ardu bima rahubat wadaqat alayhim anfusuhum wazannu an la malja-a mina al-lahi illa ilayhi thumma taba alayhim liyatubu inna al-laha huwa al-tawabu ar-rahimu
1354: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha wakunu ma'a al-sadiqina
1355: ma kana li-ahli al-madinati waman hawlahum mina al-a'rabi an yatakhallafu an rasuli al-lahi wala yarghabu bi-anfusihim an nafsihi dhalika bi-annahum la yusibuhum zama-on wala nasabun wala makhmasatun fi sabili al-lahi wala yatauna mawti-an yaghizu al-kufara wala yanaluna min aduwwin naylan illa kutiba lahum bihi amalun salihun inna al-laha la yudi'u ajra al-muh'sinina
1356: wala yunfiquna nafaqatan saghiratan wala kabiratan wala yaqta'una wadiyan illa kutiba lahum liyajziyahumu al-lahu ahsana ma kanu ya'maluna
1357: wama kana al-mu'minuna liyanfiru kaffatan falawla nafara min kulli fir'qatin min'hum taifatun liyatafaqqahu fi al-dini waliyundhiru qawmahum idha raja'u ilayhim la'allahum yahdharuna
1358: yaayyuha alladhina amanu qatilu alladhina yalunakum mina al-kufari walyajidu fikum ghil'zatan wa-i'lamu anna al-laha ma'a al-mutaqina
1359: wa-idha ma unzilat suratun famin'hum man yaqulu ayyukum zadathu hadhihi imanan fa-amma alladhina amanu fazadathum imanan wahum yastabshiruna
1360: wa-amma alladhina fi qulubihim maradun fazadathum rij'san ila rij'sihim wamatu wahum kafiruna
1361: awala yarawna annahum yuf'tanuna fi kulli amin marratan aw marratayni thumma la yatubuna wala hum yadhakkaruna
1362: wa-idha ma unzilat suratun nazara ba'duhum ila ba'din hal yarakum min ahadin thumma insarafu sarafa al-lahu qulubahum bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
1363: laqad jaakum rasulun min anfusikum azizun alayhi ma anittum harisun alaykum bil-mu'minina raufun rahimun
1364: fa-in tawallaw faqul hasbiya al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa alayhi tawakkaltu wahuwa rabbu al-'arshi al-'azimi
1366: akana lilnnasi ajaban an awhayna ila rajulin min'hum an andhiri al-nasa wabashiri alladhina amanu anna lahum qadama sid'qin inda rabbihim qala al-kafiruna inna hadha lasahirun mubinun
1367: inna rabbakumu al-lahu alladhi khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda fi sittati ayyamin thumma is'tawa ala al-'arshi yudabbiru al-amra ma min shafi'in illa min ba'di idh'nihi dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum fa-u'buduhu afala tadhakkaruna
1368: ilayhi marji'ukum jami'an wa'da al-lahi haqqan innahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati bil-qis'ti wa-alladhina kafaru lahum sharabun min hamimin wa'adhabun alimun bima kanu yakfuruna
1369: huwa alladhi ja'ala al-shamsa diyaan wal-qamara nuran waqaddarahu manazila lita'lamu adada al-sinina wal-hisaba ma khalaqa al-lahu dhalika illa bil-haqi yufassilu al-ayati liqawmin ya'lamuna
1370: inna fi ikh'tilafi al-layli wal-nahari wama khalaqa al-lahu fi al-samawati wal-ardi laayatin liqawmin yattaquna
1371: inna alladhina la yarjuna liqaana waradu bil-hayati al-dun'ya wa-it'ma-annu biha wa-alladhina hum an ayatina ghafiluna
1372: ulaika mawahumu al-naru bima kanu yaksibuna
1373: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati yahdihim rabbuhum biimanihim tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu fi jannati al-na'imi
1374: da'wahum fiha sub'hanaka al-lahuma watahiyyatuhum fiha salamun waakhiru da'wahum ani al-hamdu lillahi rabbi al-'alamina
1375: walaw yu'ajjilu al-lahu lilnnasi al-shara is'ti'jalahum bil-khayri laqudiya ilayhim ajaluhum fanadharu alladhina la yarjuna liqaana fi tugh'yanihim ya'mahuna
1376: wa-idha massa al-insana al-duru da'ana lijanbihi aw qa'idan aw qaiman falamma kashafna anhu durrahu marra ka-an lam yad'una ila durrin massahu kadhalika zuyyina lil'mus'rifina ma kanu ya'maluna
1377: walaqad ahlakna al-quruna min qablikum lamma zalamu wajaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati wama kanu liyu'minu kadhalika najzi al-qawma al-muj'rimina
1378: thumma ja'alnakum khalaifa fi al-ardi min ba'dihim linanzura kayfa ta'maluna
1379: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala alladhina la yarjuna liqaana i'ti biqur'anin ghayri hadha aw baddil'hu qul ma yakunu li an ubaddilahu min til'qai nafsi in attabi'u illa ma yuha ilayya inni akhafu in asaytu rabbi adhaba yawmin azimin
1380: qul law shaa al-lahu ma talawtuhu alaykum wala adrakum bihi faqad labith'tu fikum umuran min qablihi afala ta'qiluna
1381: faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biayatihi innahu la yuf'lihu al-muj'rimuna
1382: waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yadurruhum wala yanfa'uhum wayaquluna haulai shufa'auna inda al-lahi qul atunabbiuna al-laha bima la ya'lamu fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
1383: wama kana al-nasu illa ummatan wahidatan fa-ikh'talafu walawla kalimatun sabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum fima fihi yakhtalifuna
1384: wayaquluna lawla unzila alayhi ayatun min rabbihi faqul innama al-ghaybu lillahi fa-intaziru inni ma'akum mina al-muntazirina
1385: wa-idha adhaqna al-nasa rahmatan min ba'di darraa massathum idha lahum makrun fi ayatina quli al-lahu asra'u makran inna rusulana yaktubuna ma tamkuruna
1386: huwa alladhi yusayyirukum fi al-bari wal-bahri hatta idha kuntum fi al-ful'ki wajarayna bihim birihin tayyibatin wafarihu biha jaatha rihun asifun wajaahumu al-mawju min kulli makanin wazannu annahum uhita bihim da'awu al-laha mukh'lisina lahu al-dina la-in anjaytana min hadhihi lanakunanna mina al-shakirina
1387: falamma anjahum idha hum yabghuna fi al-ardi bighayri al-haqi yaayyuha al-nasu innama baghyukum ala anfusikum mata'a al-hayati al-dun'ya thumma ilayna marji'ukum fanunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
1388: innama mathalu al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi mimma yakulu al-nasu wal-an'amu hatta idha akhadhati al-ardu zukh'rufaha wa-izzayyanat wazanna ahluha annahum qadiruna alayha ataha amruna laylan aw naharan faja'alnaha hasidan ka-an lam taghna bil-amsi kadhalika nufassilu al-ayati liqawmin yatafakkaruna
1389: wal-lahu yad'u ila dari al-salami wayahdi man yashau ila siratin mus'taqimin
1390: lilladhina ahsanu al-hus'na waziyadatun wala yarhaqu wujuhahum qatarun wala dhillatun ulaika ashabu al-janati hum fiha khaliduna
1391: wa-alladhina kasabu al-sayiati jazau sayyi-atin bimith'liha watarhaquhum dhillatun ma lahum mina al-lahi min asimin ka-annama ugh'shiyat wujuhuhum qita'an mina al-layli muz'liman ulaika ashabu al-nari hum fiha khaliduna
1392: wayawma nahshuruhum jami'an thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku makanakum antum washurakaukum fazayyalna baynahum waqala shurakauhum ma kuntum iyyana ta'buduna
1393: fakafa bil-lahi shahidan baynana wabaynakum in kunna an ibadatikum laghafilina
1394: hunalika tablu kullu nafsin ma aslafat waruddu ila al-lahi mawlahumu al-haqi wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
1395: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samai wal-ardi amman yamliku al-sam'a wal-absara waman yukh'riju al-haya mina al-mayiti wayukh'riju al-mayita mina al-hayi waman yudabbiru al-amra fasayaquluna al-lahu faqul afala tattaquna
1396: fadhalikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-haqu famadha ba'da al-haqi illa al-dalalu fa-anna tus'rafuna
1397: kadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ala alladhina fasaqu annahum la yu'minuna
1398: qul hal min shurakaikum man yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu quli al-lahu yabda-u al-khalqa thumma yu'iduhu fa-anna tu'fakuna

1865: qalu bal ji'naka bima kanu fihi yamtaruna
1867: fa-asri bi-ahlika biqit'in mina al-layli wa-ittabi' adbarahum wala yaltafit minkum ahadun wa-im'du haythu tu'maruna
1868: waqadayna ilayhi dhalika al-amra anna dabira haulai maqtu'un mus'bihina
1870: qala inna haulai dayfi fala tafdahuni
1873: qala haulai banati in kuntum fa'ilina
1876: faja'alna aliyaha safilaha wa-amtarna alayhim hijaratan min sijjilin

1886: fama aghna anhum ma kanu yaksibuna

1889: walaqad ataynaka sab'an mina al-mathani wal-qur'ana al-'azima
1890: la tamuddanna aynayka ila ma matta'na bihi azwajan min'hum wala tahzan alayhim wa-ikh'fid janahaka lil'mu'minina
1896: fa-is'da' bima tu'maru wa-a'rid ani al-mush'rikina

1899: walaqad na'lamu annaka yadiqu sadruka bima yaquluna

1902: ata amru al-lahi fala tasta'jiluhu sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna
1903: yunazzilu al-malaikata bil-ruhi min amrihi ala man yashau min ibadihi an andhiru annahu la ilaha illa ana fa-ittaquni
1904: khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi ta'ala amma yush'rikuna
1905: khalaqa al-insana min nut'fatin fa-idha huwa khasimun mubinun
1906: wal-an'ama khalaqaha lakum fiha dif'on wamanafi'u wamin'ha takuluna
1907: walakum fiha jamalun hina turihuna wahina tasrahuna
1908: watahmilu athqalakum ila baladin lam takunu balighihi illa bishiqqi al-anfusi inna rabbakum laraufun rahimun
1909: wal-khayla wal-bighala wal-hamira litarkabuha wazinatan wayakhluqu ma la ta'lamuna
1910: wa'ala al-lahi qasdu al-sabili wamin'ha jairun walaw shaa lahadakum ajma'ina
1911: huwa alladhi anzala mina al-samai maan lakum min'hu sharabun wamin'hu shajarun fihi tusimuna
1912: yunbitu lakum bihi al-zar'a wal-zaytuna wal-nakhila wal-a'naba wamin kulli al-thamarati inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yatafakkaruna
1913: wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahara wal-shamsa wal-qamara wal-nujumu musakharatun bi-amrihi inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin ya'qiluna
1914: wama dhara-a lakum fi al-ardi mukh'talifan alwanuhu inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yadhakkaruna
1915: wahuwa alladhi sakhara al-bahra litakulu min'hu lahman tariyyan watastakhriju min'hu hil'yatan talbasunaha watara al-ful'ka mawakhira fihi walitabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
1916: wa-alqa fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wa-anharan wasubulan la'allakum tahtaduna
1918: afaman yakhluqu kaman la yakhluqu afala tadhakkaruna
1919: wa-in ta'uddu ni'mata al-lahi la tuh'suha inna al-laha laghafurun rahimun
1920: wal-lahu ya'lamu ma tusirruna wama tu'linuna
1921: wa-alladhina yad'una min duni al-lahi la yakhluquna shayan wahum yukh'laquna
1922: amwatun ghayru ahyain wama yash'uruna ayyana yub'athuna
1923: ilahukum ilahun wahidun fa-alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati qulubuhum munkiratun wahum mus'takbiruna
1924: la jarama anna al-laha ya'lamu ma yusirruna wama yu'linuna innahu la yuhibbu al-mus'takbirina
1925: wa-idha qila lahum madha anzala rabbukum qalu asatiru al-awalina
1926: liyahmilu awzarahum kamilatan yawma al-qiyamati wamin awzari alladhina yudillunahum bighayri il'min ala saa ma yaziruna
1927: qad makara alladhina min qablihim fa-ata al-lahu bun'yanahum mina al-qawa'idi fakharra alayhimu al-saqfu min fawqihim wa-atahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
1928: thumma yawma al-qiyamati yukh'zihim wayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum tushaqquna fihim qala alladhina utu al-'il'ma inna al-khiz'ya al-yawma wal-sua ala al-kafirina
1929: alladhina tatawaffahumu al-malaikatu zalimi anfusihim fa-alqawu al-salama ma kunna na'malu min suin bala inna al-laha alimun bima kuntum ta'maluna
1930: fa-ud'khulu abwaba jahannama khalidina fiha falabi'sa mathwa al-mutakabirina
1931: waqila lilladhina ittaqaw madha anzala rabbukum qalu khayran lilladhina ahsanu fi hadhihi al-dun'ya hasanatun waladaru al-akhirati khayrun walani'ma daru al-mutaqina
1932: jannatu adnin yadkhulunaha tajri min tahtiha al-anharu lahum fiha ma yashauna kadhalika yajzi al-lahu al-mutaqina
1933: alladhina tatawaffahumu al-malaikatu tayyibina yaquluna salamun alaykumu ud'khulu al-janata bima kuntum ta'maluna
1934: hal yanzuruna illa an tatiyahumu al-malaikatu aw yatiya amru rabbika kadhalika fa'ala alladhina min qablihim wama zalamahumu al-lahu walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
1935: fa-asabahum sayyiatu ma amilu wahaqa bihim ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
1936: waqala alladhina ashraku law shaa al-lahu ma abadna min dunihi min shayin nahnu wala abauna wala harramna min dunihi min shayin kadhalika fa'ala alladhina min qablihim fahal ala ar-rusuli illa al-balaghu al-mubinu
1937: walaqad ba'athna fi kulli ummatin rasulan ani u'budu al-laha wa-ij'tanibu al-taghuta famin'hum man hada al-lahu wamin'hum man haqqat alayhi al-dalalatu fasiru fi al-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana aqibatu al-mukadhibina
1938: in tahris ala hudahum fa-inna al-laha la yahdi man yudillu wama lahum min nasirina
1939: wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la yab'athu al-lahu man yamutu bala wa'dan alayhi haqqan walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
1940: liyubayyina lahumu alladhi yakhtalifuna fihi waliya'lama alladhina kafaru annahum kanu kadhibina
1941: innama qawluna lishayin idha aradnahu an naqula lahu kun fayakunu
1942: wa-alladhina hajaru fi al-lahi min ba'di ma zulimu lanubawwi-annahum fi al-dun'ya hasanatan wala-ajru al-akhirati akbaru law kanu ya'lamuna
1944: wama arsalna min qablika illa rijalan nuhi ilayhim fasalu ahla al-dhik'ri in kuntum la ta'lamuna
1945: bil-bayinati wal-zuburi wa-anzalna ilayka al-dhik'ra litubayyina lilnnasi ma nuzzila ilayhim wala'allahum yatafakkaruna
1946: afa-amina alladhina makaru al-sayiati an yakhsifa al-lahu bihimu al-arda aw yatiyahumu al-'adhabu min haythu la yash'uruna
1947: aw yakhudhahum fi taqallubihim fama hum bimu'jizina
1948: aw yakhudhahum ala takhawwufin fa-inna rabbakum laraufun rahimun
1949: awalam yaraw ila ma khalaqa al-lahu min shayin yatafayya-u zilaluhu ani al-yamini wal-shamaili sujjadan lillahi wahum dakhiruna
1950: walillahi yasjudu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi min dabbatin wal-malaikatu wahum la yastakbiruna
1951: yakhafuna rabbahum min fawqihim wayaf 'aluna ma yu'maruna
1952: waqala al-lahu la tattakhidhu ilahayni ith'nayni innama huwa ilahun wahidun fa-iyyaya fa-ir'habuni
1953: walahu ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi walahu al-dinu wasiban afaghayra al-lahi tattaquna
1954: wama bikum min ni'matin famina al-lahi thumma idha massakumu al-duru fa-ilayhi tajaruna
1955: thumma idha kashafa al-dura ankum idha fariqun minkum birabbihim yush'rikuna
1956: liyakfuru bima ataynahum fatamatta'u fasawfa ta'lamuna
1957: wayaj'aluna lima la ya'lamuna nasiban mimma razaqnahum tal-lahi latus'alunna amma kuntum taftaruna
1958: wayaj'aluna lillahi al-banati sub'hanahu walahum ma yashtahuna
1959: wa-idha bushira ahaduhum bil-untha zalla wajhuhu mus'waddan wahuwa kazimun
1960: yatawara mina al-qawmi min sui ma bushira bihi ayum'sikuhu ala hunin am yadussuhu fi al-turabi ala saa ma yahkumuna
1961: lilladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati mathalu al-sawi walillahi al-mathalu al-a'la wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
1962: walaw yuakhidhu al-lahu al-nasa bizul'mihim ma taraka alayha min dabbatin walakin yu-akhiruhum ila ajalin musamman fa-idha jaa ajaluhum la yastakhiruna sa'atan wala yastaqdimuna
1963: wayaj'aluna lillahi ma yakrahuna watasifu alsinatuhumu al-kadhiba anna lahumu al-hus'na la jarama anna lahumu al-nara wa-annahum muf'ratuna
1964: tal-lahi laqad arsalna ila umamin min qablika fazayyana lahumu al-shaytanu a'malahum fahuwa waliyyuhumu al-yawma walahum adhabun alimun
1965: wama anzalna alayka al-kitaba illa litubayyina lahumu alladhi ikh'talafu fihi wahudan warahmatan liqawmin yu'minuna
1966: wal-lahu anzala mina al-samai maan fa-ahya bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yasma'una
1967: wa-inna lakum fi al-an'ami la'ib'ratan nus'qikum mimma fi butunihi min bayni farthin wadamin labanan khalisan saighan lilsharibina
1968: wamin thamarati al-nakhili wal-a'nabi tattakhidhuna min'hu sakaran wariz'qan hasanan inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin ya'qiluna
1969: wa-awha rabbuka ila al-nahli ani ittakhidhi mina al-jibali buyutan wamina al-shajari wamimma ya'rishuna
1970: thumma kuli min kulli al-thamarati fa-us'luki subula rabbiki dhululan yakhruju min butuniha sharabun mukh'talifun alwanuhu fihi shifaon lilnnasi inna fi dhalika laayatan liqawmin yatafakkaruna
1971: wal-lahu khalaqakum thumma yatawaffakum waminkum man yuraddu ila ardhali al-'umuri likay la ya'lama ba'da il'min shayan inna al-laha alimun qadirun
1972: wal-lahu faddala ba'dakum ala ba'din fi ar-riz'qi fama alladhina fuddilu biraddi riz'qihim ala ma malakat aymanuhum fahum fihi sawaon afabini'mati al-lahi yajhaduna
1973: wal-lahu ja'ala lakum min anfusikum azwajan waja'ala lakum min azwajikum banina wahafadatan warazaqakum mina al-tayibati afabil-batili yu'minuna wabini'mati al-lahi hum yakfuruna
1974: waya'buduna min duni al-lahi ma la yamliku lahum riz'qan mina al-samawati wal-ardi shayan wala yastati'una
1975: fala tadribu lillahi al-amthala inna al-laha ya'lamu wa-antum la ta'lamuna
1976: daraba al-lahu mathalan abdan mamlukan la yaqdiru ala shayin waman razaqnahu minna riz'qan hasanan fahuwa yunfiqu min'hu sirran wajahran hal yastawuna al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
1977: wadaraba al-lahu mathalan rajulayni ahaduhuma abkamu la yaqdiru ala shayin wahuwa kallun ala mawlahu aynama yuwajjihhu la yati bikhayrin hal yastawi huwa waman yamuru bil-'adli wahuwa ala siratin mus'taqimin
1978: walillahi ghaybu al-samawati wal-ardi wama amru al-sa'ati illa kalamhi al-basari aw huwa aqrabu inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
1979: wal-lahu akhrajakum min butuni ummahatikum la ta'lamuna shayan waja'ala lakumu al-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata la'allakum tashkuruna
1980: alam yaraw ila al-tayri musakharatin fi jawwi al-samai ma yum'sikuhunna illa al-lahu inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna
1981: wal-lahu ja'ala lakum min buyutikum sakanan waja'ala lakum min juludi al-an'ami buyutan tastakhiffunaha yawma za'nikum wayawma iqamatikum wamin aswafiha wa-awbariha wa-ash'ariha athathan wamata'an ila hinin
1982: wal-lahu ja'ala lakum mimma khalaqa zilalan waja'ala lakum mina al-jibali aknanan waja'ala lakum sarabila taqikumu al-hara wasarabila taqikum basakum kadhalika yutimmu ni'matahu alaykum la'allakum tus'limuna
1983: fa-in tawallaw fa-innama alayka al-balaghu al-mubinu
1984: ya'rifuna ni'mata al-lahi thumma yunkirunaha wa-aktharuhumu al-kafiruna
1985: wayawma nab'athu min kulli ummatin shahidan thumma la yu'dhanu lilladhina kafaru wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
1986: wa-idha raa alladhina zalamu al-'adhaba fala yukhaffafu anhum wala hum yunzaruna
1987: wa-idha raa alladhina ashraku shurakaahum qalu rabbana haulai shurakauna alladhina kunna nad'u min dunika fa-alqaw ilayhimu al-qawla innakum lakadhibuna
1988: wa-alqaw ila al-lahi yawma-idhin al-salama wadalla anhum ma kanu yaftaruna
1989: alladhina kafaru wasaddu an sabili al-lahi zid'nahum adhaban fawqa al-'adhabi bima kanu yuf'siduna
1990: wayawma nab'athu fi kulli ummatin shahidan alayhim min anfusihim waji'na bika shahidan ala haulai wanazzalna alayka al-kitaba tib'yanan likulli shayin wahudan warahmatan wabush'ra lil'mus'limina
1991: inna al-laha yamuru bil-'adli wal-ih'sani waitai dhi al-qur'ba wayanha ani al-fahshai wal-munkari wal-baghyi ya'izukum la'allakum tadhakkaruna
1992: wa-awfu bi'ahdi al-lahi idha ahadttum wala tanqudu al-aymana ba'da tawkidiha waqad ja'altumu al-laha alaykum kafilan inna al-laha ya'lamu ma taf 'aluna
1993: wala takunu ka-allati naqadat ghazlaha min ba'di quwwatin ankathan tattakhidhuna aymanakum dakhalan baynakum an takuna ummatun hiya arba min ummatin innama yablukumu al-lahu bihi walayubayyinanna lakum yawma al-qiyamati ma kuntum fihi takhtalifuna
1994: walaw shaa al-lahu laja'alakum ummatan wahidatan walakin yudillu man yashau wayahdi man yashau walatus'alunna amma kuntum ta'maluna
1995: wala tattakhidhu aymanakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun ba'da thubutiha watadhuqu al-sua bima sadadttum an sabili al-lahi walakum adhabun azimun
1996: wala tashtaru bi'ahdi al-lahi thamanan qalilan innama inda al-lahi huwa khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
1997: ma indakum yanfadu wama inda al-lahi baqin walanajziyanna alladhina sabaru ajrahum bi-ahsani ma kanu ya'maluna
1998: man amila salihan min dhakarin aw untha wahuwa mu'minun falanuh'yiyannahu hayatan tayyibatan walanajziyannahum ajrahum bi-ahsani ma kanu ya'maluna
1999: fa-idha qarata al-qur'ana fa-is'ta'idh bil-lahi mina al-shaytani ar-rajimi
2000: innahu laysa lahu sul'tanun ala alladhina amanu wa'ala rabbihim yatawakkaluna
2001: innama sul'tanuhu ala alladhina yatawallawnahu wa-alladhina hum bihi mush'rikuna
2002: wa-idha baddalna ayatan makana ayatin wal-lahu a'lamu bima yunazzilu qalu innama anta muf'tarin bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
2003: qul nazzalahu ruhu al-qudusi min rabbika bil-haqi liyuthabbita alladhina amanu wahudan wabush'ra lil'mus'limina
2004: walaqad na'lamu annahum yaquluna innama yu'allimuhu basharun lisanu alladhi yul'hiduna ilayhi a'jamiyyun wahadha lisanun arabiyyun mubinun
2005: inna alladhina la yu'minuna biayati al-lahi la yahdihimu al-lahu walahum adhabun alimun
2006: innama yaftari al-kadhiba alladhina la yu'minuna biayati al-lahi wa-ulaika humu al-kadhibuna
2007: man kafara bil-lahi min ba'di imanihi illa man uk'riha waqalbuhu mut'ma-innun bil-imani walakin man sharaha bil-kuf'ri sadran fa'alayhim ghadabun mina al-lahi walahum adhabun azimun
2008: dhalika bi-annahumu is'tahabbu al-hayata al-dun'ya ala al-akhirati wa-anna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-kafirina
2009: ulaika alladhina taba'a al-lahu ala qulubihim wasam'ihim wa-absarihim wa-ulaika humu al-ghafiluna
2010: la jarama annahum fi al-akhirati humu al-khasiruna
2011: thumma inna rabbaka lilladhina hajaru min ba'di ma futinu thumma jahadu wasabaru inna rabbaka min ba'diha laghafurun rahimun
2012: yawma tati kullu nafsin tujadilu an nafsiha watuwaffa kullu nafsin ma amilat wahum la yuz'lamuna
2013: wadaraba al-lahu mathalan qaryatan kanat aminatan mut'ma-innatan yatiha riz'quha raghadan min kulli makanin fakafarat bi-an'umi al-lahi fa-adhaqaha al-lahu libasa al-ju'i wal-khawfi bima kanu yasna'una
2014: walaqad jaahum rasulun min'hum fakadhabuhu fa-akhadhahumu al-'adhabu wahum zalimuna
2015: fakulu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu halalan tayyiban wa-ush'kuru ni'mata al-lahi in kuntum iyyahu ta'buduna
2016: innama harrama alaykumu al-maytata wal-dama walahma al-khinziri wama uhilla lighayri al-lahi bihi famani ud'turra ghayra baghin wala adin fa-inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
2017: wala taqulu lima tasifu alsinatukumu al-kadhiba hadha halalun wahadha haramun litaftaru ala al-lahi al-kadhiba inna alladhina yaftaruna ala al-lahi al-kadhiba la yuf'lihuna
2019: wa'ala alladhina hadu harramna ma qasasna alayka min qablu wama zalamnahum walakin kanu anfusahum yazlimuna
2020: thumma inna rabbaka lilladhina amilu al-sua bijahalatin thumma tabu min ba'di dhalika wa-aslahu inna rabbaka min ba'diha laghafurun rahimun
2021: inna ib'rahima kana ummatan qanitan lillahi hanifan walam yaku mina al-mush'rikina
2022: shakiran li-an'umihi ij'tabahu wahadahu ila siratin mus'taqimin
2023: waataynahu fi al-dun'ya hasanatan wa-innahu fi al-akhirati lamina al-salihina
2024: thumma awhayna ilayka ani ittabi' millata ib'rahima hanifan wama kana mina al-mush'rikina

2026: ud'u ila sabili rabbika bil-hik'mati wal-maw'izati al-hasanati wajadil'hum bi-allati hiya ahsanu inna rabbaka huwa a'lamu biman dalla an sabilihi wahuwa a'lamu bil-muh'tadina
2027: wa-in aqabtum fa'aqibu bimith'li ma uqib'tum bihi wala-in sabartum lahuwa khayrun lilssabirina

2041: waja'alna al-layla wal-nahara ayatayni famahawna ayata al-layli waja'alna ayata al-nahari mub'siratan litabtaghu fadlan min rabbikum walita'lamu adada al-sinina wal-hisaba wakulla shayin fassalnahu tafsilan

3322: wahuwa al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa lahu al-hamdu fi al-ula wal-akhirati walahu al-huk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
3323: qul ara-aytum in ja'ala al-lahu alaykumu al-layla sarmadan ila yawmi al-qiyamati man ilahun ghayru al-lahi yatikum bidiyain afala tasma'una

3326: wayawma yunadihim fayaqulu ayna shurakaiya alladhina kuntum taz'umuna

3351: walaya'lamanna al-lahu alladhina amanu walaya'lamanna al-munafiqina

3353: walayahmilunna athqalahum wa-athqalan ma'a athqalihim walayus'alunna yawma al-qiyamati amma kanu yaftaruna
3354: walaqad arsalna nuhan ila qawmihi falabitha fihim alfa sanatin illa khamsina aman fa-akhadhahumu al-tufanu wahum zalimuna
3355: fa-anjaynahu wa-ashaba al-safinati waja'alnaha ayatan lil'alamina
3356: wa-ib'rahima idh qala liqawmihi u'budu al-laha wa-ittaquhu dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
3357: innama ta'buduna min duni al-lahi awthanan watakhluquna if'kan inna alladhina ta'buduna min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna lakum riz'qan fa-ib'taghu inda al-lahi ar-riz'qa wa-u'buduhu wa-ush'kuru lahu ilayhi tur'ja'una

3361: yu'adhibu man yashau wayarhamu man yashau wa-ilayhi tuq'labuna
3362: wama antum bimu'jizina fi al-ardi wala fi al-samai wama lakum min duni al-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin

3364: fama kana jawaba qawmihi illa an qalu uq'tuluhu aw harriquhu fa-anjahu al-lahu mina al-nari inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna

3370: qala rabbi unsur'ni ala al-qawmi al-muf'sidina

3374: inna munziluna ala ahli hadhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina al-samai bima kanu yafsuquna

3446: awalam yaraw anna al-laha yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru inna fi dhalika laayatin liqawmin yu'minuna

3449: al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum thumma razaqakum thumma yumitukum thumma yuh'yikum hal min shurakaikum man yaf 'alu min dhalikum min shayin sub'hanahu wata'ala amma yush'rikuna

3463: al-lahu alladhi khalaqakum min da'fin thumma ja'ala min ba'di da'fin quwwatan thumma ja'ala min ba'di quwwatin da'fan washaybatan yakhluqu ma yashau wahuwa al-'alimu al-qadiru
3464: wayawma taqumu al-sa'atu yuq'simu al-muj'rimuna ma labithu ghayra sa'atin kadhalika kanu yu'fakuna
3465: waqala alladhina utu al-'il'ma wal-imana laqad labith'tum fi kitabi al-lahi ila yawmi al-ba'thi fahadha yawmu al-ba'thi walakinnakum kuntum la ta'lamuna
3466: fayawma-idhin la yanfa'u alladhina zalamu ma'dhiratuhum wala hum yus'ta'tabuna
3467: walaqad darabna lilnnasi fi hadha al-qur'ani min kulli mathalin wala-in ji'tahum biayatin layaqulanna alladhina kafaru in antum illa mub'tiluna
3468: kadhalika yatba'u al-lahu ala qulubi alladhina la ya'lamuna
3469: fa-is'bir inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wala yastakhiffannaka alladhina la yuqinuna
3473: alladhina yuqimuna al-salata wayu'tuna al-zakata wahum bil-akhirati hum yuqinuna
3474: ulaika ala hudan min rabbihim wa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
3475: wamina al-nasi man yashtari lahwa al-hadithi liyudilla an sabili al-lahi bighayri il'min wayattakhidhaha huzuwan ulaika lahum adhabun muhinun
3476: wa-idha tut'la alayhi ayatuna walla mus'takbiran ka-an lam yasma'ha ka-anna fi udhunayhi waqran fabashir'hu bi'adhabin alimin
3477: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum jannatu al-na'imi
3478: khalidina fiha wa'da al-lahi haqqan wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
3479: khalaqa al-samawati bighayri amadin tarawnaha wa-alqa fi al-ardi rawasiya an tamida bikum wabatha fiha min kulli dabbatin wa-anzalna mina al-samai maan fa-anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin karimin
3480: hadha khalqu al-lahi fa-aruni madha khalaqa alladhina min dunihi bali al-zalimuna fi dalalin mubinin
3481: walaqad atayna luq'mana al-hik'mata ani ush'kur lillahi waman yashkur fa-innama yashkuru linafsihi waman kafara fa-inna al-laha ghaniyyun hamidun
3482: wa-idh qala luq'manu li-ib'nihi wahuwa ya'izuhu yabunayya la tush'rik bil-lahi inna al-shir'ka lazul'mun azimun
3483: wawassayna al-insana biwalidayhi hamalathu ummuhu wahnan ala wahnin wafisaluhu fi amayni ani ush'kur li waliwalidayka ilayya al-masiru
3484: wa-in jahadaka ala an tush'rika bi ma laysa laka bihi il'mun fala tuti'huma wasahib'huma fi al-dun'ya ma'rufan wa-ittabi' sabila man anaba ilayya thumma ilayya marji'ukum fa-unabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
3485: yabunayya innaha in taku mith'qala habbatin min khardalin fatakun fi sakhratin aw fi al-samawati aw fi al-ardi yati biha al-lahu inna al-laha latifun khabirun
3486: yabunayya aqimi al-salata wamur bil-ma'rufi wa-in'ha ani al-munkari wa-is'bir ala ma asabaka inna dhalika min azmi al-umuri
3487: wala tusa'ir khaddaka lilnnasi wala tamshi fi al-ardi marahan inna al-laha la yuhibbu kulla mukh'talin fakhurin
3488: wa-iq'sid fi mashyika wa-ugh'dud min sawtika inna ankara al-aswati lasawtu al-hamiri
3489: alam taraw anna al-laha sakhara lakum ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wa-asbagha alaykum ni'amahu zahiratan wabatinatan wamina al-nasi man yujadilu fi al-lahi bighayri il'min wala hudan wala kitabin munirin
3490: wa-idha qila lahumu ittabi'u ma anzala al-lahu qalu bal nattabi'u ma wajadna alayhi abaana awalaw kana al-shaytanu yad'uhum ila adhabi al-sa'iri
3491: waman yus'lim wajhahu ila al-lahi wahuwa muh'sinun faqadi is'tamsaka bil-'ur'wati al-wuth'qa wa-ila al-lahi aqibatu al-umuri
3492: waman kafara fala yahzunka kuf'ruhu ilayna marji'uhum fanunabbi-uhum bima amilu inna al-laha alimun bidhati al-suduri
3493: numatti'uhum qalilan thumma nadtarruhum ila adhabin ghalizin
3494: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda layaqulunna al-lahu quli al-hamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum la ya'lamuna
3495: lillahi ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
3496: walaw annama fi al-ardi min shajaratin aqlamun wal-bahru yamudduhu min ba'dihi sab'atu abhurin ma nafidat kalimatu al-lahi inna al-laha azizun hakimun
3497: ma khalqukum wala ba'thukum illa kanafsin wahidatin inna al-laha sami'un basirun
3498: alam tara anna al-laha yuliju al-layla fi al-nahari wayuliju al-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri ila ajalin musamman wa-anna al-laha bima ta'maluna khabirun
3499: dhalika bi-anna al-laha huwa al-haqu wa-anna ma yad'una min dunihi al-batilu wa-anna al-laha huwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
3500: alam tara anna al-ful'ka tajri fi al-bahri bini'mati al-lahi liyuriyakum min ayatihi inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin

3502: yaayyuha al-nasu ittaqu rabbakum wa-ikh'shaw yawman la yajzi walidun an waladihi wala mawludun huwa jazin an walidihi shayan inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
3503: inna al-laha indahu il'mu al-sa'ati wayunazzilu al-ghaytha waya'lamu ma fi al-arhami wama tadri nafsun madha taksibu ghadan wama tadri nafsun bi-ayyi ardin tamutu inna al-laha alimun khabirun

3506: am yaquluna if'tarahu bal huwa al-haqu min rabbika litundhira qawman ma atahum min nadhirin min qablika la'allahum yahtaduna
