3508: yudabbiru al-amra mina al-samai ila al-ardi thumma ya'ruju ilayhi fi yawmin kana miq'daruhu alfa sanatin mimma ta'udduna
3509: dhalika alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati al-'azizu ar-rahimu
3510: alladhi ahsana kulla shayin khalaqahu wabada-a khalqa al-insani min tinin
3511: thumma ja'ala naslahu min sulalatin min main mahinin
3512: thumma sawwahu wanafakha fihi min ruhihi waja'ala lakumu al-sam'a wal-absara wal-afidata qalilan ma tashkuruna
3513: waqalu a-idha dalalna fi al-ardi a-inna lafi khalqin jadidin bal hum biliqai rabbihim kafiruna
3514: qul yatawaffakum malaku al-mawti alladhi wukkila bikum thumma ila rabbikum tur'ja'una
3515: walaw tara idhi al-muj'rimuna nakisu ruusihim inda rabbihim rabbana absarna wasami'na fa-ir'ji'na na'mal salihan inna muqinuna
3516: walaw shi'na laatayna kulla nafsin hudaha walakin haqqa al-qawlu minni la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nasi ajma'ina
3517: fadhuqu bima nasitum liqaa yawmikum hadha inna nasinakum wadhuqu adhaba al-khul'di bima kuntum ta'maluna
3518: innama yu'minu biayatina alladhina idha dhukkiru biha kharru sujjadan wasabbahu bihamdi rabbihim wahum la yastakbiruna
3519: tatajafa junubuhum ani al-madaji'i yad'una rabbahum khawfan watama'an wamimma razaqnahum yunfiquna
3520: fala ta'lamu nafsun ma ukh'fiya lahum min qurrati a'yunin jazaan bima kanu ya'maluna
3521: afaman kana mu'minan kaman kana fasiqan la yastawuna
3522: amma alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati falahum jannatu al-mawa nuzulan bima kanu ya'maluna
3523: wa-amma alladhina fasaqu famawahumu al-naru kullama aradu an yakhruju min'ha u'idu fiha waqila lahum dhuqu adhaba al-nari alladhi kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
3524: walanudhiqannahum mina al-'adhabi al-adna duna al-'adhabi al-akbari la'allahum yarji'una
3525: waman azlamu mimman dhukkira biayati rabbihi thumma a'rada anha inna mina al-muj'rimina muntaqimuna
3526: walaqad atayna musa al-kitaba fala takun fi mir'yatin min liqaihi waja'alnahu hudan libani is'raila
3527: waja'alna min'hum a-immatan yahduna bi-amrina lamma sabaru wakanu biayatina yuqinuna
3528: inna rabbaka huwa yafsilu baynahum yawma al-qiyamati fima kanu fihi yakhtalifuna
3529: awalam yahdi lahum kam ahlakna min qablihim mina al-quruni yamshuna fi masakinihim inna fi dhalika laayatin afala yasma'una

3531: wayaquluna mata hadha al-fathu in kuntum sadiqina
3532: qul yawma al-fathi la yanfa'u alladhina kafaru imanuhum wala hum yunzaruna
3534: yaayyuha al-nabiyu ittaqi al-laha wala tuti'i al-kafirina wal-munafiqina inna al-laha kana aliman hakiman
3535: wa-ittabi' ma yuha ilayka min rabbika inna al-laha kana bima ta'maluna khabiran
3536: watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
3537: ma ja'ala al-lahu lirajulin min qalbayni fi jawfihi wama ja'ala azwajakumu allai tuzahiruna min'hunna ummahatikum wama ja'ala ad'iyaakum abnaakum dhalikum qawlukum bi-afwahikum wal-lahu yaqulu al-haqa wahuwa yahdi al-sabila

3544: hunalika ub'tuliya al-mu'minuna wazul'zilu zil'zalan shadidan

3546: wa-idh qalat taifatun min'hum yaahla yathriba la muqama lakum fa-ir'ji'u wayastadhinu fariqun min'humu al-nabiya yaquluna inna buyutana awratun wama hiya bi'awratin in yuriduna illa firaran
3547: walaw dukhilat alayhim min aqtariha thumma su-ilu al-fit'nata laatawha wama talabbathu biha illa yasiran
3548: walaqad kanu ahadu al-laha min qablu la yuwalluna al-adbara wakana ahdu al-lahi masulan
3549: qul lan yanfa'akumu al-firaru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan la tumatta'una illa qalilan
3550: qul man dha alladhi ya'simukum mina al-lahi in arada bikum suan aw arada bikum rahmatan wala yajiduna lahum min duni al-lahi waliyyan wala nasiran
3551: qad ya'lamu al-lahu al-mu'awiqina minkum wal-qailina li-ikh'wanihim halumma ilayna wala yatuna al-basa illa qalilan
3552: ashihhatan alaykum fa-idha jaa al-khawfu ra-aytahum yanzuruna ilayka taduru a'yunuhum ka-alladhi yugh'sha alayhi mina al-mawti fa-idha dhahaba al-khawfu salaqukum bi-alsinatin hidadin ashihhatan ala al-khayri ulaika lam yu'minu fa-ahbata al-lahu a'malahum wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
3553: yahsabuna al-ahzaba lam yadhhabu wa-in yati al-ahzabu yawaddu law annahum baduna fi al-a'rabi yasaluna an anbaikum walaw kanu fikum ma qatalu illa qalilan
3554: laqad kana lakum fi rasuli al-lahi us'watun hasanatun liman kana yarju al-laha wal-yawma al-akhira wadhakara al-laha kathiran

3556: mina al-mu'minina rijalun sadaqu ma ahadu al-laha alayhi famin'hum man qada nahbahu wamin'hum man yantaziru wama baddalu tabdilan
3557: liyajziya al-lahu al-sadiqina bisid'qihim wayu'adhiba al-munafiqina in shaa aw yatuba alayhim inna al-laha kana ghafuran rahiman
3558: waradda al-lahu alladhina kafaru bighayzihim lam yanalu khayran wakafa al-lahu al-mu'minina al-qitala wakana al-lahu qawiyyan azizan
3559: wa-anzala alladhina zaharuhum min ahli al-kitabi min sayasihim waqadhafa fi qulubihimu ar-ru'ba fariqan taqtuluna watasiruna fariqan
3560: wa-awrathakum ardahum wadiyarahum wa-amwalahum wa-ardan lam tatauha wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin qadiran
3561: yaayyuha al-nabiyu qul li-azwajika in kuntunna turid'na al-hayata al-dun'ya wazinataha fata'alayna umatti'kunna wa-usarrih'kunna sarahan jamilan
3562: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasulahu wal-dara al-akhirata fa-inna al-laha a'adda lil'muh'sinati minkunna ajran aziman
3563: yanisaa al-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifahishatin mubayyinatin yuda'af laha al-'adhabu di'fayni wakana dhalika ala al-lahi yasiran
3564: waman yaqnut minkunna lillahi warasulihi wata'mal salihan nu'tiha ajraha marratayni wa-a'tadna laha riz'qan kariman
3565: yanisaa al-nabiyi lastunna ka-ahadin mina al-nisai ini ittaqaytunna fala takhda'na bil-qawli fayatma'a alladhi fi qalbihi maradun waqul'na qawlan ma'rufan

3568: inna al-mus'limina wal-mus'limati wal-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wal-qanitina wal-qanitati wal-sadiqina wal-sadiqati wal-sabirina wal-sabirati wal-khashi'ina wal-khashi'ati wal-mutasadiqina wal-mutasadiqati wal-saimina wal-saimati wal-hafizina furujahum wal-hafizati wal-dhakirina al-laha kathiran wal-dhakirati a'adda al-lahu lahum maghfiratan wa-ajran aziman
3569: wama kana limu'minin wala mu'minatin idha qada al-lahu warasuluhu amran an yakuna lahumu al-khiyaratu min amrihim waman ya'si al-laha warasulahu faqad dalla dalalan mubinan
3570: wa-idh taqulu lilladhi an'ama al-lahu alayhi wa-an'amta alayhi amsik alayka zawjaka wa-ittaqi al-laha watukh'fi fi nafsika ma al-lahu mub'dihi watakhsha al-nasa wal-lahu ahaqqu an takhshahu falamma qada zaydun min'ha wataran zawwajnakaha likay la yakuna ala al-mu'minina harajun fi azwaji ad'iyaihim idha qadaw min'hunna wataran wakana amru al-lahi maf'ulan
3571: ma kana ala al-nabiyi min harajin fima farada al-lahu lahu sunnata al-lahi fi alladhina khalaw min qablu wakana amru al-lahi qadaran maqduran
3572: alladhina yuballighuna risalati al-lahi wayakhshawnahu wala yakhshawna ahadan illa al-laha wakafa bil-lahi hasiban
3573: ma kana muhammadun aba ahadin min rijalikum walakin rasula al-lahi wakhatama al-nabiyina wakana al-lahu bikulli shayin aliman
3574: yaayyuha alladhina amanu udh'kuru al-laha dhik'ran kathiran
3576: huwa alladhi yusalli alaykum wamalaikatuhu liyukh'rijakum mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri wakana bil-mu'minina rahiman
3577: tahiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salamun wa-a'adda lahum ajran kariman
3578: yaayyuha al-nabiyu inna arsalnaka shahidan wamubashiran wanadhiran
3579: wada'iyan ila al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirajan muniran
3580: wabashiri al-mu'minina bi-anna lahum mina al-lahi fadlan kabiran
3581: wala tuti'i al-kafirina wal-munafiqina wada' adhahum watawakkal ala al-lahi wakafa bil-lahi wakilan
3582: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nakahtumu al-mu'minati thumma tallaqtumuhunna min qabli an tamassuhunna fama lakum alayhinna min iddatin ta'taddunaha famatti'uhunna wasarrihuhunna sarahan jamilan
3583: yaayyuha al-nabiyu inna ahlalna laka azwajaka allati atayta ujurahunna wama malakat yaminuka mimma afaa al-lahu alayka wabanati ammika wabanati ammatika wabanati khalika wabanati khalatika allati hajarna ma'aka wa-im'ra-atan mu'minatan in wahabat nafsaha lilnnabiyyi in arada al-nabiyu an yastankihaha khalisatan laka min duni al-mu'minina qad alim'na ma faradna alayhim fi azwajihim wama malakat aymanuhum likayla yakuna alayka harajun wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
3584: tur'ji man tashau min'hunna watu'wi ilayka man tashau wamani ib'taghayta mimman azalta fala junaha alayka dhalika adna an taqarra a'yunuhunna wala yahzanna wayardayna bima ataytahunna kulluhunna wal-lahu ya'lamu ma fi qulubikum wakana al-lahu aliman haliman
3585: la yahillu laka al-nisau min ba'du wala an tabaddala bihinna min azwajin walaw a'jabaka hus'nuhunna illa ma malakat yaminuka wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin raqiban
3586: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tadkhulu buyuta al-nabiyi illa an yu'dhana lakum ila ta'amin ghayra nazirina inahu walakin idha du'itum fa-ud'khulu fa-idha ta'im'tum fa-intashiru wala mus'tanisina lihadithin inna dhalikum kana yu'dhi al-nabiya fayastahyi minkum wal-lahu la yastahyi mina al-haqi wa-idha sa-altumuhunna mata'an fasaluhunna min warai hijabin dhalikum atharu liqulubikum waqulubihinna wama kana lakum an tu'dhu rasula al-lahi wala an tankihu azwajahu min ba'dihi abadan inna dhalikum kana inda al-lahi aziman
3587: in tub'du shayan aw tukh'fuhu fa-inna al-laha kana bikulli shayin aliman
3588: la junaha alayhinna fi abaihinna wala abnaihinna wala ikh'wanihinna wala abnai ikh'wanihinna wala abnai akhawatihinna wala nisaihinna wala ma malakat aymanuhunna wa-ittaqina al-laha inna al-laha kana ala kulli shayin shahidan
3589: inna al-laha wamalaikatahu yusalluna ala al-nabiyi yaayyuha alladhina amanu sallu alayhi wasallimu tasliman

3602: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takunu ka-alladhina adhaw musa fabarra-ahu al-lahu mimma qalu wakana inda al-lahi wajihan
3603: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha waqulu qawlan sadidan
3604: yus'lih lakum a'malakum wayaghfir lakum dhunubakum waman yuti'i al-laha warasulahu faqad faza fawzan aziman
3605: inna aradna al-amanata ala al-samawati wal-ardi wal-jibali fa-abayna an yahmil'naha wa-ashfaqna min'ha wahamalaha al-insanu innahu kana zaluman jahulan
3606: liyu'adhiba al-lahu al-munafiqina wal-munafiqati wal-mush'rikina wal-mush'rikati wayatuba al-lahu ala al-mu'minina wal-mu'minati wakana al-lahu ghafuran rahiman
3607: al-hamdu lillahi alladhi lahu ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi walahu al-hamdu fi al-akhirati wahuwa al-hakimu al-khabiru
3608: ya'lamu ma yaliju fi al-ardi wama yakhruju min'ha wama yanzilu mina al-samai wama ya'ruju fiha wahuwa ar-rahimu al-ghafuru
3609: waqala alladhina kafaru la tatina al-sa'atu qul bala warabbi latatiyannakum alimi al-ghaybi la ya'zubu anhu mith'qalu dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wala asgharu min dhalika wala akbaru illa fi kitabin mubinin
3610: liyajziya alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati ulaika lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karimun
3611: wa-alladhina sa'aw fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika lahum adhabun min rij'zin alimun
3612: wayara alladhina utu al-'il'ma alladhi unzila ilayka min rabbika huwa al-haqa wayahdi ila sirati al-'azizi al-hamidi
3613: waqala alladhina kafaru hal nadullukum ala rajulin yunabbi-ukum idha muzziq'tum kulla mumazzaqin innakum lafi khalqin jadidin
3614: aftara ala al-lahi kadhiban am bihi jinnatun bali alladhina la yu'minuna bil-akhirati fi al-'adhabi wal-dalali al-ba'idi
3615: afalam yaraw ila ma bayna aydihim wama khalfahum mina al-samai wal-ardi in nasha nakhsif bihimu al-arda aw nus'qit alayhim kisafan mina al-samai inna fi dhalika laayatan likulli abdin munibin
3616: walaqad atayna dawuda minna fadlan yajibalu awwibi ma'ahu wal-tayra wa-alanna lahu al-hadida
3617: ani i'mal sabighatin waqaddir fi al-sardi wa-i'malu salihan inni bima ta'maluna basirun
3618: walisulaymana ar-riha ghuduwwuha shahrun warawahuha shahrun wa-asalna lahu ayna al-qit'ri wamina al-jini man ya'malu bayna yadayhi bi-idh'ni rabbihi waman yazigh min'hum an amrina nudhiq'hu min adhabi al-sa'iri
3619: ya'maluna lahu ma yashau min mahariba watamathila wajifanin kal-jawabi waqudurin rasiyatin i'malu ala dawuda shuk'ran waqalilun min ibadiya al-shakuru
3620: falamma qadayna alayhi al-mawta ma dallahum ala mawtihi illa dabbatu al-ardi takulu minsa-atahu falamma kharra tabayyanati al-jinu an law kanu ya'lamuna al-ghayba ma labithu fi al-'adhabi al-muhini
3621: laqad kana lisaba-in fi maskanihim ayatun jannatani an yaminin washimalin kulu min riz'qi rabbikum wa-ush'kuru lahu baldatun tayyibatun warabbun ghafurun
3622: fa-a'radu fa-arsalna alayhim sayla al-'arimi wabaddalnahum bijannatayhim jannatayni dhawatay ukulin khamtin wa-athlin washayin min sid'rin qalilin
3623: dhalika jazaynahum bima kafaru wahal nujazi illa al-kafura
3624: waja'alna baynahum wabayna al-qura allati barakna fiha quran zahiratan waqaddarna fiha al-sayra siru fiha layaliya wa-ayyaman aminina
3625: faqalu rabbana ba'id bayna asfarina wazalamu anfusahum faja'alnahum ahaditha wamazzaqnahum kulla mumazzaqin inna fi dhalika laayatin likulli sabbarin shakurin
3626: walaqad saddaqa alayhim ib'lisu zannahu fa-ittaba'uhu illa fariqan mina al-mu'minina
3627: wama kana lahu alayhim min sul'tanin illa lina'lama man yu'minu bil-akhirati mimman huwa min'ha fi shakkin warabbuka ala kulli shayin hafizun
3628: quli id'u alladhina za'amtum min duni al-lahi la yamlikuna mith'qala dharratin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi wama lahum fihima min shir'kin wama lahu min'hum min zahirin
3629: wala tanfa'u al-shafa'atu indahu illa liman adhina lahu hatta idha fuzzi'a an qulubihim qalu madha qala rabbukum qalu al-haqa wahuwa al-'aliyu al-kabiru
3630: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samawati wal-ardi quli al-lahu wa-inna aw iyyakum la'ala hudan aw fi dalalin mubinin
3631: qul la tus'aluna amma ajramna wala nus'alu amma ta'maluna
3632: qul yajma'u baynana rabbuna thumma yaftahu baynana bil-haqi wahuwa al-fatahu al-'alimu
3633: qul aruniya alladhina alhaqtum bihi shurakaa kalla bal huwa al-lahu al-'azizu al-hakimu
3634: wama arsalnaka illa kaffatan lilnnasi bashiran wanadhiran walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
3635: wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
3636: qul lakum mi'adu yawmin la tastakhiruna anhu sa'atan wala tastaqdimuna
3637: waqala alladhina kafaru lan nu'mina bihadha al-qur'ani wala bi-alladhi bayna yadayhi walaw tara idhi al-zalimuna mawqufuna inda rabbihim yarji'u ba'duhum ila ba'din al-qawla yaqulu alladhina us'tud'ifu lilladhina is'takbaru lawla antum lakunna mu'minina
3638: qala alladhina is'takbaru lilladhina us'tud'ifu anahnu sadadnakum ani al-huda ba'da idh jaakum bal kuntum muj'rimina
3639: waqala alladhina us'tud'ifu lilladhina is'takbaru bal makru al-layli wal-nahari idh tamurunana an nakfura bil-lahi wanaj'ala lahu andadan wa-asarru al-nadamata lamma ra-awu al-'adhaba waja'alna al-aghlala fi a'naqi alladhina kafaru hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu ya'maluna
3640: wama arsalna fi qaryatin min nadhirin illa qala mut'rafuha inna bima ur'sil'tum bihi kafiruna
3641: waqalu nahnu aktharu amwalan wa-awladan wama nahnu bimu'adhabina
3642: qul inna rabbi yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau wayaqdiru walakinna akthara al-nasi la ya'lamuna
3643: wama amwalukum wala awladukum bi-allati tuqarribukum indana zul'fa illa man amana wa'amila salihan fa-ulaika lahum jazau al-di'fi bima amilu wahum fi al-ghurufati aminuna
3644: wa-alladhina yas'awna fi ayatina mu'ajizina ulaika fi al-'adhabi muh'daruna
3645: qul inna rabbi yabsutu ar-riz'qa liman yashau min ibadihi wayaqdiru lahu wama anfaqtum min shayin fahuwa yukh'lifuhu wahuwa khayru ar-raziqina
3646: wayawma yahshuruhum jami'an thumma yaqulu lil'malaikati ahaulai iyyakum kanu ya'buduna
3647: qalu sub'hanaka anta waliyyuna min dunihim bal kanu ya'buduna al-jina aktharuhum bihim mu'minuna
3648: fal-yawma la yamliku ba'dukum liba'din naf 'an wala darran wanaqulu lilladhina zalamu dhuqu adhaba al-nari allati kuntum biha tukadhibuna
3649: wa-idha tut'la alayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qalu ma hadha illa rajulun yuridu an yasuddakum amma kana ya'budu abaukum waqalu ma hadha illa if'kun muf'taran waqala alladhina kafaru lil'haqqi lamma jaahum in hadha illa sih'run mubinun
3650: wama ataynahum min kutubin yadrusunaha wama arsalna ilayhim qablaka min nadhirin
3651: wakadhaba alladhina min qablihim wama balaghu mi'shara ma ataynahum fakadhabu rusuli fakayfa kana nakiri
3652: qul innama a'izukum biwahidatin an taqumu lillahi mathna wafurada thumma tatafakkaru ma bisahibikum min jinnatin in huwa illa nadhirun lakum bayna yaday adhabin shadidin
3653: qul ma sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illa ala al-lahi wahuwa ala kulli shayin shahidun
3654: qul inna rabbi yaqdhifu bil-haqi allamu al-ghuyubi
3655: qul jaa al-haqu wama yub'di-u al-batilu wama yu'idu
3656: qul in dalaltu fa-innama adillu ala nafsi wa-ini ih'tadaytu fabima yuhi ilayya rabbi innahu sami'un qaribun
3657: walaw tara idh fazi'u fala fawta wa-ukhidhu min makanin qaribin
3658: waqalu amanna bihi wa-anna lahumu al-tanawushu min makanin ba'idin
3659: waqad kafaru bihi min qablu wayaqdhifuna bil-ghaybi min makanin ba'idin
3660: wahila baynahum wabayna ma yashtahuna kama fu'ila bi-ashya'ihim min qablu innahum kanu fi shakkin muribin
3661: al-hamdu lillahi fatiri al-samawati wal-ardi ja'ili al-malaikati rusulan uli ajnihatin mathna wathulatha waruba'a yazidu fi al-khalqi ma yashau inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
3662: ma yaftahi al-lahu lilnnasi min rahmatin fala mum'sika laha wama yum'sik fala mur'sila lahu min ba'dihi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
3663: yaayyuha al-nasu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum hal min khaliqin ghayru al-lahi yarzuqukum mina al-samai wal-ardi la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tu'fakuna
3664: wa-in yukadhibuka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
3665: yaayyuha al-nasu inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
3666: inna al-shaytana lakum aduwwun fa-ittakhidhuhu aduwwan innama yad'u hiz'bahu liyakunu min ashabi al-sa'iri
3667: alladhina kafaru lahum adhabun shadidun wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
3668: afaman zuyyina lahu suu amalihi faraahu hasanan fa-inna al-laha yudillu man yashau wayahdi man yashau fala tadhhab nafsuka alayhim hasaratin inna al-laha alimun bima yasna'una
3669: wal-lahu alladhi arsala ar-riyaha fatuthiru sahaban fasuq'nahu ila baladin mayyitin fa-ahyayna bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha kadhalika al-nushuru
3670: man kana yuridu al-'izata falillahi al-'izatu jami'an ilayhi yas'adu al-kalimu al-tayibu wal-'amalu al-salihu yarfa'uhu wa-alladhina yamkuruna al-sayiati lahum adhabun shadidun wamakru ulaika huwa yaburu
3671: wal-lahu khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma ja'alakum azwajan wama tahmilu min untha wala tada'u illa bi'il'mihi wama yu'ammaru min mu'ammarin wala yunqasu min umurihi illa fi kitabin inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
3672: wama yastawi al-bahrani hadha adhbun furatun saighun sharabuhu wahadha mil'hun ujajun wamin kullin takuluna lahman tariyyan watastakhrijuna hil'yatan talbasunaha watara al-ful'ka fihi mawakhira litabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
3673: yuliju al-layla fi al-nahari wayuliju al-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku wa-alladhina tad'una min dunihi ma yamlikuna min qit'mirin
3674: in tad'uhum la yasma'u du'aakum walaw sami'u ma is'tajabu lakum wayawma al-qiyamati yakfuruna bishir'kikum wala yunabbi-uka mith'lu khabirin
3675: yaayyuha al-nasu antumu al-fuqarau ila al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
3676: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadidin
3678: wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra wa-in tad'u muth'qalatun ila him'liha la yuh'mal min'hu shayon walaw kana dha qur'ba innama tundhiru alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wa-aqamu al-salata waman tazakka fa-innama yatazakka linafsihi wa-ila al-lahi al-masiru
3682: wama yastawi al-ahyau wala al-amwatu inna al-laha yus'mi'u man yashau wama anta bimus'mi'in man fi al-quburi
3684: inna arsalnaka bil-haqi bashiran wanadhiran wa-in min ummatin illa khala fiha nadhirun
3685: wa-in yukadhibuka faqad kadhaba alladhina min qablihim jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati wabil-zuburi wabil-kitabi al-muniri
3686: thumma akhadhtu alladhina kafaru fakayfa kana nakiri
3687: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi thamaratin mukh'talifan alwanuha wamina al-jibali judadun bidun wahum'run mukh'talifun alwanuha wagharabibu sudun
3688: wamina al-nasi wal-dawabi wal-an'ami mukh'talifun alwanuhu kadhalika innama yakhsha al-laha min ibadihi al-'ulamau inna al-laha azizun ghafurun
3689: inna alladhina yatluna kitaba al-lahi wa-aqamu al-salata wa-anfaqu mimma razaqnahum sirran wa'alaniyatan yarjuna tijaratan lan tabura
3690: liyuwaffiyahum ujurahum wayazidahum min fadlihi innahu ghafurun shakurun
3691: wa-alladhi awhayna ilayka mina al-kitabi huwa al-haqu musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi inna al-laha bi'ibadihi lakhabirun basirun
3692: thumma awrathna al-kitaba alladhina is'tafayna min ibadina famin'hum zalimun linafsihi wamin'hum muq'tasidun wamin'hum sabiqun bil-khayrati bi-idh'ni al-lahi dhalika huwa al-fadlu al-kabiru
3693: jannatu adnin yadkhulunaha yuhallawna fiha min asawira min dhahabin walu'lu-an walibasuhum fiha harirun
3694: waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi adhhaba anna al-hazana inna rabbana laghafurun shakurun
3695: alladhi ahallana dara al-muqamati min fadlihi la yamassuna fiha nasabun wala yamassuna fiha lughubun
3696: wa-alladhina kafaru lahum naru jahannama la yuq'da alayhim fayamutu wala yukhaffafu anhum min adhabiha kadhalika najzi kulla kafurin
3697: wahum yastarikhuna fiha rabbana akhrij'na na'mal salihan ghayra alladhi kunna na'malu awalam nu'ammir'kum ma yatadhakkaru fihi man tadhakkara wajaakumu al-nadhiru fadhuqu fama lilzzalimina min nasirin
3698: inna al-laha alimu ghaybi al-samawati wal-ardi innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
3699: huwa alladhi ja'alakum khalaifa fi al-ardi faman kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu wala yazidu al-kafirina kuf'ruhum inda rabbihim illa maqtan wala yazidu al-kafirina kuf'ruhum illa khasaran
3700: qul ara-aytum shurakaakumu alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati am ataynahum kitaban fahum ala bayyinatin min'hu bal in ya'idu al-zalimuna ba'duhum ba'dan illa ghururan
3701: inna al-laha yum'siku al-samawati wal-arda an tazula wala-in zalata in amsakahuma min ahadin min ba'dihi innahu kana haliman ghafuran
3702: wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in jaahum nadhirun layakununna ahda min ih'da al-umami falamma jaahum nadhirun ma zadahum illa nufuran
3703: is'tik'baran fi al-ardi wamakra al-sayi-i wala yahiqu al-makru al-sayi-u illa bi-ahlihi fahal yanzuruna illa sunnata al-awalina falan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdilan walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tahwilan
3704: awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim wakanu ashadda min'hum quwwatan wama kana al-lahu liyu'jizahu min shayin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi innahu kana aliman qadiran
3705: walaw yuakhidhu al-lahu al-nasa bima kasabu ma taraka ala zahriha min dabbatin walakin yu-akhiruhum ila ajalin musamman fa-idha jaa ajaluhum fa-inna al-laha kana bi'ibadihi basiran
3711: litundhira qawman ma undhira abauhum fahum ghafiluna
3712: laqad haqqa al-qawlu ala aktharihim fahum la yu'minuna
3713: inna ja'alna fi a'naqihim aghlalan fahiya ila al-adhqani fahum muq'mahuna
3714: waja'alna min bayni aydihim saddan wamin khalfihim saddan fa-aghshaynahum fahum la yub'siruna
3715: wasawaon alayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum la yu'minuna
3716: innama tundhiru mani ittaba'a al-dhik'ra wakhashiya ar-rahmana bil-ghaybi fabashir'hu bimaghfiratin wa-ajrin karimin
3717: inna nahnu nuh'yi al-mawta wanaktubu ma qaddamu waatharahum wakulla shayin ahsaynahu fi imamin mubinin
3718: wa-id'rib lahum mathalan ashaba al-qaryati idh jaaha al-mur'saluna
3719: idh arsalna ilayhimu ith'nayni fakadhabuhuma fa'azzazna bithalithin faqalu inna ilaykum mur'saluna
3720: qalu ma antum illa basharun mith'luna wama anzala ar-rahmanu min shayin in antum illa takdhibuna
3721: qalu rabbuna ya'lamu inna ilaykum lamur'saluna
3723: qalu inna tatayyarna bikum la-in lam tantahu lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minna adhabun alimun
3724: qalu tairukum ma'akum a-in dhukkir'tum bal antum qawmun mus'rifuna
3725: wajaa min aqsa al-madinati rajulun yas'a qala yaqawmi ittabi'u al-mur'salina
3726: ittabi'u man la yasalukum ajran wahum muh'taduna
3727: wama liya la a'budu alladhi fatarani wa-ilayhi tur'ja'una
3728: a-attakhidhu min dunihi alihatan in yurid'ni ar-rahmanu bidurrin la tugh'ni anni shafa'atuhum shayan wala yunqidhuni
3731: qila ud'khuli al-janata qala yalayta qawmi ya'lamuna
3732: bima ghafara li rabbi waja'alani mina al-muk'ramina
3733: wama anzalna ala qawmihi min ba'dihi min jundin mina al-samai wama kunna munzilina
3734: in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum khamiduna
3735: yahasratan ala al-'ibadi ma yatihim min rasulin illa kanu bihi yastahziuna
3736: alam yaraw kam ahlakna qablahum mina al-quruni annahum ilayhim la yarji'una
3737: wa-in kullun lamma jami'un ladayna muh'daruna
3738: waayatun lahumu al-ardu al-maytatu ahyaynaha wa-akhrajna min'ha habban famin'hu yakuluna
3739: waja'alna fiha jannatin min nakhilin wa-a'nabin wafajjarna fiha mina al-'uyuni
3740: liyakulu min thamarihi wama amilathu aydihim afala yashkuruna
3741: sub'hana alladhi khalaqa al-azwaja kullaha mimma tunbitu al-ardu wamin anfusihim wamimma la ya'lamuna
3742: waayatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahara fa-idha hum muz'limuna
3743: wal-shamsu tajri limus'taqarrin laha dhalika taqdiru al-'azizi al-'alimi
3744: wal-qamara qaddarnahu manazila hatta ada kal-'ur'juni al-qadimi
3745: la al-shamsu yanbaghi laha an tud'rika al-qamara wala al-laylu sabiqu al-nahari wakullun fi falakin yasbahuna
3746: waayatun lahum anna hamalna dhurriyyatahum fi al-ful'ki al-mashhuni
3747: wakhalaqna lahum min mith'lihi ma yarkabuna
3748: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum fala sarikha lahum wala hum yunqadhuna
3749: illa rahmatan minna wamata'an ila hinin
3750: wa-idha qila lahumu ittaqu ma bayna aydikum wama khalfakum la'allakum tur'hamuna
3751: wama tatihim min ayatin min ayati rabbihim illa kanu anha mu'ridina
3752: wa-idha qila lahum anfiqu mimma razaqakumu al-lahu qala alladhina kafaru lilladhina amanu anut'imu man law yashau al-lahu at'amahu in antum illa fi dalalin mubinin
3753: wayaquluna mata hadha al-wa'du in kuntum sadiqina
3754: ma yanzuruna illa sayhatan wahidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhissimuna
3755: fala yastati'una tawsiyatan wala ila ahlihim yarji'una
3756: wanufikha fi al-suri fa-idha hum mina al-ajdathi ila rabbihim yansiluna
3757: qalu yawaylana man ba'athana min marqadina hadha ma wa'ada ar-rahmanu wasadaqa al-mur'saluna
3758: in kanat illa sayhatan wahidatan fa-idha hum jami'un ladayna muh'daruna
3759: fal-yawma la tuz'lamu nafsun shayan wala tuj'zawna illa ma kuntum ta'maluna
3760: inna ashaba al-janati al-yawma fi shughulin fakihuna
3761: hum wa-azwajuhum fi zilalin ala al-araiki muttakiuna
3762: lahum fiha fakihatun walahum ma yadda'una
3765: alam a'had ilaykum yabani adama an la ta'budu al-shaytana innahu lakum aduwwun mubinun
3767: walaqad adalla minkum jibillan kathiran afalam takunu ta'qiluna
3770: al-yawma nakhtimu ala afwahihim watukallimuna aydihim watashhadu arjuluhum bima kanu yaksibuna
3771: walaw nashau latamasna ala a'yunihim fa-is'tabaqu al-sirata fa-anna yub'siruna
3772: walaw nashau lamasakhnahum ala makanatihim fama is'tata'u mudiyyan wala yarji'una
3773: waman nu'ammir'hu nunakkis'hu fi al-khalqi afala ya'qiluna
3774: wama allamnahu al-shi'ra wama yanbaghi lahu in huwa illa dhik'run waqur'anun mubinun
3775: liyundhira man kana hayyan wayahiqqa al-qawlu ala al-kafirina
3776: awalam yaraw anna khalaqna lahum mimma amilat aydina an'aman fahum laha malikuna
3777: wadhallalnaha lahum famin'ha rakubuhum wamin'ha yakuluna

5123: is'tahwadha alayhimu al-shaytanu fa-ansahum dhik'ra al-lahi ulaika hiz'bu al-shaytani ala inna hiz'ba al-shaytani humu al-khasiruna
5124: inna alladhina yuhadduna al-laha warasulahu ulaika fi al-adhalina
5125: kataba al-lahu la-aghlibanna ana warusuli inna al-laha qawiyyun azizun
5126: la tajidu qawman yu'minuna bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri yuwadduna man hadda al-laha warasulahu walaw kanu abaahum aw abnaahum aw ikh'wanahum aw ashiratahum ulaika kataba fi qulubihimu al-imana wa-ayyadahum biruhin min'hu wayud'khiluhum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha radiya al-lahu anhum waradu anhu ulaika hiz'bu al-lahi ala inna hiz'ba al-lahi humu al-muf'lihuna
5127: sabbaha lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
5128: huwa alladhi akhraja alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi min diyarihim li-awwali al-hashri ma zanantum an yakhruju wazannu annahum mani'atuhum husunuhum mina al-lahi fa-atahumu al-lahu min haythu lam yahtasibu waqadhafa fi qulubihimu ar-ru'ba yukh'ribuna buyutahum bi-aydihim wa-aydi al-mu'minina fa-i'tabiru yauli al-absari
5129: walawla an kataba al-lahu alayhimu al-jalaa la'adhabahum fi al-dun'ya walahum fi al-akhirati adhabu al-nari
5130: dhalika bi-annahum shaqqu al-laha warasulahu waman yushaqqi al-laha fa-inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
5131: ma qata'tum min linatin aw taraktumuha qaimatan ala usuliha fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyukh'ziya al-fasiqina
5132: wama afaa al-lahu ala rasulihi min'hum fama awjaftum alayhi min khaylin wala rikabin walakinna al-laha yusallitu rusulahu ala man yashau wal-lahu ala kulli shayin qadirun
5133: ma afaa al-lahu ala rasulihi min ahli al-qura falillahi walilrrasuli walidhi al-qur'ba wal-yatama wal-masakini wa-ib'ni al-sabili kay la yakuna dulatan bayna al-aghniyai minkum wama atakumu ar-rasulu fakhudhuhu wama nahakum anhu fa-intahu wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha shadidu al-'iqabi
5134: lil'fuqarai al-muhajirina alladhina ukh'riju min diyarihim wa-amwalihim yabtaghuna fadlan mina al-lahi warid'wanan wayansuruna al-laha warasulahu ulaika humu al-sadiquna
5135: wa-alladhina tabawwau al-dara wal-imana min qablihim yuhibbuna man hajara ilayhim wala yajiduna fi sudurihim hajatan mimma utu wayu'thiruna ala anfusihim walaw kana bihim khasasatun waman yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
5136: wa-alladhina jau min ba'dihim yaquluna rabbana igh'fir lana wali-ikh'wanina alladhina sabaquna bil-imani wala taj'al fi qulubina ghillan lilladhina amanu rabbana innaka raufun rahimun
5137: alam tara ila alladhina nafaqu yaquluna li-ikh'wanihimu alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi la-in ukh'rij'tum lanakhrujanna ma'akum wala nuti'u fikum ahadan abadan wa-in qutil'tum lanansurannakum wal-lahu yashhadu innahum lakadhibuna
5138: la-in ukh'riju la yakhrujuna ma'ahum wala-in qutilu la yansurunahum wala-in nasaruhum layuwallunna al-adbara thumma la yunsaruna
5139: la-antum ashaddu rahbatan fi sudurihim mina al-lahi dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la yafqahuna
5140: la yuqatilunakum jami'an illa fi quran muhassanatin aw min warai judurin basuhum baynahum shadidun tahsabuhum jami'an waqulubuhum shatta dhalika bi-annahum qawmun la ya'qiluna
5141: kamathali alladhina min qablihim qariban dhaqu wabala amrihim walahum adhabun alimun
5142: kamathali al-shaytani idh qala lil'insani uk'fur falamma kafara qala inni barion minka inni akhafu al-laha rabba al-'alamina
5143: fakana aqibatahuma annahuma fi al-nari khalidayni fiha wadhalika jazau al-zalimina
5144: yaayyuha alladhina amanu ittaqu al-laha waltanzur nafsun ma qaddamat lighadin wa-ittaqu al-laha inna al-laha khabirun bima ta'maluna
5145: wala takunu ka-alladhina nasu al-laha fa-ansahum anfusahum ulaika humu al-fasiquna
5146: la yastawi ashabu al-nari wa-ashabu al-janati ashabu al-janati humu al-faizuna
5147: law anzalna hadha al-qur'ana ala jabalin lara-aytahu khashi'an mutasaddi'an min khashyati al-lahi watil'ka al-amthalu nadribuha lilnnasi la'allahum yatafakkaruna
5148: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa alimu al-ghaybi wal-shahadati huwa ar-rahmanu ar-rahimu
5149: huwa al-lahu alladhi la ilaha illa huwa al-maliku al-qudusu al-salamu al-mu'minu al-muhayminu al-'azizu al-jabaru al-mutakabiru sub'hana al-lahi amma yush'rikuna
5150: huwa al-lahu al-khaliqu al-bari-u al-musawiru lahu al-asmau al-hus'na yusabbihu lahu ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
5151: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tattakhidhu aduwwi wa'aduwwakum awliyaa tul'quna ilayhim bil-mawadati waqad kafaru bima jaakum mina al-haqi yukh'rijuna ar-rasula wa-iyyakum an tu'minu bil-lahi rabbikum in kuntum kharajtum jihadan fi sabili wa-ib'tighaa mardati tusirruna ilayhim bil-mawadati wa-ana a'lamu bima akhfaytum wama a'lantum waman yaf 'alhu minkum faqad dalla sawaa al-sabili
5152: in yathqafukum yakunu lakum a'daan wayabsutu ilaykum aydiyahum wa-alsinatahum bil-sui wawaddu law takfuruna
5153: lan tanfa'akum arhamukum wala awladukum yawma al-qiyamati yafsilu baynakum wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
5154: qad kanat lakum us'watun hasanatun fi ib'rahima wa-alladhina ma'ahu idh qalu liqawmihim inna buraau minkum wamimma ta'buduna min duni al-lahi kafarna bikum wabada baynana wabaynakumu al-'adawatu wal-baghdau abadan hatta tu'minu bil-lahi wahdahu illa qawla ib'rahima li-abihi la-astaghfiranna laka wama amliku laka mina al-lahi min shayin rabbana alayka tawakkalna wa-ilayka anabna wa-ilayka al-masiru
5155: rabbana la taj'alna fit'natan lilladhina kafaru wa-igh'fir lana rabbana innaka anta al-'azizu al-hakimu
5156: laqad kana lakum fihim us'watun hasanatun liman kana yarju al-laha wal-yawma al-akhira waman yatawalla fa-inna al-laha huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
5157: asa al-lahu an yaj'ala baynakum wabayna alladhina adaytum min'hum mawaddatan wal-lahu qadirun wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
5158: la yanhakumu al-lahu ani alladhina lam yuqatilukum fi al-dini walam yukh'rijukum min diyarikum an tabarruhum watuq'situ ilayhim inna al-laha yuhibbu al-muq'sitina
5159: innama yanhakumu al-lahu ani alladhina qatalukum fi al-dini wa-akhrajukum min diyarikum wazaharu ala ikh'rajikum an tawallawhum waman yatawallahum fa-ulaika humu al-zalimuna
5160: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha jaakumu al-mu'minatu muhajiratin fa-im'tahinuhunna al-lahu a'lamu biimanihinna fa-in alim'tumuhunna mu'minatin fala tarji'uhunna ila al-kufari la hunna hillun lahum wala hum yahilluna lahunna waatuhum ma anfaqu wala junaha alaykum an tankihuhunna idha ataytumuhunna ujurahunna wala tum'siku bi'isami al-kawafiri wasalu ma anfaqtum walyasalu ma anfaqu dhalikum huk'mu al-lahi yahkumu baynakum wal-lahu alimun hakimun
5161: wa-in fatakum shayon min azwajikum ila al-kufari fa'aqabtum faatu alladhina dhahabat azwajuhum mith'la ma anfaqu wa-ittaqu al-laha alladhi antum bihi mu'minuna
5162: yaayyuha al-nabiyu idha jaaka al-mu'minatu yubayi'naka ala an la yush'rik'na bil-lahi shayan wala yasriq'na wala yaznina wala yaqtul'na awladahunna wala yatina bibuh'tanin yaftarinahu bayna aydihinna wa-arjulihinna wala ya'sinaka fi ma'rufin fabayi'hunna wa-is'taghfir lahunna al-laha inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
5163: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tatawallaw qawman ghadiba al-lahu alayhim qad ya-isu mina al-akhirati kama ya-isa al-kufaru min ashabi al-quburi
5164: sabbaha lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
5165: yaayyuha alladhina amanu lima taquluna ma la taf 'aluna
5166: kabura maqtan inda al-lahi an taqulu ma la taf 'aluna
5167: inna al-laha yuhibbu alladhina yuqatiluna fi sabilihi saffan ka-annahum bun'yanun marsusun
5168: wa-idh qala musa liqawmihi yaqawmi lima tu'dhunani waqad ta'lamuna anni rasulu al-lahi ilaykum falamma zaghu azagha al-lahu qulubahum wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
5169: wa-idh qala isa ub'nu maryama yabani is'raila inni rasulu al-lahi ilaykum musaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina al-tawrati wamubashiran birasulin yati min ba'di us'muhu ahmadu falamma jaahum bil-bayinati qalu hadha sih'run mubinun
5170: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi al-kadhiba wahuwa yud'a ila al-is'lami wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
5171: yuriduna liyut'fiu nura al-lahi bi-afwahihim wal-lahu mutimmu nurihi walaw kariha al-kafiruna
5172: huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bil-huda wadini al-haqi liyuz'hirahu ala al-dini kullihi walaw kariha al-mush'rikuna
5173: yaayyuha alladhina amanu hal adullukum ala tijaratin tunjikum min adhabin alimin
5174: tu'minuna bil-lahi warasulihi watujahiduna fi sabili al-lahi bi-amwalikum wa-anfusikum dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
5175: yaghfir lakum dhunubakum wayud'khil'kum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wamasakina tayyibatan fi jannati adnin dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
5176: wa-ukh'ra tuhibbunaha nasrun mina al-lahi wafathun qaribun wabashiri al-mu'minina
5177: yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu ansara al-lahi kama qala isa ub'nu maryama lil'hawariyyina man ansari ila al-lahi qala al-hawariyuna nahnu ansaru al-lahi faamanat taifatun min bani is'raila wakafarat taifatun fa-ayyadna alladhina amanu ala aduwwihim fa-asbahu zahirina
5178: yusabbihu lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi al-maliki al-qudusi al-'azizi al-hakimi
5179: huwa alladhi ba'atha fi al-umiyina rasulan min'hum yatlu alayhim ayatihi wayuzakkihim wayu'allimuhumu al-kitaba wal-hik'mata wa-in kanu min qablu lafi dalalin mubinin
5180: waakharina min'hum lamma yalhaqu bihim wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
5181: dhalika fadlu al-lahi yu'tihi man yashau wal-lahu dhu al-fadli al-'azimi
5182: mathalu alladhina hummilu al-tawrata thumma lam yahmiluha kamathali al-himari yahmilu asfaran bi'sa mathalu al-qawmi alladhina kadhabu biayati al-lahi wal-lahu la yahdi al-qawma al-zalimina
5183: qul yaayyuha alladhina hadu in za'amtum annakum awliyau lillahi min duni al-nasi fatamannawu al-mawta in kuntum sadiqina
5184: wala yatamannawnahu abadan bima qaddamat aydihim wal-lahu alimun bil-zalimina
5185: qul inna al-mawta alladhi tafirruna min'hu fa-innahu mulaqikum thumma turadduna ila alimi al-ghaybi wal-shahadati fayunabbi-ukum bima kuntum ta'maluna
5186: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha nudiya lilssalati min yawmi al-jumu'ati fa-is'aw ila dhik'ri al-lahi wadharu al-bay'a dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamuna
5187: fa-idha qudiyati al-salatu fa-intashiru fi al-ardi wa-ib'taghu min fadli al-lahi wa-udh'kuru al-laha kathiran la'allakum tuf'lihuna
5188: wa-idha ra-aw tijaratan aw lahwan infaddu ilayha watarakuka qaiman qul ma inda al-lahi khayrun mina al-lahwi wamina al-tijarati wal-lahu khayru ar-raziqina
5189: idha jaaka al-munafiquna qalu nashhadu innaka larasulu al-lahi wal-lahu ya'lamu innaka larasuluhu wal-lahu yashhadu inna al-munafiqina lakadhibuna
5190: ittakhadhu aymanahum junnatan fasaddu an sabili al-lahi innahum saa ma kanu ya'maluna
5191: dhalika bi-annahum amanu thumma kafaru fatubi'a ala qulubihim fahum la yafqahuna
5192: wa-idha ra-aytahum tu'jibuka ajsamuhum wa-in yaqulu tasma' liqawlihim ka-annahum khushubun musannadatun yahsabuna kulla sayhatin alayhim humu al-'aduwu fa-ih'dharhum qatalahumu al-lahu anna yu'fakuna
5193: wa-idha qila lahum ta'alaw yastaghfir lakum rasulu al-lahi lawwaw ruusahum wara-aytahum yasudduna wahum mus'takbiruna
5194: sawaon alayhim astaghfarta lahum am lam tastaghfir lahum lan yaghfira al-lahu lahum inna al-laha la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqina
5195: humu alladhina yaquluna la tunfiqu ala man inda rasuli al-lahi hatta yanfaddu walillahi khazainu al-samawati wal-ardi walakinna al-munafiqina la yafqahuna
5196: yaquluna la-in raja'na ila al-madinati layukh'rijanna al-a'azu min'ha al-adhala walillahi al-'izatu walirasulihi walil'mu'minina walakinna al-munafiqina la ya'lamuna
5197: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la tul'hikum amwalukum wala awladukum an dhik'ri al-lahi waman yaf 'al dhalika fa-ulaika humu al-khasiruna
5198: wa-anfiqu min ma razaqnakum min qabli an yatiya ahadakumu al-mawtu fayaqula rabbi lawla akhartani ila ajalin qaribin fa-assaddaqa wa-akun mina al-salihina
5199: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idha jaa ajaluha wal-lahu khabirun bima ta'maluna
5200: yusabbihu lillahi ma fi al-samawati wama fi al-ardi lahu al-mul'ku walahu al-hamdu wahuwa ala kulli shayin qadirun
5201: huwa alladhi khalaqakum faminkum kafirun waminkum mu'minun wal-lahu bima ta'maluna basirun
5202: khalaqa al-samawati wal-arda bil-haqi wasawwarakum fa-ahsana suwarakum wa-ilayhi al-masiru
5203: ya'lamu ma fi al-samawati wal-ardi waya'lamu ma tusirruna wama tu'linuna wal-lahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
5204: alam yatikum naba-u alladhina kafaru min qablu fadhaqu wabala amrihim walahum adhabun alimun
5205: dhalika bi-annahu kanat tatihim rusuluhum bil-bayinati faqalu abasharun yahdunana fakafaru watawallaw wa-is'taghna al-lahu wal-lahu ghaniyyun hamidun
5206: za'ama alladhina kafaru an lan yub'athu qul bala warabbi latub'athunna thumma latunabba-unna bima amil'tum wadhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
5207: faaminu bil-lahi warasulihi wal-nuri alladhi anzalna wal-lahu bima ta'maluna khabirun
5208: yawma yajma'ukum liyawmi al-jam'i dhalika yawmu al-taghabuni waman yu'min bil-lahi waya'mal salihan yukaffir anhu sayyiatihi wayud'khil'hu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan dhalika al-fawzu al-'azimu
5209: wa-alladhina kafaru wakadhabu biayatina ulaika ashabu al-nari khalidina fiha wabi'sa al-masiru
5210: ma asaba min musibatin illa bi-idh'ni al-lahi waman yu'min bil-lahi yahdi qalbahu wal-lahu bikulli shayin alimun
5211: wa-ati'u al-laha wa-ati'u ar-rasula fa-in tawallaytum fa-innama ala rasulina al-balaghu al-mubinu
5212: al-lahu la ilaha illa huwa wa'ala al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minuna
5213: yaayyuha alladhina amanu inna min azwajikum wa-awladikum aduwwan lakum fa-ih'dharuhum wa-in ta'fu watasfahu wataghfiru fa-inna al-laha ghafurun rahimun
5214: innama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wal-lahu indahu ajrun azimun
5215: fa-ittaqu al-laha ma is'tata'tum wa-is'ma'u wa-ati'u wa-anfiqu khayran li-anfusikum waman yuqa shuhha nafsihi fa-ulaika humu al-muf'lihuna
5216: in tuq'ridu al-laha qardan hasanan yuda'if'hu lakum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu shakurun halimun
5218: yaayyuha al-nabiyu idha tallaqtumu al-nisaa fatalliquhunna li'iddatihinna wa-ahsu al-'idata wa-ittaqu al-laha rabbakum la tukh'rijuhunna min buyutihinna wala yakhruj'na illa an yatina bifahishatin mubayyinatin watil'ka hududu al-lahi waman yata'adda hududa al-lahi faqad zalama nafsahu la tadri la'alla al-laha yuh'dithu ba'da dhalika amran
5219: fa-idha balaghna ajalahunna fa-amsikuhunna bima'rufin aw fariquhunna bima'rufin wa-ashhidu dhaway adlin minkum wa-aqimu al-shahadata lillahi dhalikum yu'azu bihi man kana yu'minu bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-akhiri waman yattaqi al-laha yaj'al lahu makhrajan
5220: wayarzuq'hu min haythu la yahtasibu waman yatawakkal ala al-lahi fahuwa hasbuhu inna al-laha balighu amrihi qad ja'ala al-lahu likulli shayin qadran
5221: wa-allai ya-is'na mina al-mahidi min nisaikum ini ir'tabtum fa'iddatuhunna thalathatu ashhurin wa-allai lam yahid'na wa-ulatu al-ahmali ajaluhunna an yada'na hamlahunna waman yattaqi al-laha yaj'al lahu min amrihi yus'ran
5222: dhalika amru al-lahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi al-laha yukaffir anhu sayyiatihi wayu'zim lahu ajran
5223: askinuhunna min haythu sakantum min wuj'dikum wala tudarruhunna litudayyiqu alayhinna wa-in kunna ulati hamlin fa-anfiqu alayhinna hatta yada'na hamlahunna fa-in arda'na lakum faatuhunna ujurahunna watamiru baynakum bima'rufin wa-in ta'asartum fasatur'di'u lahu ukh'ra
5224: liyunfiq dhu sa'atin min sa'atihi waman qudira alayhi riz'quhu falyunfiq mimma atahu al-lahu la yukallifu al-lahu nafsan illa ma ataha sayaj'alu al-lahu ba'da us'rin yus'ran
5225: waka-ayyin min qaryatin atat an amri rabbiha warusulihi fahasabnaha hisaban shadidan wa'adhabnaha adhaban nuk'ran
5226: fadhaqat wabala amriha wakana aqibatu amriha khus'ran
5227: a'adda al-lahu lahum adhaban shadidan fa-ittaqu al-laha yauli al-albabi alladhina amanu qad anzala al-lahu ilaykum dhik'ran
5228: rasulan yatlu alaykum ayati al-lahi mubayyinatin liyukh'rija alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati mina al-zulumati ila al-nuri waman yu'min bil-lahi waya'mal salihan yud'khil'hu jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan qad ahsana al-lahu lahu riz'qan
5229: al-lahu alladhi khalaqa sab'a samawatin wamina al-ardi mith'lahunna yatanazzalu al-amru baynahunna lita'lamu anna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun wa-anna al-laha qad ahata bikulli shayin il'man
5230: yaayyuha al-nabiyu lima tuharrimu ma ahalla al-lahu laka tabtaghi mardata azwajika wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
5231: qad farada al-lahu lakum tahillata aymanikum wal-lahu mawlakum wahuwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
5232: wa-idh asarra al-nabiyu ila ba'di azwajihi hadithan falamma nabba-at bihi wa-azharahu al-lahu alayhi arrafa ba'dahu wa-a'rada an ba'din falamma nabba-aha bihi qalat man anba-aka hadha qala nabba-aniya al-'alimu al-khabiru
5233: in tatuba ila al-lahi faqad saghat qulubukuma wa-in tazahara alayhi fa-inna al-laha huwa mawlahu wajib'rilu wasalihu al-mu'minina wal-malaikatu ba'da dhalika zahirun
5234: asa rabbuhu in tallaqakunna an yub'dilahu azwajan khayran minkunna mus'limatin mu'minatin qanitatin taibatin abidatin saihatin thayyibatin wa-abkaran
5235: yaayyuha alladhina amanu qu anfusakum wa-ahlikum naran waquduha al-nasu wal-hijaratu alayha malaikatun ghilazun shidadun la ya'suna al-laha ma amarahum wayaf 'aluna ma yu'maruna
5236: yaayyuha alladhina kafaru la ta'tadhiru al-yawma innama tuj'zawna ma kuntum ta'maluna
